The bigger half.

I'd like to propose a toast. Little toast here, ding ding. I know this isn't the kind of Thanksgiving that all of you all planned, but for me, this has been really great, you know, I think because it didn't involve divorce or projectile vomiting. Anyway, I was just thinking, I mean, if you'd gone to Vail, and if you guys'd been with your family, if you didn't have syphilis and stuff, we wouldn't be all together, you know? So I guess what I'm trying to say is that I'm very thankful that all of your Thanksgivings sucked.
That's so sweet.
And hey, here's to a lousy Christmas.
And a crappy New Year.
Here, here!

scene: The Subway, Joey sees his poster and peels off the caption on his poster.
difficulty_description: 独白，且用词简单，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: Joey sees his poster and he peels off the caption on his poster, revealing more posters underneath saying: Bladder Control Problem, Stop Wife Beating, Hemorrhoids, Winner of 3 Tony Awards. He's finally happy with that and walks away.

scene: The gang is helping Rachel with her resumes at Monica's apartment, then moving to Central Perk.
difficulty_description: 此场景包含较长的对话和一些幽默元素，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: Uh, Rach, we're running low on resumes over here.
Do you really want a job with Popular Mechanics?
Well, if you're gonna work for mechanics, those are the ones to work for.
Hey, look, you guys, I'm going for anything here, OK? I cannot be a waitress anymore, I mean it. I'm sick of the lousy tips, I'm sick of being called 'Excuse me...'
Rach, did you proofread these?
Uh... yeah, why?
Uh, nothing, I'm sure they'll be impressed with your excellent compuper skills.
(upset) Oh my Goood! Oh, do you think it's on all of them?
Oh no, I'm sure the Xerox machine caught a few.

scene: Central Perk, Rachel is working, Monica and Phoebe enter. Ross and Chandler are sitting at a table.
difficulty_description: 此场景包含多个对话层次和一些幽默元素，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: Hey, guys.
Hey.
Hey... hi, ladies... uh, can I get you anything? (to Monica, quietly): Did you bring the mail?
Lots of responses.
(to Monica): Really? (out loud): Sure, we have scones left! (to Monica): OK, read them to me.
(reading): Dear Ms. Green, thank you for your inquiry, however... oh... (crumples up letter)
(out loud): We have apple cinnamon...
(reading): OK... Dear Ms. Green... yeah... yeah... yeah... No. (crumples up letter)
Wow!
What?
(reading): Your Visa bill is huge!
(grabs the bill) Give me that!

scene: Central Perk, focus shifts to Chandler and Ross discussing Ross's love life.
difficulty_description: 场景涉及较为复杂的情感表达和幽默，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: You know, I can't believe you. Linda is so great! Why won't you go out with her again?
I don't know.
Is this still about her whole 'The Flintstones could've really happened' thing?
No, it's not just that. It's just—I want someone who... who does something for me, y'know? Who gets my heart pounding, who... who makes me, uh... (begins to stare lovingly at Rachel)
...little playthings with yarn?
What?
Could you want her more?
Who?
(sarcastically) Dee, the sarcastic sister from What's Happening.
Look, I am totally, totally over her, OK, I just... (Rachel comes over, Ross lays head on table): Hiiii!
Hi! How are you?
We're fine, we're fine.
OK. (walks away)

scene: Central Perk, Joey joins Ross and Chandler, followed by the girls discussing poker.
difficulty_description: 此场景包含多个角色的对话和一些幽默元素，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: (keeps staring at Rachel, head on table)
(smacks Ross with a newspaper)
Shut up!
We're not—we're not saying anything.
What?
Uhhhh... Joey cried last night.
Thank you.
(to the girls) We were playing poker, alright...
There was chocolate on the three. It looked like an eight, alright?
Oh, guys, you should've seen him. 'Read 'em and weep.'
And then he did.
Well, now, how come you guys have never played poker with us?
Yeah, what is that? Like, some kind of guy thing? Like, some kind of sexist guy thing? Like it's poker, so only guys can play?
No, women are welcome to play.
Oh, OK, so then what is it? Some kind of... you know, like, like... some kind of, y'know, like... alright, what is it?
There just don't happen to be any women in our games.
Yeah, we just don't happen to know any women that know how to play poker.
Oh, yeah, right.
Oh, please, that is such a lame excuse!
Really.
I mean, that's a typical guy response.
Excuse me, do any of you know how to play?
No.
But you could teach us.
No.

scene: Monica 和 Rachel 的公寓，朋友们教女生打牌
difficulty_description: 此场景包含中等难度的对话，有一些复杂的句型和幽默对话，适合有一定基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: OK, so now we draw cards.
So I wouldn't need any, right? Cause I have a straight.
Oh, good for you!
Congratulations!
OK Phoebs, how many do you want?
OK, I just need two... the, um, ten of spades and the six of clubs.
No. No, uh, Phoebs? You can't—you can't do...
Oh wait, I have the ten of spades! Here!
No, no. Uh... no, see, uh, you-you can't do that.
Oh, no-no-no-no-no-no, that's OK, I don't need them. I'm going for fours.
Oh, you're... (gives up)
Alright, here we go. We've got salmon roulettes and assorted crudites.
OOooooo!
OOooooo!
Whoa, whoa, whoa, Monica, what're you doin'? This is a poker game. You can't serve food with more than one syllable. It's gotta be like chips, or dip, or pretz...(look of realization)
OK, so at this point, the dealer...
Alright, you know, we got it, we got it. Let's play for real. High stakes... big bucks...
Alright, now, you sure? Phoebe just threw away two jacks because they didn't look happy...
But... I'm ready, so, just deal.
OK, alright, last minute lesson, last minute lesson. (holds up two cards) Joey... three... eight. Eight... three. (Joey is unamused) Alright babe, deal the cards.
Dammit, dammit, dammit!
(to Joey): Oh I see, so then, you were lying.
About what?
About how good your cards were.
Heh... I was bluffing.
A-ha! And... what is bluffing? Is it not another word for... lying?
OK, sorry to break up this party, but I've got resumes to fax before work tomorrow... (gets up to leave)
Whoa, whoa, whoa!
Rach, Rach, we gotta settle.
Settle what?
The... Jamestown colony of Virginia. You see, King George is giving us the land, so...
The game, Rachel, the game. You owe us money for the game.
Oh. Right.
You know what, you guys? It's their first time, why don't we just forget about the money, alright?
Hell no, we'll pay!
OK, Monica? I had another answer all ready.
And you know what? We want a rematch.
Well that's fine with me. Could use the money.
(to Ross): So basically, you get your ya-yas by taking money from all of your friends.
(pause)...Yeah.
Yes, and I get my ya-yas from Ikea. You have to put them together yourself, but they cost a little less.

Look, Rachel, this is poker. I play to win, alright? In order for me to win, other people have to lose. So if you're gonna play poker with me, don't expect me to be a 'nice guy,' OK? Cause once those cards are dealt... (claps hands three times)
(pause)...Yeah?
I'm not a nice guy.

scene: Ross 的公寓，Chandler 和 Joey 在那里，Ross 带着披萨进来
difficulty_description: 此场景包含中等难度的对话，包含有关 Ross 和 Rachel 关系的讨论，以及一些幽默。

dialogues.text: Alright boys, let's eat.
Oh, did you get that from the 'I Love Rachel' pizzeria?
You still on that?
Oh, come on. What was with that whole Black Bart speech? (mimicking): 'When I play poker, I'm not a nice guy!'
You are way off, pal.
No, I don't think so, see Ross, because I think you love her.
Um.... no. See, I might've had feelings for her at one time—not any more. I just—I...
Marcel! Where are you going with that disc?
You are not putting that on again! Marcel, OK—if you press that button, you are in very, very big trouble.

scene: Monica 和 Rachel 的公寓，Rachel 收到一封重要信件
difficulty_description: 此场景包含中等难度的对话，讨论 Rachel 的工作面试以及 Monica 对 competitive 话题的讨论。

dialogues.text: (opening mail) Can you believe what a jerk Ross was being?
Yeah, I know. He can get really competitive.
Ha. Ha, ha.
What?
Oh, hello, kettle? This is Monica. You're black.
Please! I am not as bad as Ross.
Oh, I beg to differ. The Pictionary incident?
That was not an incident! I-I was gesturing, a-and the plate slipped out of my hand.
Oooooh. (reads letter) (surprised): Oh! I got an interview! I got an interview!
You're kidding! Where? Where?
(in disbelief): Sak's... Fifth... Avenue.
Oh, Rachel!
Oh, it's like the mother ship is calling you home.
Well, what's the job?
Assistant buyer. Oh! I would be shopping... for a living!
OK, look. That is Aunt Iris. This woman has been playing poker since she was five. You gotta listen to every word she says.

scene: Monica 和 Rachel 的公寓，Aunt Iris 登场
difficulty_description: 此场景包含中等难度的对话，有关 Aunt Iris 教女生打牌的一些技巧。

dialogues.text: Is Tony Randall dead?
No.
I don't think so.
Why?
Well, he may be now, because I think I hit him with my car.
What?
Oh my God!
Really?
No! That's bluffing. Lesson number one. (walks into kitchen) Let me tell you something... everything you hear at a poker game is pure crap.
Nice earrings.
Thank y... (thinks about it)
Girls, sit down.
Uh, Aunt Iris? This is Phoebe, and that's Rachel...
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, listen, I am parked at a meter. Let's do it.

scene: Ross 的公寓，大家围坐在桌子边
difficulty_description: 此场景包含中等难度的对话，有关于 Rachel 工作面试的讨论和一些幽默。

dialogues.text: Ross, could we please, please, please listen to anything else?
Alright.
(听着背景音乐) I'm gonna pay for that tonight.
Hi!
Hey.
Guys! Guess what, guess what, guess what, guess what!
Um, ok... the... the fifth dentist caved and now they're all recommending Trident?

Noooo... the interview! She loved me! She absolutely loved me. We talked for like two and a half hours, we have the same taste in clothes, and—oh, I went to camp with her cousin... And, oh, the job is perfect. I can do this. I can do this well!
That's great! That's wonderful!
Oh God, oh, and then she told the funniest story...
OK, great. You'll tell us and we'll laugh. Let's play poker.
Alright now listen, you guys, we talked about it, and if you don't want to play, we completely understand.
Oh yes, yes, we could play some other game... like, uh, I don't know... Pictionary?
Ha, ha, very funny, very funny. But I think we'd like to give poker another try. Shall we, ladies?
Yes, we should. I think we should.
No, no, thats OK. Y'know, I think I'm gonna give it a go.
Alright.
Alright... (shuffles cards expertly, all the guys stare in amazement)

scene: Ross's Apartment, Ross settling poker debts
difficulty_description: 涉及多人物的对话，部分语句略长且富有幽默感，适合有一定英语基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: So, Phoebs owes $7.50, Monica, you owe $10, and Rachel, you owe fifteen big ones.
But hey, thanks for teachin' us Cross-Eyed Mary. You guys, we gotta play that at our regular game.
Alright, here's my $7.50. But I think you should know that this money is cursed.
What?
Oh, I cursed it. So now bad things will happen to he who spends it.
That's alright, I'll take it. Bad things happen to me anyway. This way I can break 'em up with a movie.
Well, that just leaves the big Green poker machine, who owes fifteen...
Mmm-hmmm. Oh, so typical. Ooo, I'm a man. Ooo, I have a penis. Ooo, I have to win money to exert my power over women.

You know what? This is not over. We will play you again, and we will win, and you will lose, and you will beg, and we will laugh, and we will take every last dime you have, and you will hate yourselves forever.
Hmm. Kinda stepped on my point there, Mon.

scene: Monica and Rachel's Apartment, new poker game starts
difficulty_description: 全场景对话较长，含有复杂句型及幽默成分，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: So, you gals wanna hand over your money now? That way, we don't have to go through the formality of actually playing.
Ooooh, that's fine. We'll see who has the last laugh there, monkey boy.
OK, we done with the chit-chat? Are we ready to play some serious poker?
(holding a card and waving it in front of her face) Hey you guys, look, the one-eyed jack follows me wherever I go. (they look at her) Right, OK, serious poker.
Excuse me, where are you going?
Uh... to the bathroom.
Do you want to go to the bathroom, or do you wanna play poker?
I want to go to the bathroom.
Alright, well, I'm gonna order a pizza.
Oh no-no-no-no-no, I'm still waiting to hear from that job and the store closes at nine, so you can eat then.
That's fine. I'll just have a Tic-Tac to hold me over.
Alright, Cincinnati, no blinds, everybody ante.
(looks at her cards) Yes! .... or no.
Alright. (to Rachel): Your money's mine, Green.
Your fly is open, Geller.

scene: Monica and Rachel's Apartment, poker game continues
difficulty_description: 对话包含幽默和中级词汇，适合有一定英语基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: You guys, you know what I just realized? 'Joker' is 'poker' with a 'J.' Coincidence?
Hey, that's... that's 'joincidence' with a 'C'!
Uh... Phoebe? Phoebe?
Yeah. Um... I'm out.
I'm in.
Me too.
Me too. Alright, whattaya got.
Well, you better hop outta the shower, cause... I gotta flush.

Well, well, well, hop back in bucko, cause I got four sixes! I won! I actually won! Oh my God! Y'know what? I think I'm gonna make a little Ross pile. I think that one was Ross's, and I think—oh—that one was Ross's. Yes! Well, I have got your money, and you'll never see it...
(stands up)
And your fly's still open...
(looks down)
Ha, I made you look....

scene: Monica and Rachel's Apartment, Rachel talking on the phone about job
difficulty_description: 对话含有随意和幽默感，以及对失业的反应和支持，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: Hel-lo, Rachel Green.
(mimicking Rachel) Mee mee, mee-mee mee.
(on phone) Excuse me. It's about the job.
Barbara! Hi, how are you? Uh-huh. No, I understand. Yeah. Oh, oh, come on, no, I'm fine. Don't be silly. Yeah... oh, but you know, if-if anything else opens up, plea—Hello? Hello?
Sorry, Rach.
Y'know, there's gonna be lots of other stuff.
Yeah...(sigh)....OK. Where were we? Oh, OK... five card draw, uh... jacks or better... nothing wild, everybody ante.
Look, Rachel, we don't have to do this.
Yes, we do.
Alright, check.
Check.
I'm in for fifty cents.
Call.
I'm in.
I see your fifty cents... and I raise you... five dollars.
I thought, uh... it was a fifty cent limit.
Well, I just lost a job, and I'd like to raise the bet five bucks. Does anybody have a problem with that?

scene: Monica and Rachel's Apartment, escalating poker game
difficulty_description: 紧张且幽默的赌局对话，词汇和表达较灵活，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: No, I fold.
What do you mean, you fold? Hey, come on! What is this? I thought that 'once the cards were dealt, I'm not a nice guy.' I mean, what, were you just full of it?
I'm in.
How many you want?
One.
Dealer takes two. What do you bet?
I bet two dollars.
OK... see your two... and I raise you twenty.
I see your twenty, raise you twenty-five.
See your twenty-five...and...uh, Monica, get my purse.
Rachel, there's nothing in it.
OK, then get me your purse.
OK, here you go. Good luck.

scene: Monica and Rachel's Apartment, Ross and Rachel high stakes poker
difficulty_description: 紧张激烈的赌局，高难度词汇和大段对话，适合高级学习者。

dialogues.text: I saw your twenty-five, and I raise you... seven.
...teen!
(to Joey): Joey, I'm a little shy.
That's OK, Ross, you can ask me. What?
What do you need, what do you need?
Fifteen.
Alright, here's ten.
Here, I got five, I got five.
Thank you. OK, I am calling your seventeen. What do you got?
Full house.
You got me.
(to Phoebe celebrating) Look how happy she is.

scene: Monica and Rachel's Apartment, playing Pictionary
difficulty_description: 简单词汇和日常口语表达，适合初学者。

dialogues.text: Airplane! Airport! Airport '75! Airport '77! Airport '79!
Oh, time's up.
Bye... bye... BIRDIE.
Oh!
That's a bird?
(glares at Phoebe) That's a bird!
OK, OK, it's my turn.
Go.
Bean! Bean!
The Unbearable Likeness of Being!
Yes!
That, you get? That, you get?

scene: Monica 和朋友们在 Central Perk 讨论如果拥有万能能力，他们会如何使用
difficulty_description: 此场景包含复合句和较长对话，要求学习者具备一定语法和词汇基础。

dialogues.text: Alright. Phoebe?
Okay, okay. If I were omnipotent for a day, I would want, um, world peace, no more hunger, good things for the rain-forest...And bigger boobs!
Yeah, see.. you took mine. Chandler, what about you?
Uh, if I were omnipotent for a day, I'd.. make myself omnipotent forever.
See, there's always one guy. "If I had a wish, I'd wish for three more wishes."
Hey Joey. Hi. Hey, buddy.
Hey, Joey, what would you do if you were omnipotent?
Probably kill myself!
..Excuse me?
Hey, if Little Joey's dead, then I got no reason to live!
Joey, uh- OMnipotent.
You are? Ross, I'm sorry..

scene: 一个新的场景：Monica 和 Ross 在 Central Perk 观察熟睡的 Phoebe
difficulty_description: 此场景包含简单的日常对话和一些复杂句型，适合具备一定基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: How does she do that?
I cannot sleep in a public place.
Would you look at her? She is so peaceful.
(waking and startling them) Oh! What what what! ...Hi.
It's okay, y'know, you just nodded off again.
What's going on with you?
I got no sleep last night!
Why?

My grandmother has this new boyfriend, and they're both kind of insecure in bed. Oh, and deaf. So they're constantly, like, having to reassure each other that they're having a good time. You have no idea how loud they are!
Well, if you want, you can stay with Rachel and me tonight.
Thanks.

scene: Chandler 和 Joey 进入 Central Perk，为 Ross 准备生日惊喜
difficulty_description: 此场景包含中等难度的对话，包括一些俚语和幽默感的表达。

dialogues.text: ...Ninety-five, ninety-six, ninety-seven. See, I told you! Less than a hundred steps from our place to here.
You got waaaay too much free time.
(to Ross) Hey! Here's the birthday boy! Ross, check it out: hockey tickets, Rangers-Penguins, tonight at the Garden, and we're taking you.
Happy birthday, pal!
We love you, man. (Kisses Ross)
Funny, my birthday was seven months ago.
So?
So, I'm guessing you had an extra ticket and couldn't decide which one of you got to bring a date?
Well, aren't we Mr. "The glass is half empty."
Oh my God, oh- is today the twentieth, October twentieth?
Oh, I was hoping you wouldn't remember.
Ohhh.
What's wrong with the twentieth?
Eleven days before Halloween.. all the good costumes are gone?

Today's the day Carol and I first.. consummated our physical relationship. (Joey is puzzled.) Sex. ..You know what, I-I'd better pass on the game. I think I'm just gonna go home and think about my ex-wife and her lesbian lover.
The hell with hockey, let's all do that!
(trying to stop Ross leaving) C'mon, Ross! You, me, Joey, ice, guys' night out, c'mon, whaddya say, big guy, (Pretending to punch him in the stomach.) Huh? Huh? Huh?
What are you doing?
(stops) I have no idea.
C'mon, Ross!
Alright, alright, maybe it'll take my mind off it. Do you promise to buy me a big thumb finger?
You got it.
Look-look-look-look-look, my first pay check! Look at the window, there's my name! Hi, me!
I remember the day I got my first pay check. There was a cave in in one of the mines, and eight people were killed.
Wow, you worked in a mine?
I worked in a Dairy Queen, why?

God, isn't this exciting? I earned this. I wiped tables for it, I steamed milk for it, and it was totally—(opens envelope)—not worth it. Who's FICA? Why's he getting all my money? I mean, what- Chandler, look at that.
(looking) Oh, this is not that bad.
Oh, you're fine, yeah, for a first job.
You can totally, totally live on this.
Yeah, yeah.
Oh, by the way, great service tonight.
Oh! Yeah!
Hockey!
Hockey! Hockey.

scene: Rachel 和她的朋友们在 Central Perk 重逢并谈天
difficulty_description: 对话中包含很多感叹和情感的表达，对学习者的理解能力有一定要求。

dialogues.text: (looking around) Rachel?
Oh my God!
(scream and hug each other.)
(to Phoebe) I swear I've seen birds do this on Wild Kingdom.
What are you guys doing here?
Well, we were in the city shopping, and your mom said you work here, aaand it's true!
Look at you in the apron. You look like you're in a play.
(to a pregnant Leslie) Look at you, you are so big I can't believe it!
I know. I know! I'm a duplex.
(to Joanne) So what's going on with you?
Well, guess who my dad's making partner in his firm?
(They all scream again.)
And while we're on the subject of news.. (She holds up her finger to show off her engagement ring and they all scream again.)
(to Monica) Look, look, I have elbows!
(They scream.)

scene: Chandler 和 Joey 在街上踢罐子时，Ross 忆起和前妻 Carol 的往事
difficulty_description: 场景中的对话多为反应对话和情感表达，需要中级学习者的理解能力。

dialogues.text: ...Poulet passes it up to Leetch! (Passes it to Joey.)
Leetch spots Messier in the crease- there's the pass! (He kicks it to Ross, but Ross is staring into a shop window.)
We'll take a brief time out while Messier stops to look at some women's shoes.
Carol was wearing boots just like those the night that we- we first- y'know. Fact, she, uh- she never took'em off, 'cause we-we- (off Chandler's look) Sorry. Sorry.
What?
Peach pit.
Yes, Bunny?
(points) Peach pit. That night we, uh- we had-
-Peaches?
Actually, nectarines, but basically...
(to Joey) Could've been a peach.
Then, uh, then we got dressed, and I-I... I walked her to the- (looks up, realises, and points) -the bus stop... I'm fine.
Hey, that woman's got an ass like Carol's!
(They turn to stare at him.)
What? Thought we were trying to find stuff.

scene: Central Perk, Rachel 和她的朋友们在讨论。
difficulty_description: 此场景包含稍微复杂的句型和讨论不同话题，适合具备一定英语基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: So c'mon, you guys, tell me all the dirt!
Well, the biggest news is still you dumping Barry at the altar!
Alright. Let's talk reality for a second.
Okay.
When are you coming home?
What? Guys, I'm not.
C'mon, this is us.
I'm not! This is what I'm doing now. I've got this job-
Waitressing?

Okay, I'm not just waitressing. I'm.. I, um... I write the specials on the specials board, and, uh... and I, uh... I take the uh dead flowers out of the vase... Oh, and, um, sometimes Artelle lets me put the little chocolate blobbies on the cookies.
Well. Your mom didn't tell us about the blobbies.

scene: Monica and Rachel's, Phoebe 和 Monica 在穿着睡衣，Monica 在用搅拌机做饮料，Rachel 进入房间。
difficulty_description: 包含对日常活动的描述和互动，对话长度较长，适合具备一定英语能力的学习者。

dialogues.text: Hey, Rach. How was it with your friends? (She and Phoebe scream.) Okay! How would you like some Tiki Death Punch? (She pours the contents of the blender into some glasses.)
What's that?
Weeeell, it's rum, and-
Okay. (Grabs the blender and starts to drink.)

We thought since Phoebe was staying over tonight we'd have kinda like a slumber party thing. We got some trashy magazines, we got cookie dough, we got Twister... (The phone rings and Monica answers it.)
Ooh! Ooh! And I brought Operation! But, um, I lost the tweezers, so we can't operate. But we can prep the guy!
Uh, Rach, it's the Visa card people.
Oh, God, ask them what they want.
(on phone) Could you please tell me what this is in reference to? (Listens) Yes, hold on. (To Rachel) Um, they say there's been some unusual activity on your account.
But I haven't used my card in weeks!
That is the unusual activity. Look, they just wanna see if you're okay.

They wanna know if I'm okay. Okay.. they wanna know if I'm okay, okay, let's see. Well, let's see, the FICA guys took all my money, everyone I know is either getting married, or getting promoted, or getting pregnant, and I'm getting coffee! And it's not even for me! So if that sounds like I'm okay, okay, then you can tell them I'm okay, okay?
(pauses then on the phone) Uh- Rachel has left the building, can you call back?
Alright, c'mon! (Miserably) Let's play Twister!

scene: Madison Square Garden, the guys are trying to find their seats.
difficulty_description: 此场景包含简单的句型和短对话，适合初学英语的学习者。

dialogues.text: (squeezing past people) Sorry, sorry... Uh-oh.
What? There was ice there that night with Carol? Plastic seats? Four thousand angry Pittsburgh fans?
No, actually I was just saying it looks like we're not sitting together. But now you mention it, there was ice there that night... It was the first frost...
C'mon, sit. Just sit down, sit.

scene: Monica 和 Rachel 的公寓, 大家都在客厅里。
difficulty_description: 对话涉及到对自我、未来和计划的讨论，语言表达较丰富，适合有一定英语基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: You should feel great about yourself! You're doing this amazing independence thing!
Monica, what is so amazing? I gave up, like, everything. And for what?
You are just like Jack.
...Jack from downstairs?
No, Jack and the Beanstalk.
Ah, the other Jack.

Yeah, right! See, he gave up something, but then he got those magic beans. And then he woke up, and there was this, this big plant outside his window, full of possibilities and stuff.. And he lived in a village, and you live in the Village..
Okay, but Pheebs, Pheebs, Jack gave up a cow, I gave up an orthodontist. Okay, I-I-I know, I know I didn't love him-
Oh, see, Jack did love the cow.
But see, it was a plan. Y'know, it was clear. It was figured out, and now everything's just kinda like...
Floopy?
Yeah.
So what, you're not the only one. I mean, half the time we don't know where we're going. You've just gotta figure at some point it's all gonna come together, and it's just gonna be... un-floopy.
Oh, like that's a word.
Okay, but Monica, what if- what if it doesn't come together?
...Pheebs?
Oh, well... 'cause.... you just... I don't like this question.
Okay, see, see, you guys, what if we don't get magic beans? I mean, what if all we've got are.. beans?

scene: Madison Square Garden, the guys are watching the game.
difficulty_description: 此场景包含简单且重复的句型，适合初级英语学习者。

dialogues.text: Get him! GET HIM! Get him! Get- YESSS! Not laughing now, are ya pal!
(to Ross) See buddy, that's all you need, a bunch of toothless guys hitting each other with sticks.
Pass it! Pass it!
He's open!
Shoot! Shoot! Shoot!
Hey, look, we're on that TV thing!

scene: An Emergency Room, Chandler 和 Joey 带着 Ross 进入。
difficulty_description: 对话涉及到不同的情境，具有一定的複杂性，适合有一定英语水平的学习者。

dialogues.text: (to the receptionist)'Scuse me.
(holds up her hand—she is on the phone) It says to call this number if you're not completely satisfied with this candy bar. Well, I'm not completely satisfied.
Listen, it's kind of an emergency. Well, I guess you know that, or we'd be in the predicament room.
(on phone) Hold on. (To Chandler) Fill these out, sit over there.
(jumping to his feet) Look, I don't wanna make any trouble, okay, but I'm in a lot of pain here, alright? My face is dented.
Well, you'll have to wait your turn.
Well, how long do you think it'll be?
(sarcastic) Any minute now.
Hey, this- (she gives him a look and the guys back off) Heyy...

scene: Monica 和 Rachel 的公寓, 女士们的睡衣派对继续。
difficulty_description: 对话包含关于未来的不确定性和幽默的日常互动，适合具备一定英语基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: I'm so sorry, you guys. I didn't mean to bring you down.
No, you were right. I don't have a plan. (There's a knock on the door.)
(yelling from outside) Pizza guy!
Thank God. Food. (She goes to answer the door.)
Phoebe?
What?
Do you have a plan?
I don't even have a 'pl'.
Hi, one, uh, mushroom, green pepper and onion?
(miserably) No, no, that's not what we ordered... We ordered a fat-free crust with extra cheese.
Wait, you're not 'G.Stephanopoulos?' Man, my dad's gonna kill me!
(leaping off of the couch and runs up) Wait! Did you say 'G.Stephanopoulos?'
Yeah. This one goes across the street, I must have given him yours. Oh, bonehead, bonehead!
Wait, was this a-a small mediterranean guy with curiously intelligent good looks?
Yeah, that sounds about right.
Was he wearing a stunning blue suit?
And-and a power tie?
No, pretty much just a towel.
(staggered) Oh God.
So you guys want me to take this back?
Are you nuts?! We've got George Stephanopoulos' pizza! (Rachel pays him, Monica grabs some binoculars, and runs to the window.)
Uh, Pheebs? Who's George Snuffalopagus?
Big Bird's friend.
I see pizza!
Oh, I wanna see! Lemme see! Lemme see! (She runs up and takes the binoculars.)
Hello? Who are we spying on?
White House adviser? Clinton's campaign guy? The one with the great hair, sexy smile, really cute butt?
Oh, him, the little guy? Oh, I love him!
Ooh, wait.. wait, I see a woman.
Please tell me it's his mother.
Definitely not his mother.
Oh, no...

Oh, wait, she's walking across the floor.. she's walking.. she's walking.. she's going for the pizza- (Yelling) Hey, that's not for you, bitch! (Phoebe covers her mouth with her hand walks away from the window.)

scene: Joey 在急诊室模仿曲棍球击中额头的情景，Chandler 感觉气氛紧张，于是去找接待员
difficulty_description: 此场景包含中等难度的对话，强调情感表达和幽默，同时涉及一些标准的急诊室情景用语。

dialogues.text: Excuse me, look, we've been here for over an hour, and a lot of people less sick than my friend have gone in. I mean, that guy with the toe thing? Who's he sleeping with?
Oh, c'mon Dora, don't be mad... I know we both said some things we didn't mean, but that doesn't mean we still don't love each other. Y'know, I feel like I've lost her..

scene: Monica 和 Rachel 以及 Phoebe 在阳台上谈论 George 和其他话题
difficulty_description: 此场景包含轻松的日常对话，句型简单，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: Light still out?
Yeah.
Oh. Maybe they're- napping.
Oh please, they're having sex.
Shut up!
So, whaddya think George is like?
I think he's shy.
Yeah?
Yeah. I think you have to draw him out. And then- when you do- he's a preppy animal.

scene: Ross 在急诊室继续谈论他第一次与 Carol 的夜晚
difficulty_description: 此场景包含中等难度的对话，强调对过去的回忆和幽默的表达。

dialogues.text: I remember the moonlight coming through the window- and her face had the most incredible glow.
Yes, the moon, the glow, the magical feeling, you did this part- Could I get some painkillers over here, please?
He's right, enough, already. What is the big deal about today? So you slept with her for the first time, so what? You slept with her for seven years after that.

scene: Monica 和 Rachel 的阳台，女孩们继续谈论
difficulty_description: 此场景包含适度难度的对话，涉及一些复杂的句型和幽默的交流。

dialogues.text: Okay. Okay, I got one. Do you remember that vegetarian pate that I made that you loved so much?
Uh-huh.
Well, unless goose is a vegetable...ha haaaah!
Oh! Oh! Oh! Okay, fine, fine. Now I don't feel so bad about sleeping with Jason Hurley.
What?! You slept with Jason?
You'd already broken up.
How long?
A couple hours.
Oh, that's nice!
Okay, okay, okay, I got one! Anyway- The valentine Tommy Rollerson left in your locker was really from me.
Excuse me?!
Hello? Like he was really gonna send you one? (To Phoebe) She was a big girl.
Really. Well, at least 'big girls' don't pee in their pants in seventh grade!
I was laughing! You made me laugh!
There he is! There he is!
Where?
Right- where we've been looking all night!
He is so cute!
Oh, George, baby, drop the towel!
Yeah, drop it! Drop the towel! Please drop the—(pause)—wowww.

scene: 急诊室，Ross 缺席
difficulty_description: 此场景包含适度难度的对话，涵盖了大量对过去事件的讨论和幽默。

dialogues.text: Man. Can you believe he's only had sex with one woman?
I think it's great. Y'know, it's sweet, it's romantic...
Really?
No, you kidding? The guy's a freak..
Hey, buddy.
Hi.
Oh, that's attractive.
Oh, I thought you were great in Silence of the Lambs. Oh come on, admit it! All things considered, you had fun tonight.
Fun? Where was the fun? Tell me specifically, which part was the fun part? Where's my puck?
Oh, ah- the kid has it.
The kid...? Excuse me, uh, that's, that's my puck.
I found it. Finders keepers, losers weepers.
You gotta do it, man.
Oh yeah? Well, I'm rubber, you're glue, whatever—can't do it. Listen, uh- gimme back my puck.
No.
'Yes', how about. C'mere. Gimme!
No! No!
Hey! Hey! No rough holding in my ER!
GIVE ME MY PUCK!!
...Now that was fun.

scene: Monica 和 Rachel 的公寓，Joey 和女孩们在玩 Twister
difficulty_description: 此场景包括简单的游戏对话和一些轻松的日常交流，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: Okay, Monica: Right foot red.
Could've played Monopoly, but nooooo.
Thanks.
Okay, Pheebs: Right hand blue.
Good.
Hello? Oh, uh, Rachel, it's the Visa card people.
Oh, okay. Will you take my place?
Alright. Yes, this is Rachel.
Nooo!
Hello? Oh, yeah, no, I know, I-I haven't been using it much. Oh, well, thanks, but, I'm okay, really.
Green. To the green.
I've got magic beans. Never-never mind.
To the left, to the left- aww!
Ohhh... I'm fine.

scene: Monica 和 Phoebe 在街上遇到一个吸引人的男人
difficulty_description: 此场景包含日常对话，句型简单，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: Do you think they have yesterday's daily news?
Why?
Just wanna check my horoscope, see if it was right.
Oh my God. Phoebe. Don't look now, but behind us is a guy who has the potential to break our hearts and plunge us into a pit of depression.
Where? Ooh, come to Momma.
He's coming. Be cool, be cool, be cool.
Nice hat.
Thanks.
We should do something. Whistle.
We are not going to whistle.
Come on, do it.
No!
Do it!
No!
Do it do it do it!
Woo-woo!
I can't believe you did that!

scene: Monica 和 Phoebe 在医院探望昏迷的男人
difficulty_description: 此场景包含更多描述性对话和一些复杂的句型，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: Why did I 'woo-hoo'? I mean, what was I hoping would happen? That-that he'd turn round and say 'I love that sound, I must have you now'?
I just wish there was something we could do. Hello. Hello, Coma Guy. GET UP, YOU GIRL SCOUT! UP! UP! UP!
Phoebe, what are you doing?
Maybe nobody's tried this.
I wish we at least knew his name... Look at that face. I mean, even sleeping, he looks smart. I bet he's a lawyer.
Yeah, but did you see the dents in his knuckles? That means he's artistic.
Okay, he's a lawyer, who teaches sculpting on the side. And- he can dance!
Oh! And, he's the kinda guy who, when you're talking, he's listening, y'know, and not saying 'Yeah, I understand' but really wondering what you look like naked.
I wish all guys could be like him.
I know.

scene: Monica 和 Phoebe 在 Monica 和 Rachel 的公寓告诉大家关心昏迷男子
difficulty_description: 此场景包含较长的对话和一些复杂的句型，中级学习者需具备一定语法和词汇基础。

dialogues.text: Are there no conscious men in the city for you two?
He doesn't have anyone.
Yeah, we-we feel kinda responsible.
I can't believe you said woowoo. I don't even say woowoo.
Oh, she's coming up! She's coming up!
Folks, when we come back we'll be talking about her new book, 'Euphoria Unbound': the always interesting Nora Tyler Bing. You might wanna put the kids to bed for this one.
Y'know, we don't have to watch this. Weekend At Bernie's is on Showtime, HBO, and Cinemax.
No way, forget it.
C'mon, she's your mom!
Exactly. Weekend At Bernie's! Dead guy getting hit in the groin twenty, thirty times! No?
Chandler, I gotta tell you, I love your mom's books! I love her books! I cannot get on a plane without one! I mean, this is so cool!
Yeah, well, you wouldn't think it was cool if you're eleven years old and all your friends are passing around page 79 of 'Mistress Bitch.'
C'mon, Chandler, I love your mom. I think she's a blast.
You can say that because she's not your mom.
Oh, please...
Bona sera.
Oh, hi sweetie.
When did Rigatoni get back from Rome?
Last night.
Ah, so then his plane didn't explode in a big ball of fire?... Just a dream I had- but, phew.
Hey hey hey! She's on!
Ah! Nora Bing!
...Now what is this about you-you being arrested i-in London? What is that all about?
Your mom was arrested?
Shhh, busy beaming with pride.
...This is kind of embarrassing, but occasionally after I've been intimate with a man...
Now why would she say that's embarrassing?
Shhh.
...I just get this craving for Kung Pow Chicken.
THAT'S TOO MUCH INFORMATION!!
Alright, so now you're doing this whole book tour thing, how is that going?
Oh, fine. I'm leaving for New York tomorrow, which I hate- but I get to see my son, who I love...
Awww!
This is the way that I find out. Most moms use the phone.
Y'know, don't take this wrong, I-I just don't see you a-as a mom, somehow.. I don't mean that, I don't mean that bad...
Oh no, I am a fabulous mom! I bought my son his first condoms.
...And then he burst into flames.

scene: Monica 和 Phoebe 在医院照顾昏迷男子的日常
difficulty_description: 此场景包含简短的描述性对话，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: Let's see. Congress is debating a new deficit reduction bill... the mayor wants to raise subway fares again... the high today was forty-five... and- oh, teams played sports.
What about Glen? He could be a Glen.
Nah... not-not special enough.
Ooh! How about Agamemnon?
Waaay too special.

scene: 墨西哥餐厅，Monica, Phoebe, Joey, Chandler 和他的妈妈在一起
difficulty_description: 此场景包含一些幽默和复杂的句型，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: I am famished. What do I want...
Please God don't let it be Kung Pow Chicken.
Oh, you watched the show! What'd you think?
Well, I think you need to come out of your shell just a little.
What is this dive? Only you could've picked this place.
Oooh, c'mon, shut up, it's fun. Gimme a hug.
I know I am.
Who's doing shots?
Yeah.
I'm in.
There y'go. Ross?
Uh, I'm not really a shot drinking kinda guy.
Hi! Sorry- sorry we're late, we, uh, kinda just, y'know, lost track of time.
...But a man can change.
Anyone want me to appraise anything?
Mrs. Bing, I have to tell you, I've read everything you've ever written. No, I mean it! I mean, when I read Euphoria at Midnight, all I wanted to do was become a writer.
Oh, please, honey, listen, if I can do it, anybody can. You just start with half a dozen European cities, throw in thirty euphemisms for male genitalia, and bam! You have got yourself a book.
Myyy mother, ladies and gentlemen.
Yeah, any messages for room 226?
You okay there, slugger?
Yeah, I'm fine, I'm fine.
What is with you tonight?
Nothing. Nothing nothing nothing.
Okay, thank you. It's the Italian Hand-Licker, isn't it.
No. It's the one he's licking.
She's supposed to be with you.
You're good.
Oh, Ross, listen to me. I have sold a hundred million copies of my books, and y'know why?
The girl on the cover with her nipples showing?

No. Because I know how to write men that women fall in love with. Believe me, I cannot sell a Paolo. People will not turn three hundred twenty-five pages for a Paolo. C'mon, the guy's a secondary character, a, y'know, complication you eventually kill off.
When?
He's not a hero. ...You know who our hero is.
The guy on the cover with his nipples showing?
No, it's you!
Please.
No, really, c'mon. You're smart, you're sexy...
Right.
You are gonna be fine, believe me.
Uh-oh...
Uhhhh.... I'll just pee in the street.

scene: Chandler and Joey's, Ross talks to Joey about the kiss with Chandler's mom
difficulty_description: 场景中的对话包含一些复杂句型和稍长的对话，适合具有一定语法和词汇基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Hey, is Chandler here?
Yeah.
Okay, uh, about last night, um, Chandler.. you didn't tell... Okay, 'cause I'm thinking- we don't need to tell Chandler, I mean, it was just a kiss, right? One kiss? No big deal? Right?
Right. No big deal.
Okay.
In Bizarro World!! You broke the code!
What code?
You don't kiss your friend's mom! Sisters are okay, maybe a hot-lookin' aunt... but not a mom, never a mom!
What are you guys doing out here?
Uh.. uh.. Well, Joey and I had discussed getting in an early morning racquetball game. But, um, apparently, somebody overslept.
Yeah, well, you don't have your racket.
No, no I don't, because it's being restrung, somebody was supposed to bring me one.
Yeah, well you didn't call and leave your grip size.
Okay, you guys spend waaaay too much time together.

scene: Monica and Rachel's apartment hallway, Rachel and Paolo exit, Ross and Joey join them
difficulty_description: 此场景包含简单的日常对话，句型短，词汇基础，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: Okay, I'm scum, I'm scum.
Ross, how could you let this happen?
I don't know, God, I... well, it's not like she's a regular mom, y'know? She's, she's sexy, she's...
You don't think my mom's sexy?
Well... not in the same way...
I'll have you know that Gloria Tribbiani was a handsome woman in her day, alright? You think it's easy giving birth to seven children?
Okay, I think we're getting into a weird area here...
Hey.
Hey.
What're you guys doing out here?
Well, not playing raquetball!
He forgot to leave his grip size!
He didn't get the goggles!
Well, sounds like you two have issues.
Goodbye, baby.
Ciao, bela.
Do they wait for me to do this?

scene: Chandler and Joey's apartment, Ross and Joey discuss the kiss
difficulty_description: 场景中涉及复杂对话跟随者情感表达，适合有一定英文基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: So are you gonna tell him?
Why would I tell him?
How about 'cause if you don't, his mother might.
Oh...
What are you guys doing here?
Uhhhh.... he's not even wearing a jockstrap!
...What did I ask?

scene: Hospital, Phoebe and Monica visit Coma Guy
difficulty_description: 场景中的对话情感表达细腻，并涉及文化背景，适合有一定英文基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Hi.
Hi.
What are you doing here?
Nothing, I just thought I'd stop by.. y'know, after the uh... that I.. y'know, so what are you doing here?
I'm not really here. Just thought I'd drop these off...on the way.. my way... Do you come here a lot? Without me?
No. No! No! ...So, um, do you think he's doing any better than he was this morning?
How would I know? I-I wasn't here.
Really? Not even to, um, change his PAJAMAS?!

scene: Chandler and Joey's apartment, Ross confesses to Chandler about kissing his mom
difficulty_description: 场景中的对话情感表达丰富，并涉及多层次的表达方式，适合有一定英文基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Oh my God.
You're my friend. I-I had to tell you.
I can't believe it. Paolo kissed my mom?
Yeah, um, I don't know if you noticed, but he had a lot to drink, and you know how he gets when he's drun..uh... I can't do this, I did it, it was me, I'm sorry, I kissed your mom.
What?

I was really upset about Rachel and Paolo, and I think I had too much tequila, and Nora- um, Mrs. Mom- your Bing- was just being nice, y'know, and- But nothing happened, nothing- Ask Joey, Joey, uh, came in-
You knew about this?
Uh... y'know, knowledge is a tricky thing.
I spent the entire day with you, why didn't you tell me?!
Hey, hey, hey, you're lucky I caught them when I did, or else who knows what woulda happened.
Thanks, man, big help.
I can't believe this! What the hell were you thinking?
I wasn't- I mean, I-
Y'know, of all my friends, no-one knows the crap I go through with my mom more than you.
I know-
I can't believe you did this.
Chandler-
Me neither, y'know what-
I'm still mad at you for not telling me.
What are you mad at me for?!
Chandler-
You gotta let me slam the door!
Chandler, I didn't kiss her, he did! See what happens when you break the code?
Joey-
Ah! Huh?

scene: Rachel 正在 Central Perk 写作，Monica 和 Phoebe 加入讨论
difficulty_description: 包含较长的对话和一些幽默对话，适合有一定基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Hey.
Hey.
(Reading) 'A Woman Undone, by Rachel Karen Green'.
Yeah. Thought I'd give it a shot. I'm still on the first chapter. Now, do you think his 'love stick can be liberated from its denim prison'?
(Reads) Yeah, I'd say so. And there's no 'j' in 'engorged'.
(Walks up with her guitar) Hey Rach.
Hey.
Hello.
Hello.
Going to the hospital tonight?
No, you?
No, you?
You just asked me.
Okay, maybe it was a trick question. (Plays a few chords) Um, Rachel can we do this now?
Okay. (Writes a little more) I am so hot!

scene: Joey 和 Ross 在沙发上交谈，Phoebe 表演歌曲
difficulty_description: 对话内容涉及文化背景知识和幽默，适合有一定英语水平的学习者。

dialogues.text: (To Ross, on the couch) Now, here's a picture of my mother and father on their wedding day. Now you tell me she's not a knockout.
I cannot believe we're having this conversation.
C'mon! Just try to picture her not pregnant, that's all.
(Into microphone) Central Perk is proud to present Miss Phoebe Buffay.

Thanks. Hi, um, 'kay. I'd like to start with a song that's about a man that I recently met, who's, um, come to be very important to me. (Monica gives her a look) 'Kay. (Sung:) You don't have to be awake to be my man, As long as you have brainwaves I'll be there to hold your hand. Though we just met the other day, There's something I have got to say... (She sees Monica sneaking out) Okay, thank you very much, I'm gonna take a short break! (Runs out, knocking over the mike stand)
(Into mike) Okay, that was Phoebe Buffay, everybody. Woo!

scene: Chandler 和 Ross 在讨论 Chandler 对妈妈的感情
difficulty_description: 涉及复杂的人物关系和感情表达，适合有一定基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: What was that?
Oh, uh, Phoebe just started a...
Yeah, I believe I was talking to Joey, alright there, Mother-Kisser? (Goes to the counter)
(Laughing) Mother-Kisser... (Sees Ross's look) I'll shut up.
Chandler, can I just say something? I-I know you're still mad at me, I just wanna say that there were two people there that night. Okay? Two sets of lips.
Yes, well, I expect this from her. Okay? She's always been a Freudian nightmare.
Okay, well, if she always behaves like this, why don't you say something?
Because it's complicated, it's complex- Hey, you kissed my mom!
(To the rest of Central Perk) We're rehearsing a Greek play.
That's very funny. We done now?
No! Okay, you mean, you're not gonna talk to her, you're not gonna tell her how you feel?
That would be no. Look, just because you played tonsil tennis with my mom doesn't mean you know her. Alright? Trust me, you can't talk to her.

Okay, 'you' can't, or (Points to Chandler) you can't? (Chandler grabs his finger) Okay, that's my finger. (Chandler twists it and Ross goes down on one knee) That's, that's my knee. (To Central Perk) Still doing the play. Aaah!

scene: Monica 和 Phoebe 去医院探望昏迷刚醒的病人
difficulty_description: 对话内容涉及感情和轻松玩笑，适合有一定基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Alright, whadyou do with him?
Oh! You're awake!
Look at you! How, how do you feel?
Uh, a little woozy, but basically okay.
You look good!
I feel good! ...Who are you?
Oh, sorry.
I'm Phoebe Buffay.
I'm Monica Geller. I've been taking care of you.
Well, we both have.
So, the Etch-a-Sketch is from you guys?
Well, actually it's just from me.
I got you the foot massager.
You know who shaved you? That was me.
I read to you.
I sang. (To Monica) Hah!
Well,... thanks.
Oh, my pleasure.
You're welcome.
So. I guess I'll see you around.
What, that's it?
"See you around?"
Well, what do you want me to say?
Oh, I don't know. Maybe, um, "That was nice?" Admit something to me? "I'll call you?"
Alright, I'll call you.
I don't think you mean that.
This is so typical. Y'know, we give, and we give, and we give. And then- we just get nothing back! And then one day, y'know, it's just, you wake up, and "See you around!" Let's go, Phoebe.
Y'know what? We thought you were different. But I guess it was just the coma.

scene: Chandler 和他妈妈在家讨论最近发生的事情
difficulty_description: 对话中包含关于家庭和情感的讨论，适合有一定英语基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Car's waiting downstairs, I just wanted to drop off these copies of my book for your friends. Anything you want from Lisbon?
No, just knowing you're gonna be there is enough.
Alright, well, be good, I love you. (Kisses him and goes to leave)
You kissed my best Ross! ...Or something to that effect.
(Reentering) O-kay. Look, it, it was stupid.
Really stupid.
Really stupid. And I don't even know how it happened. I'm sorry, honey, I promise it will never happen again. Are we okay now?
Yeah. No. No...

scene: Joey 和 Ross 在公寓外偷听 Chandler 和他妈妈的对话
difficulty_description: 对话包含幽默和角色之间的互动，适合有一定基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Ah, the forbidden love of a man and his door.
Shh. He did it. He told her off, and not just about the kiss, about everything.
You're kidding.
No, no. He said "When are you gonna grow up and start being a mom?"
Wow!
Then she came back with "The question is, when are you gonna grow up and realise I have a bomb?"
'Kay, wait a minute, are you sure she didn't say "When are you gonna grow up and realise I am your mom?"
That makes more sense.
So, what's going on now?
I dunno, I've been standing here spelling it out for you! (Goes back to the door) I don't hear anything. Oh, wait, wait, wait. (Looks through the spyhole)
Whaddya see?
Hard to tell, they're so tiny and upside-down. Wait, wait. They're walking away... they're walking away... No, no they're not, they're coming right at us! Run! Run!

scene: Chandler 的妈妈离开后，Chandler 和 Ross 谈论他们的对话
difficulty_description: 对话涉及对情感的表达和有关友谊的探讨，适合有一定基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Hey.
You mean that?
Yeah, why not. (They shake hands) So I told her.
Yeah? How'd it go?
Awful. Awful. Couldn'ta gone worse.
Well, howdya feel?
Pretty good! I told her.
Well, see? So, maybe it wasn't such a bad idea, y'know, me kissing your mom, uh? Huh? (Wags his finger at Chandler, then puts it down) But.. we don't have to go down that road.

scene: Rachel 分发她的书章节草稿给朋友们
difficulty_description: 对话包含幽默感和一些复杂句型，适合有一定程度的学习者。

dialogues.text: Okay. Now this is just the first chapter, and I want your absolute honest opinion. Oh, oh, and on page two, he's not 'reaching for her heaving beasts'.
What's a 'niffle'?
You usually find them on the 'heaving beasts'.
Alright, alright, so I'm not a great typist...
Wait, did you get to the part about his 'huge throbbing pens'? Tell ya, you don't wanna be around when he starts writing with those!
Alright, that's it! Give it back! That's it!
Nooo!

scene: Friends are waiting in the hospital for Carol and Susan to arrive
difficulty_description: 此场景包含复杂句型和较长对话，要求学习者具备一定语法和词汇基础。

dialogues.text: She's not here yet. She's not here. She's having my baby and she's not here.
I'm sure everything's fine. Has her water broke yet?
I don't know, but when I spoke to her, she said she had already passed the mucus plug.
Do we have to know about that?
Joey, what are you gonna do when you have a baby?
I'm gonna be in the waitin' room, handing out cigars.
Yes, Joey's made arrangements to have his baby in a movie from the 50's.
God, I don't believe this. She could be giving birth in the cab.
Oh, Ross, relax. It's probably like two dollars for the first contraction, and then fifty cents for each additional contraction.
What, it's ok when Chandler does it?
You have to pick your moments.
Did I miss it, did I miss it?
She's not even here yet.
What's with the guitar?
I just thought we might be here for awhile. You know, things might get musical.
(to Carol) Where the hell have you been?
We stopped at the gift shop.
I was looking at stuffed animals, and Susan wanted a Chunky.
Susan wanted a Chunky. We're having a baby, ok, a baby, you don't stop for Chunkys.
I used to have that bumper sticker.
(to Rachel) You see what I mean.

scene: Carol's Hospital Room, Carol is in labor
difficulty_description: 此场景涉及一些医用术语和幽默表达，适合具备中级英语水平的学习者。

dialogues.text: Stopped for a Chunky.
Let it go, Ross.
I got an extra one. You want this?
(weakly) No.
Hey, how's my favorite parenting team doing?
Dr. Franzblau, hi.
So, I understand you're thinking of having a baby? Well, I see you're nine months pregnant. That's a good start. How you doing with your contractions?
Oh, I love them. Each one's like a little party in my uterus.
They're every four minutes and last 55 seconds.
59 seconds. (holds up his watch) Quartz, ha.
Swiss quartz, ha, ha.
Am I allowed to drink anything?
Ice chips, just ice chips. They're at the nurses' station.
I'll get it.
No, I'm getting it. I'll be right back.
I got it—I'm getting it!
Hi, I thought you might like some ice chips.
Thanks.
And if you need anything else, I—(notices the handsome Dr. Franzblau)—do not believe we've met. Hi. I'm, uh, Rachel Green. I'm Carol's... ex-husband's... sister's roommate.
It is nice to meet you. I'm Dr. Franzblau. I'm your roommate's... brother's... ex-wife's obstetrician.
Oh, that's funny!

scene: The Waiting Room, Chandler and Monica are talking, Joey meets Lydia
difficulty_description: 此场景包含简单的对话和幽默表达，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: I want a baby.
Mmmm. Not tonight, honey. I got an early day tomorrow.
Get up. Come on. Let's get some coffee.
Oh, ok, 'cause we never do that.
(to the screen) Shoot! Shoot! Shoot! Shoot, or just fall down. That's good too.
Knick fan?
Oh, yeah.
Oh, boy, do they suck.
Hey, listen, lady....(sees that she's pregnant)...whoa.
Look, look at your man, Ewing. Nice shot. You know what, he couldn't hit water if he was standing on a boat.
Oh yeah? And who do you like?
The Celtics.
The Celtics? Ha. They couldn't hit a boat if...wait. They suck, alright?
Oh, shut up. You know, it's a rebuilding year. You... waah!
Wha? Wha..aa? Let me get the father. Hey, we need a father over here! We need a father!
There is no father.
Oh, oh, oh, sorry.
Ok, that's ok. I'm fine. I'm... oh!
Oh, uh, ok. Right this way. All the other pregnant women seem to be goin' in here.
Ok.

scene: Phoebe在候诊室里演唱歌曲，Chandler、Monica和Ross在一旁。
difficulty_description: 此场景主要包含简单的日常对话和歌曲歌词，句型短，词汇基础，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: They're tiny and chubby and so sweet to touch, and soon they'll grow up and resent you so much. Now they're yelling at you and you don't know why, you cry and you cry and you cry. And you cry and you cry and you cry...
(gives Phoebe a dollar) Thanks, Ross.
Yeah. I'm paying you to stop.
Ok.

scene: 一位妇女带着新生的双胞胎经过。
difficulty_description: 此场景包含简单的日常感叹对话，句型短，词汇基础，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: Oh, look, twins. Hi, guys. Oh, cute, cute.
No fair. I don't even have one. How come they get two?
You'll get one.
Oh yeah? When?
All right. I'll tell you what. When we're 40, if neither one of us are married, what do you say you and I get together and have one?
Why won't I be married when I'm 40?
Oh, no, no. I just meant hypothetically.
Ok, hypothetically, why won't I be married when I'm 40?
No, no, no.
What is it? Is there something fundamentally unmarriable about me?
(trapped) Uh, uh.
Well?
Dear God! This parachute is a knapsack! (throws himself over the back of the chair he was sitting in)

scene: Rachel穿着礼服进来。
difficulty_description: 此场景包含较长的对话，且涉及到对医生的讨论，词汇量适中，要求学习者具备基本的语法和词汇基础。

dialogues.text: Hey.
Hey. Ooh, look at you, dressy-dress.
Did you go home and change?
Yeah, well, it's an important day. I wanna look nice. Um, has uh Dr. Franzblau been by?
No, I haven't seen him.
Well, where is he? He is supposed to be here. (Pause) What if the baby needs him?
Rachel, what is the deal with you and doctors, anyway? Was, like, your father a doctor?
Yeah, why?
No reason. (turns around, makes an 'Oh my God' gesture with his eyes)

scene: Joey和Lydia在医院房间里，Lydia正在和她的母亲通电话。
difficulty_description: 此场景包括电话对话和面对面对话，句型较复杂，相对词汇量较大，适合具有一定基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Mom, we've been through this. No, I'm not calling him. I don't care if it is his kid, the guy's a jerk. No, I'm not alone. Joey's here. (pause) What do you mean, Joey who? (covers the phone, to Joey) Joey who?
Tribbiani.
Joey Tribbiani. Yes, ok. Hold on. (to Joey) She wants to talk to you. Take the phone.
(takes phone) Hi, yeah, it's me. (Listens) Oh, no no no, we're just friends. (Listens) Yeah, I'm single. (Listens) 25. (Listens) An actor. (Listens) Hello?
She's not much of a phone person.
Yeah, so, uh, so, uh, what's the deal with this father guy, I mean, if someone was havin' my baby somewhere, I'd wanna know about it, you know?
Hey, Knick fan, am I interested in your views on fatherhood? Uh, no.
Ok, look, maybe I should just go.
Maybe you should.
Good luck, and uh, take care, huh?
(returns) You know what the Celtics problem is? They let the players run the team.
Oh, that is so not true.
Oh, it is.
It isn't.
It is.
Isn't!

scene: Carol的医院房间里，Ross和Susan在指导Carol。
difficulty_description: 此场景涉及生孩子的过程，包括较长的对话和一些专业术语，适合有一定基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Breathe.
Breathe.
Breathe.
Breathe.
Breathe.
Breathe.
You're gonna kill me!
15 more seconds, 14, 13, 12...
Count faster.
It's gonna be ok, just remember, we're doing this for Jordie. Just keep focusing on Jordie.
Who the hell is Jordie?
Your son.
No-no-no. I don't have a son named Jordie. We all agreed, my son's name is Jamie.
Well, Jamie was the name of Susan's first girlfriend, so we went back to Jordie.
What? Whoa, whoa whoa whoa, what do you mean, back to Jordie? We never landed on Jordie. We just passed by it during the whole Jessy, Cody, Dylan fiasco.
Ow, ow, ow, ow, leg cramp, leg cramp, leg cramp.
I got it.
I got it.
I got it! Hey, you get to sleep with her, I get the cramps.
No, you don't.
All right, that's it. I want both of you out.
Why?
He started it!
No, you started it.
You did!
I don't care. I am trying to get a person out of my body here, and you're not making it any easier.
But...
Now go!
(to Susan) Thanks a lot.
(to Ross) See what you did.
(to Carol) Yeah, listen...
Out!

scene: Ross和Susan愤怒地走出Carol的医院房间。
difficulty_description: 此场景涉及到对出生过程和情绪冲突的讨论，需有一定的词汇和表达能力。

dialogues.text: Please. This is so your fault.
How, how is this my fault?
Look, Carol never threw me out of a room before you came along.
Yeah? Well, there's a lot of things Carol never did before I came along.
You tryin' to be clever? A funny lady?
You know what your problem is? You're threatened by me.
Oh, I'm threatened by you?
Yes.

Hey, hey, ok, all right, that's it! Get in here. Come on. My god, you guys, I don't believe you. There are children coming into the world in this very building and your negative fighting noises are not the first thing they should be hearing. So just stop all the yelling, just stop it!
Yeah, Susan.
Don't make me do this again, I don't like my voice like this.
Ok, who wants to hear something ironic?

scene: Lydia的医院房间，Joey在帮助Lydia进行分娩，一位护士也在场。
difficulty_description: 此场景涉及分娩过程的对话和Joey的恐慌，词汇和表达相对复杂，适合有一定基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Breathe, breathe, breathe...
Oh, no.
Ew! What is that? Something exploded!
It's just her water breaking. Calm down, will you?
(panicked) Water breaking, what do you mean? What's that, water breaking?
(to Joey) Breathe, breathe, breathe.

scene: Ross 和 Susan 在扫帚柜尝试出去
difficulty_description: 此场景包含简单的求救对话，句式短，词汇基础，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: Help!
I'm having a baby in here! Ok, everyone stand back.
Ow.

scene: Carol 的病房，Rachel 和 Dr. Franzblau 在她身边
difficulty_description: 本场景包含较为复杂的对话结构，涉及对话安抚和叙述，适合有一定英语基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Are they here yet?
No, honey, they're not, but don't worry, because we are going to find them, and until we do, we are all here for you, ok?
Ok.
Ok?
Ok.
Ok, so anyway, you were telling me about Paris, it sounds fascinating.
It really was. There was this great little pastry shop right by my hotel.
There you go, dear.

scene: Lydia 的病房，Joey 在帮她分娩
difficulty_description: 本场景包含积极鼓励的对话和细节描述，适合有一定英语基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Come on, Lydia, you can do it. Push! Push 'em out, push 'em out, harder, harder. Push 'em out, push 'em out, way out! Let's get that ball and really move, hey, hey, ho, ho.
I was just—yeah, right. Push! Push!

scene: 扫帚柜，Ross 拿起一个吸尘器对着门
difficulty_description: 此场景包含单词重复和简单短语，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: What're you gonna do, suck the door open?
Help! Help!
They found their bodies the very next day, they found their bodies the very next... la la la la la la.
Help!

scene: 等候室，Monica 在和她妈妈打电话，Chandler 在她后面
difficulty_description: 本场景包含多角色互动和情感表达，适合具有中级英语水平的学习者。

dialogues.text: Now, Mom, everything's going fine, really. Yeah, Ross is great. He's uh, he's in a whole other place. No, he's gone. No no, you don't have to fly back, really. What do you mean this might be your only chance? Would you stop? I'm only 26, I'm not even thinking about babies yet.
Where have you been?
Oh, just had a baby.
Mazel tov!

scene: 等候室，Rachel 和 Dr. Franzblau 正在喝咖啡
difficulty_description: 本场景包含关于个人生活的复杂对话和询问，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: I don't know, could be an hour, could be three, but relax, she's doing great. So, uh, tell me, are you currently involved with anyone?
No, no, not at the moment, no, I'm not. Are you?
No, it's hard enough to get women to go out with me.
Right, yeah, I've heard that about cute doctors.
No, no, really. I suppose it's because I spend so much time, you know, where I do.
Oh.
I try not to let my work affect my personal life, but it's hard, when you... do what I do. It's like uh...Well, for instance, what do you do?
I'm a waitress.
Ok, all right, well aren't there times when you come home at the end of the day, and you're just like, 'if I see one more cup of coffee'...
Yeah. Gotcha.
I'm gonna go check up on your friend.
Ok. That's fine.

scene: Lydia 的病房外面，Joey 拿着气球，听到孩子的父亲到了
difficulty_description: 本场景包含父母问答和轻松对话，适合有一定英语基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: So how did you know I was even here?
Your mom called me. So is this her?
No, this is a loaner.
I'm sorry you had to do this by yourself.
I wasn't by myself. I had a doctor, a nurse, and a helper guy.
So, did you see who won the game?
Yeah, the Knicks by 10. They suck.
Yeah, they're not so bad.

scene: 扫帚柜，Ross 和 Susan 正在尝试用信用卡开门无果
difficulty_description: 本场景包含情感对话和冲突，适合有一定语言能力的学习者。

dialogues.text: Come on, come on. Damnit, damnit, damnit, damnit. This is all your fault. This is supposed to be, like, the greatest day of my life, y'know? My son is being born, and I should be in there, you know, instead of stuck in a closet with you.
The woman I love is having a baby today. I've been waiting for this just as much as you have.

No no no, believe me. No one has been waiting for this as much as I have, ok? And you know what the funny thing is? When this day is over, you get to go home with the baby, ok? Where does that leave me?
You get to be the baby's father. Everyone knows who you are. Who am I? There's Mother's Day, there's Father's Day, there's no... Lesbian Lover Day.
Every day is Lesbian Lover Day.
This is so great.
You wanna explain that?

I mean, well, 'cause when I was growing up, you know my dad left, and my mother died, and my stepfather went to jail, so I barely had enough pieces of parents to make one whole one. And here's this little baby who has like three whole parents who care about it so much that they're fighting over who gets to love it the most. And it's not even born yet. It's just, it's just the luckiest baby in the whole world. I'm sorry, you were fighting.

scene: Carol 的病房，她准备生了，除了 Phoebe，Ross 和 Susan，所有人都在
difficulty_description: 本场景包含突发紧急状况和多个参与者的互动对话，适合具有中级英语水平的学习者。

dialogues.text: Where are they?
I'm sure they'll be here soon.
Yeah, honey, they wouldn't miss this.
Relax. You're only at nine centimeters. And the baby's at zero station.
You are really frightening me.
Somebody wanna help me, tryin' to rip out my heart.
Uh, that's great. Anybody seen a nipple?
All right, ten centimeters, here we go.
All right, honey, time to start pushing.
But they're not here yet!
I'm sorry, I can't tell the baby to wait for them.
Oh, god.

scene: 扫帚柜，Ross 用扫帚打开了天花板的通风口，Phoebe 穿上清洁工制服准备进入通风口
difficulty_description: 本场景包含幽默对话和简单描述，适合具有一定英语水平的学习者。

dialogues.text: Ok, got the vent open.
Hi, I'm Ben. I'm hospital worker Ben. It's Ben... to the rescue!
Ben, you ready? All right, gimme your foot. Ok, on three, Ben. One, two, three. Ok, That's it, Ben.
What do you see?
Well, Susan, I see what appears to be a dark vent. Wait. Yes, it is in fact a dark vent.
Phoebs, It's open! It's open!
Wait! You forgot your legs!

scene: Carol 的病房，Ross 和 Susan 赶了过来
difficulty_description: 本场景包含急促对话和紧急指令，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: Push, push!
We're here!
Where have you been?
Long story, honey.
All right, Carol, I need you to keep pushing. I need—Excuse me, could I have this?
All right, all right, there's a few too many people in this room, and there's about to be one more, so anybody who's not an ex-husband or a lesbian life partner, out you go!
Good luck!
Let me ask you, do you have to be Carol's lesbian life partner?
Out!
All right, he's crowning. Here he comes.
Let me see, I gotta see, I gotta see. Oh, a head. Oh, it's, it's huge. Carol, how are you doing this?
Not.... helping!
You're doing great, you're doing fine.
Hello! Oh, sorry.
What do you see? What do you see?

We got a head, we got shoulders, we got arms, we got, oh, look at the little fingers, oh, and a chest, and a stomach. It's a boy, definitely a boy! All right! Ok, legs, knees, and feet. Oh, oh. He's here. He's a person.
Oh, look at that.
What does he look like?
Kinda like my uncle Ed, covered in Jell-o.
Really?
You guys, he's beautiful!
Oh, thanks, Pheebs!

scene: Carol 在产房抱着婴儿，大家为婴儿起名字
difficulty_description: 此场景包含了家人和朋友的互动，对话较为真实且句型适中，对初级到中级学习者有挑战。

dialogues.text: No shouting, but we still need a name for this little guy.
(thinking) How 'bout Ben?
I like Ben.
Ben. Ben. Ben's good. How come you never mentioned Ben before?
We uh, we just cooked it up.
That's what we were off doing.
Hi.
Hey.
Can we come in?
(to Ben) I know, I know. Everybody, there's someone I'd like you to meet. Yeah. This is Ben. Ben, this is everybody.
Susan, he looks just like you.
Thanks.
Oh, god, I can't believe one of us actually has one of these.
I know, I still am one of these.
Ross, can I?
The head, the head. You gotta...
(getting choked up) Hi, Ben. Hi. I'm your Aunt Monica. Yes I am. I'm your Aunt Monica. I...I will always have gum.

scene: 医院里，镜头模拟 Ben 的视角
difficulty_description: 此场景以简单短句为主，对话内容温馨，有助于初学者理解和练习。

dialogues.text: Ben, I want you to know that there may be some times when I may not be around, like this. (walks out of the picture) But I'll still always come back, like this. (returns) And sometimes I may be away longer, like this. (walks away) But I'll still always come back, like this.
And sometimes, I'll want you to steal third, and I'll go like this. (Does a baseball sign.)
He is so amazing.
Oh, I know. Look at him.
Ben, Ben, hey Ben. Nothing. I don't think that's his name.
Oh, look, look, he's closing his eyes. (screen goes blank) Look, he's opening his eyes. (picture comes back)
He doesn't do much, does he?
No, this is pretty much it.
You guys wanna get some coffee?
Yeah.
All right, I'll see you guys later.
Oh, look, he's closing his eyes again.

scene: Rachel 在 Central Perk 介绍 Phoebe
difficulty_description: 此场景包含简单的日常对话，句型短，词汇基础，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: Everybody? Shh, shhh. Uhhh... Central Perk is proud to present the music of Miss Phoebe Buffay.
Hi. Um, I want to start with a song thats about that moment when you suddenly realize what life is all about. OK, here we go. (plays a chord, then the lights go out) OK, thank you very much.

scene: Chandler 在 ATM 的大厅里被困
difficulty_description: 此场景包含简单的独白，句型短，词汇基础，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: Oh, great. This is just...
Oh my God, it's that Victoria's Secret model. Something... something Goodacre.

She's right, it's Jill. Jill Goodacre. Oh my God. I am trapped in an ATM vestibule with Jill Goodacre! (pause) Is it a vestibule? Maybe it's an atrium. Oh, yeah, that is the part to focus on, you idiot!
Jill says vestibule... I'm going with vestibule.
Oh! Some guy. Some guy. 'Hey Jill, I saw you with some guy last night. Yes, he was some guy.
Alright, alright, alright. It's been fourteen and a half minutes and you still have not said one word. Oh God, do something. Just make contact, smile!
There you go!
You're definitely scaring here.
Yeah, about 300 guys I went to high school with. Yeah, thanks.

scene: Monica 和朋友们在公寓里讨论停电
difficulty_description: 此场景包含较长的对话，涉及较多的人物和稍复杂的句型，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: Wow, this is so cool, you guys. The entire city is blacked out!
Mom says it's all of Manhattan, parts of Brooklyn and Queens, and they have no idea when it's coming back on.
Wow, you guys, this is big.
Pants and a sweater? Why, mom? Who am I gonna meet in a blackout? Power company guys? Eligible looters? Could we talk about this later? OK. (hangs up)
Can I borrow the phone? I want to call my apartment and check on my grandma. What's my number?
Well, I never call me.

scene: Monica 和朋友们在公寓里讨论奇怪地点的经历
difficulty_description: 此场景包含较长的对话，涉及较多的人物和复杂的句型，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: Alright, somebody.
OK, I'll go. OK, senior year of college... on a pool table.
Whoooaa!
That's my sister.
OK... my weirdest place would have to be... the women's room on the second floor of the New York CIty public library.
Oh my God! What were you doing in a library?
Pheebs, what about you?
Oh... Milwaukee.
Um... Ross?
Disneyland, 1989, 'It's a Small World After All.'
No way!
The ride broke down. So, Carol and I went behind a couple of those mechanical Dutch children... then they fixed the ride, and we were asked never to return to the Magic Kingdom.
Oh, Rachel.
Oh come on, I already went.
You did not go!
Come on.
The weirdest place would have to be... oh, the foot of the bed.
Step back.
We have a winner!

scene: Ross 和 Rachel 在讨论激情和关系
difficulty_description: 此场景包含较长的对话，涉及情感表达和复杂句型，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: I just never had a relationship with that kind of passion, you know, where you have to have somebody right there, in the middle of a theme park.
Well, it was the only thing to do there that didn't have a line.
There, well, see? Barry wouldn't even kiss me on a miniature golf course.
Come on.
No, he said we were holding up the people behind us.
And you didn't marry him because...?
I mean, do you think there are people who go through life never having that kind of...
Probably. But you know, I'll tell you something. Passion is way overrated.
Yeah right.

It is. Eventually, it kind of... burns out. But hopefully, what you're left with is trust, and security, and... well, in the case of my ex-wife, lesbianism. So, you know, for all of those people who miss out on that passion... thing, there's all that other good stuff.
OK.
But, um... I don't think that's going to be you.
You don't.
Uh-uh. See, I see.... big passion in your future.
Really?
Mmmm.
You do?
I do.
Oh Ross, you're so great.

scene: Joey 提醒 Ross 自己和 Rachel 的关系处于友谊区
difficulty_description: 此场景包含较长的对话，涉及复杂的句型和情感表达，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: It's never gonna happen.
What?
You and Rachel.
What? Why not?
Because you waited too long to make your move, and now you're in the friend zone.
No, no, no. I'm not in the zone.
Ross, you're mayor of the zone.
I'm taking my time, alright? I'm laying the groundwork. Yeah. I mean, every day I get just a little bit closer to...
Priesthood! Look Ross, I'm telling you, she has no idea what you're thinking. If you don't ask her out soon you're going to end up stuck in the zone forever.
I will, I will. See, I'm waiting for the right moment.
What? What, now?
Yeeeeaaaahhh! What's messing you up? The wine? The candles? The moonlight? You've just got to go up to her and say, 'Rachel, I think that...'
Shhhh!
What are you shushing?
We're shushing... because... we're trying to hear something. Listen.
Don't you hear that?
Ahhhh!
See?
Huh.

scene: Chandler 在 ATM 大堂遇到 Jill Goodacre
difficulty_description: 此场景包含简单的问答对话，词汇基础，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: Would you like some gum?
Um, is it sugarless?
(checks) Sorry, it's not.
Oh, then no thanks. What the hell was that? Mental note: If Jill Goodacre offers you gum, you take it. If she offers you mangled animal carcass, you take it.

scene: Monica 的公寓，Phoebe 唱歌，Ross 和 Joey 谈论 Ross 的计划
difficulty_description: 此场景包含较长的对话和多轮讨论，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: (singing) New York City has no power, and the milk is getting sour. But to me it is not scary, 'cause I stay away from dairy.... la la la, la la, la la... (she writes the lyrics down)
(to Joey) OK, here goes.
Are you going to do it?
I'm going to do it.
Do you want any help?
You come out there, you're a dead man.
Good luck, man.
Thanks. (Joey hugs him) OK.
OK. (Ross goes out on the balcony to talk to Rachel)
(walks in, starts to go out on the balcony)
Hey, where are you going?
Outside.
You can't go out there.
Why not?
Because of... the reason.
And that would be?
I, um, can't tell you.
Joey, what's going on?
OK, you've got to promise that you'll never, ever tell Ross that I told you.
About what?
He's planning your birthday party.
Oh my God! I love him!
(as Phoebe enters) You'd better act surprised.
About what?
My surprise party!
What surprise party?
Oh stop it. Joey already told me.
Well, he didn't tell me.
Hey, don't look at me. This is Ross's thing.
This is so typical. I'm always the last one to know everything.
No, you are not. We tell you stuff.
Yuh-huh! I was the last one to know when Chandler got bitten by the peacock at the zoo. I was the last one to know when you had a crush on Joey when he was moving in.
(gestures at Phoebe to shut up)
Looks like I was second to last.

scene: Monica 和 Rachel 的阳台上，Ross 和 Rachel 谈话
difficulty_description: 此场景包含互动性较强的对话，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: Hmmm... this is so nice.
OK, I have a question. Well, actually, it's not so much a question as.. more of a general wondering... ment.
OK.
OK. Here goes. For a while now, I've been wanting to, um...
Ohhh!!!!
Yes, yes, that's right...
Oh, look at the little cat!
What?
(a small kitten is on the roof behind Ross)
Ow! (the cat jumps on his shoulders)

scene: Monica 的公寓内部，Monica，Joey 和 Phoebe 唱歌，两人在外面努力摆脱猫
difficulty_description: 此场景包含相对简短的歌词，简单的复述，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: (singing) I'm on top of the world, looking down on creation and the only explanation I can find, is the wonders I've found ever since...

scene: Monica 和 Rachel 的公寓内部，Monica 给 Ross 处理伤口
difficulty_description: 此场景包含处理受伤对话，具有情感色彩，适合具备一定基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: (to Ross) This is just Bactine. It won't hurt.
(flinches in pain)
Sorry, that was wax.
Oh, poor little Tooty is scared to death. We should find his owner.
Why don't we just put 'poor little Tooty' out in the hall?
During a blackout? He'd get trampled!
(nonchalantly) Yeah?

scene: ATM 大堂，Chandler 再次尝试要口香糖
difficulty_description: 此场景包含持续性的独白和自嘲，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: You know, on second thought, gum would be perfection.
(Jill gives him a stick of gum, and a strange look)
'Gum would be perfection'? 'Gum would be perfection.' Could have said 'gum would be nice,' or 'I'll have a stick,' but no, no, no, no. For me, gum is perfection. I loathe myself.

scene: Monica 的楼道中，Phoebe 和 Rachel 找猫的主人
difficulty_description: 此场景包含寻找主人的对话，情境复杂化，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: (stops at a door) Oh no, the Mendels, they hate all living things, right?
Oh.
(they knock at the next door, Mr. Heckles answers) Hi. We just found this cat and we're looking for the owner.
Er, yeah, it's mine.
(trying to hold back the struggling cat) He seems to hate you. Are you sure?
Yeah, it's my cat. Give me my cat.
Wait a minute. What's his name?
Ehhhh... B-Buttons.
Bob Buttons?
Mmm. Bob Buttons. Here, Bob Buttons.
(the cat runs away from her) Oooh! You are a very bad man!
(as Phoebe and Rachel leave) You owe me a cat.

scene: Rachel 独自寻找猫的主人，遇见意大利帅哥 Paolo
difficulty_description: 此场景包含文化背景丰富的对话，适用于有一定口语和听力基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Here, kitty-kitty. Here kitty-kitty. Where did you go, little kitty-kitty-kitty? Here kitty-kitty-kitty-kitty...
(something Italian)
Wow.
(she exhales in amazement, blowing the candle out)

scene: Monica 和 Rachel 的公寓，Rachel 带着 Paolo 进屋
difficulty_description: 此场景包含介绍和多轮谈话，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: (rolling) Lucky sixes....
(entering with Paolo, arm in arm) Everybody, this is Paolo. Paolo, I want you to meet my friends. This is Monica.
(smitten) Hi!
And Joey....
Hi!
And Ross.
Hi!
(something in Italian)
(proudly) He doesn't speak much English.
(pointing at game) Monopoly!
Look at that!
(jealous) So, um... where did Paolo come from?
Oh... Italy, I think.
No, I mean tonight, in the building. Suddenly. Into our lives.
Well, the cat... the cat turned out to be Paolo's cat!
That, that is funny... (to Joey).... and Rachel keeps touching him.
(enters) Alright. I looked all over the building and I couldn't find the kitty anywhere.
Oh, I found him. He was Paolo's cat.
Ah! Well! There you go! Last to know again! And I'm guessing... since nobody told me... this is Paolo.
Ah, Paolo, this is Phoebe.
(something in Italian, he is apparently attracted to Phoebe)
(smiling) You betcha!

scene: Chandler 在 ATM vestibule 动作搞笑的一段
difficulty_description: 此场景包含较多独白与肢体语言的表达，句型及词汇稍有复杂，适合有基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Ah, let's see. What next? Blow a bubble. A bubble's good. It's got a... boyish charm, it's impish. Here we go.
Nice going, imp. OK, it's OK. All I need to do is reach over and put it in my mouth.
Good save! We're back on track, and I'm... ..chewing someone else's gum. This is not my gum. Oh my God! Oh my God! And now you're choking.
Are you alright?
My God, you're choking! That better?
Yes... thank you. That was... that was....
Perfection?

scene: Monica 和朋友们在 Monica and Rachel's 跟 Rachel 交流 Paolo 的浪漫举动，Ross 嘲笑 Paolo
difficulty_description: 此场景涉及多角色对话，句型和词汇具备一定复杂度，适合有基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: (something romantic in Italian about Rachel and the stars)
Blah blah blah, blah blah blah... blah blaaaaaah....
I have absolutely no idea.
That's... that's classic.
Oh my God, you guys, what am I doing? What am I doing? This is so un-me!
If you want, I'll do it.
I know, I just want to bite his bottom lip. But I won't.
God, the first time he smiled at me... those three seconds were more exciting than three weeks in Bermuda with Barry.
You know, did you ride mopeds? 'Cause I've heard... oh, I see... it's not about that right now. OK.
Y'know, I know it's totally superficial and we have absolutely nothing in common, and we don't even speak the same language but Goooooooddddddd....

scene: Ross 试图和 Paolo 谈话，以确保他和 Rachel 的关系
difficulty_description: 此场景涉及文化与情感的表达，有一定的词汇量和语法复杂度，适合有基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Paolo. Hi.
Ross!
Listen. Um, listen. Something you should... know... um, Rachel and I... we're kind of a thing.
Thing?
Thing, yes. Thing.
Ah, you... have the sex?

No, no, no. Technically the... sex is not... being had, but that's... see, that's not the point. See, um, the point is that... Rachel and I should be, er, together. You know, and if you get in the.... um...
Bed?
No, no, that's not where I was going. Er, if you get in the... way, of us becoming a thing, then I would be, well, very sad.
Oh!
Yeah! Se vice?
Si.
So you do know a little English.
Poco... a leetle.
Do you know the word crapweasel?
No.
That's funny, because you know, you are a huge crapweasel!

scene: 黑灯烛火的对话和 Ross 的心痛
difficulty_description: 简单的对话，适用于初级学习者。

dialogues.text: Oh, look look look. The last candle's about to burn out. 10, 9, 8, 7... negative 46, negative 47, negative 48....
Thank you.
Thanks.
Kinda... spooky without any lights.
(does a maniacal laugh) Bwah-hah-hah!
OK, guys, guys? I have the definitive one. Mwwwooooo-hah-hah...
Oh.. oh... oh.
Hey Ross. This probably isn't the best time to bring it up, but you have to throw a party for Monica.

scene: Chandler 和 Jill 在 ATM vestibule 完成停电的体验
difficulty_description: 包含简单的词汇和日常对话，适合初学者。

dialogues.text: Well, this has been fun.
Yes. Yes, thanks for letting me use your phone... and for saving my life.
Well, goodbye Chandler. I had a great blackout. See ya.
Hi, um, I'm account number 7143457. And, uh, I don't know if you got any of that, but I would really like a copy of the tape.

scene: Chandler 在 Monica 和 Rachel 家无意中看见了 Rachel 的裸体后发生的尴尬对话
difficulty_description: 此场景涉及一些复杂的句子结构和语法，适合具备一定英语基础的学习者

dialogues.text: That is it! You just barge in here, you don't knock
I'm sorry!
You have no respect for anybody's privacy!
Rachel, wait, wait.
No, you wait! This is ridiculous!
Can I just say one thing?
What? What?!
That's a relatively open weave and I can still see your... nipular areas.
Oh!!

scene: Phoebe 和她的男朋友 Roger 在 Central Perk 与 Rachel 和 Monica 交谈
difficulty_description: 该场景包含简单的日常对话和幽默对话，适合初级英语学习者

dialogues.text: Oh, honey, honey, tell them the story about your patient who thinks things are, like, other things. Y'know? Like, the phone rings and she takes a shower.
That's pretty much it.
Oops!
But you tell it really well, sweetie.
Thanks. Okay, now go away so we can talk about you.
Okay. I'll miss you.
Isn't he great?
He's so cute! And he seems to like you so much.
I know, I know. So sweet... and so complicated. And for a shrink, he's not too shrinky, y'know?
So, you think you'll do it on his couch?
Oh, I don't know, I don't know. I think that's a little weird, y'know? Vinyl.
Okaaay. (To the guys, on the couch) Any of you guys want anything else?
Oh, yes, could I have one of those. (Points)
No, I'm sorry, we're all out of those. Anybody else?
Okay.
Did I, uh, did I miss something?
No, she's still upset because I saw her boobies.
You what? Wh what were you doing seeing her boobies?
It was an accident. Not like I was across the street with a telescope and a box of donuts.
Okay, okay, could we change the subject, please?
Yeah, 'cause hello, these are not her boobies, these are her breasts.
Okay, Pheebs, I was hoping for more of a change.
Y'know, I don't know why you're so embarrassed, they were very nice boobies.
Nice? They were nice. I mean, that's it? I mean, mittens are nice.
Okaaay, (Gestures) rock, hard place, me.
You're so funny! He's really funny! I wouldn't wanna be there when when the laughter stops.
Whoah whoah, back up there, Sparky. What'd you mean by that?
Oh, just seems as though that maybe you have intimacy issues. Y'know, that you use your humour as a way of keeping people at a distance.
Huh.
I mean hey! I just met you, I don't know you from Adam. ...Only child, right? Parents divorced before you hit puberty.
Uhhuh, how did you know that?
It's textbook.

scene: Joey 和他的父亲在 Chandler 和 Joey 家里谈论父亲的婚外情
difficulty_description: 此场景有一定深度的对话和隐含信息，适合中级学习者

dialogues.text: Hey Ma. Listen, I made the appointment with Dr. Bazida, and... Excuse me? (To his dad) Did you know this isn't Ma?
Her name's Ronni. She's a pet mortician.
