dialogues.text: Hey man, look it's my best bud. How ya doin?
[doesn't respond]
Wow, you are really gettin' good at that Marcel Marceau thing. Hey, whaddya say uh, we play some ball, you and me, huh, whaddya say?
[Throws a basketball to Joey. Joey doesn't move to catch it and the ball takes out a lamp] OK, that's my bad.
If you hated the bracelet so much, Chandler, you should have just said so.
Well, doesn't the fact that I wore the bracelet even though I hated it say something about our friendship and how much it means to me?
Well, what about the fact that you insulted the bracelet and you made fun of me?
OK, well that's the part where I'm a wank. But I was hoping we wouldn't focus on that.

[goes to his room and shuts the door] Hey, c'mon man, I said I was sorry like a hundred times, I promise I will never take it off my. . . [notices the bracelet is missing from his wrist] wrist. But if, if you want to stay in there and be mad, you know, you just uh, you stay in there.

[he starts searching the room, lifting up the couch cushions] I am here, on my knees, holding up these couch cushions as a symbol of my sorrow and regret, much like they did in biblical times. Though you may haveth anger now. . . [Joey returns to his room]

scene: Monica 和 Ross 在父母家讨论 Monica 失业的事情
difficulty_description: 涉及家庭背景和亲情的复杂表达，适合有一定英语基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: You know, that Steffi Graf has quite a tush. I'm just saying, it's right there.
Hey guys.
Hi, darling. Where's my grandson, you didn't bring him?
No, he's at uh, Carol's and Susan's today.
A woman in my office is a lesbian. I'm just saying.
Oh, Jack look, there's that house paint commercial that cracks you up.
Where have you been?
Emotional hell. So, did they lend you the money yet?
No, but that's probably 'cause I haven't asked them yet.
C'mon Monica, do it. Hey, you guys, um, Monica has some news.
Um, yeah, so uh, uhh, listen, I'm sorry I didn't tell you this before but umm, I, I'm no longer at my job, I, I had to leave it.
Why?
Because they made me.
You were fired? What're you gonna do?
Judy, Judy, relax, this is our little harmonica we're talking about. We taught her well. Ten percent of your paycheck, where does it go?
In the bank.
There you go. So she dips into her savings, that's what it's there for. She's gonna be fine, and if you need a little extra, you know where to find it.
[pulls a quarter from behind her ear] Anything larger back there?

scene: Chandler 和 Phoebe 在 Central Perk，讨论新的手镯并找到旧的手镯
difficulty_description: 包含简单的日常对话和幽默，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: I can't believe it.
Would you stop already? Get out of the bitter barn and play in the hay.
Oh, you're right I, I should play in the hay. Forget about the fact that I just dropped 400 dollars to replace a bracelet that I hated to begin with. Bring on the hay.
[comes up from behind the bar and startles Chandler] Hey. I've got something that's gonna make you happy. Guess what Gunther found?
Hey now you have two. [Chandler looks annoyed] Oh, now you have two.
What am I gonna do, huh?
Hey.
Hey.
How come you have two?
Well this one's for you.
Get out.
No, I can't. No no, listen, I, I know how much this means to you and I also know that this is about more than just jewelry, it's about you and me and the fact that we're [reading bracelet] best buds.
Wow, is this friendship? I think so. Check it out, we're bracelet buddies.
That's what they'll call us.

scene: Monica 和 Ross 在厨房关于支票的对话，Phoebe、Chandler 和 Joey 在客厅发现了一个旧录像带
difficulty_description: 此场景包含复杂的句型和多场景转换，对理解力和词汇量有一定要求，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: Here you go, you can pay me back whenever you like.
You have dinosaur checks?
Yeah, yeah I mean, you get your money and you learn a little something, what's wrong with that?
Nothin', nothin', hey you're a cheapasaurus. I'm kidding, I'm kidding, thank you, I'm very greatful.
Hey, Mon, what is this?
Oh, um, that was my bathing suit from high school. I was uh, a little bigger then.
Oh, I thought that's what they used to cover Connecticut when it rained.
Hey Monica, what's on this video tape?
Hey, you got me, put it in.
Oh.
Hi.
Hi.
Over here Jack. OK. I see, Rachel's coming up the path. Oh doesn't she look pretty. Jack, get this.
Oh my God.
What is with your nose?
They had to reduce it because of, of my deviated septum.
OK, I was wrong, that's what they used to cover Connecticut.
You know what this is, this is us getting ready for the prom.
Oh.
You know what, you guys, we don't have to watch this.
Oh yeah we do. C'mon.
Get a shot of Monica. Where's Monica.
Over here dad.
Wait, how do you zoom out? There she is.
Some girl ate Monica.
Shut up, the camera adds ten pounds.
Ahh, so how many cameras are actually on you?
Oh, you look so great.
Ahh, so do you, beautiful.
Oops.
What?
Shoot, I think I got mayonaise on you.
Oh, that's OK, it's just the shoulder, it's not my dress.
Everybody smile.
Oh, dad, turn it off.
It is off.
Dad, it is not. What's with the red light?
It's the off light. Right Ross?
Lookin' good Mr. Cotter.
You look pretty tonight.
Oh, thanks. So, uh, what are you gonna do this summer?
Oh, you know, I'm just gonna, I'm gonna hang out, work on my music.
Is my hook unhooked? These things keep falling down, I can't. . .
Uh, hold, let me see, I don't know. So what're you gonna do. . .
Oh, the guys are here.
this summer?
Work on your music?
Oh my God, look there's Roy Gublik.
Ya know, Roy saw Star Wars 317 times. His name was in the paper.
Where's Chip, why isn't he here yet?
He'll be here OK, take a chill pill.
I just told Rachel that Roy touched my boob.
I can't go to my own prom without a date, I can't, it's too late.
If you're not going then I don't want to go either.
Oh, I'm gonna kick Chip's ass.
I have a wonderful idea. You should take Rachel to the prom.
Doubtful.
Jack, give me that. Talk to your son.
Your mother's right. Take her, you can wear my tux.
Dad, she won't want to go with me.
Of course she would, you're a college man.
I don't know.
Well, c'mon. Don't ya want to find out?
I can't believe I don't get to go to my own prom, this is so harsh.
OK. Hold my board.
Atta boy.
OK, you guys, ya know, I think we've seen enough, let's turn it off.
No, no, no.
OK, fine, well I'm not gonna watch, alright.
C'mon kid, let's go.
Ahh, are you handsome.
Let's show 'em.
Uh, just a sec dad. OK, be cool, just be cool.
OK dad.
Rachel, ready or not, here comes your knight in shining. . . oh no.
Bye.
Oh, dear. Jack, how do I turn this off?
Press the button.
Which one? Which button, Jack.
The button, the button.
I can't believe you did that.
Yeah, well.
See, he's her lobster.

scene: Monica 和 Rachel 在看旧录像带，Monica 的父母在跳舞

dialogues.text: Dance with him.
Mom, I'm hungry.
Dance with your father.
I may not know any of your flash dances but I'm no slouch on the dance floor.
Alright.
Oh, Jack.
Oh, Judy. Oh, Judy.
Oh, ohhhhh.

scene: Monica 和朋友们在她的公寓讨论股票投资和工作问题
difficulty_description: 对话包含一些与股票投资相关的术语，适合具有一定语言基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Hey Monica, why are we watchin' the business channel?

'Cause I was going by it the other day and I saw that there was a stock with my initials, MEG, on it and, well, sometimes I have to watch for two or three hours before it comes up again but when it does, it's pretty exciting.
Ok honey, you really need a job.
Mon, speaking of which, dad says he knows someone you can call for an interview.
Really.
Ok, right there. That, that's the third sign today. Right there.
On behalf of everyone, I'd just like to say behuh.
No, 'cause you just said dad and everywhere I go today I keep getting signs telling me to go see my father. Like when I was walking over here and I passed a buffet...which is my father's last name.
Ahh.
And they were serving franks which is his first name minus the s at the end. And there was a rotisserie with spinning chicken.
His indian name?
No because I chickened out the last time when I tried to meet him. So I mean coincidences? I don't think so.
Freakish.
Wow.
Freaky.
Weird, weird.
Ok, so uh, who wants the last hamburger?
Oh, alright, that's it, now I have to go see him.
Why?
Hamburger. McDonald's. Old MacDonald had a farm, my dad is a pharmacist.

scene: Chandler 和 Ross 在 Central Perk 遇到大块头和小块头的霸凌
difficulty_description: 对话涉及解决霸凌问题的对话，适合具有一定语言基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Man, I am so beat.
Oh yeah.
Hey, you just wanna forget about raquetball and hang out here?
Yeah alright.
Hey you're in our seats.
Oh, sorry we didn't know.
Hey, we were sitting there.
Ok, there is one more way to say it, who knows it?
Is that supposed to be funny?
No actually, I was just going for colorful.
What's with this guy?
What's with you?
Uh, nothing, nothing's with him. Enjoy your coffee.
I just took your hat. See, I can be funny too. My, my joke is that I, I took your hat.
That, that is funny. Can I have it back?
No.
No?
No.
Ok, ok, you know what? I think you're very funny. Kudos on that hat joke. But, come on guy just, just give him back the hat.
Why should we?
Because it's a special hat. See he bought it 'cause he was feeling really down one day so he got the hat to cheer himself up, ya know. Now Chandler...
Stop talking, stop talking now. Let me just get this straight. You're actually stealing my hat?
You got a problem with that?
No, just wanna make sure we're on the same page.

scene: Monica 在公寓谈论面试经历，Chandler 和 Ross 讨论丢帽事件
difficulty_description: 对话包含一些与工作面试和朋友之间的玩笑对话，适合具有一定语言基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Hey, how'd the interview go?

It bit. It was a 50's theme restaurant. I have to cook in a costume and dance on the counter. I mean I was a chef at Cafe des Artistes. I mean how could I take a job where I have to make something called Laverne and Curly Fries?
So don't do it.
How can I not do it? I have $127 in the bank.
Monica, relax, go get a beer.
I don't want a beer.
Who said it was for you?
Hhhiiii.
What's the matter with you?
The mean guys at the coffee house took my hat.
Noo.
You're kiddin'.
It was ridiculous. Ya know, these guys, they were bullies, actual bullies, ya know. We're grown ups, this kinda stuff isn't supposed to happen anymore.
Oohhh.
Hi.
Hi. [Ross turns to Rachel and they hug]
Ohhh [turns as if to hug someone] Oh no, wait a minute, I have no one.
Hey, woah, let's go down there and get your hat back.
Na, forget it, it's probably stripped and sold for parts by now.
Hey, I went up.
What?
My stock, MEG, it went up 2 points. Hey guys, do you realize that if I had invested my $127 in myself yesterday that I'd like have...a lot more than that today. Ya know what, I'm gonna do it.
Do what?
Put all my money in me.
Monica, what are you talking about? You don't know the first thing about the stock market.
What's to know? Buy sell, high low, bears bulls...[on the phone] Yes Manhattan...yeah telephone number of the stock...selling store.

scene: Phoebe 拜访生父家门外遇到意外和朋友们的感想

dialogues.text: See, didn't I tell ya these pillows would be a good idea?
Oh God, here we go. For the first time in my life I'm gonna say 'Hi birthfather'.
We love you, we're here for you.
Yeah good luck, good luck.
Thanks. [gets out of the cab]
Hey Rach, you uh, you want some sandwich?
Ohh, what is in that?
Olive loaf and ham spread, no mayo.
No no, 'cause mayo, that would make it gross.
Hey, hey, no, oh oh.
Run Phoebe run.
No no no, doggie please. Oh, I do so wanna love all animals, please no.
Get him a bone, get a bone. You gotta bone?
Are you kidding me?
Look kibbles, bits. Oh God, alright, get the hell off my leg you yippity piece of crap.
Well why don't you just reach out and take his trampoline.
Ok, here, I know what we can do. [grabs Joey's sandwich and throws it out the window]
Hey, hey, hey no.
Ok, doggie get the- aahhh. Ok go get the sandwich, get the sandwich doggie.
Are you crazy?
Phoebs, he's just a little dog. [turns back to the car window and the dog is halfway through it.] Ahhh.

scene: 在 Central Perk，Chandler 和 Ross 与两个流氓争论座位
difficulty_description: 涉及多个角色和复杂对话，适合具有一定英语基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Hey.
What?
Do you have to be a Century 21 real-estate agent to get to wear those really cool jackets?
Do you say this stuff to girls?
Hehehehey, isn't that the guy who used to wear your hat?
And look where they're sitting.
You're joking, right? You guys just walked through the door.
Maybe we didn't make it clear enough.
Yeah.
This couch belongs to us.
Alright, I'll tell you what, you call the couch and then, and then we'll call the couch, and we'll see who it comes to.
You know what I keep wondering? Why you two are still sitting here.
Alright, that's it. I've had enough of this, alright. Gunther, these guys are trying to take our seat.
Fellas, these guys were here first.
Oh, sorry, I didn't realize.
Sorry.
There you go.
Thank you Gunther. We didn't want to have to go and do that.
He told on us?
You told on us?
Well pal, you didn't give me much of a choice.
Don't play with his things.
I know.
Alright, let's take this outside.
Let's, let's take this outside? Who talks like that?
The guy that's about to kick your ass talks like that.
You had to ask.
Yeah.
Ok, ok look, see, the thing is we're, we're not gonna fight you guys.
Well then here's the deal, you won't have to so long as never ever show your faces in this coffee house ever again.
I think you played the Gunther card too soon.

scene: 在 Phoebe 父亲家前面的出租车里，Joey、Phoebe 和 Rachel 在对话
difficulty_description: 包含一些复杂句型和情感表达，适合具备一定英语基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Hey Phoeb's, I think you're good to go.
Yeah, I don't know.
What's the matter?

I just think that this was a really bad sign, ya know. I mean, like the beast at the threshold, you know. It's just like, I have no family left, ya know. I mean except for my grandmother, you know, but let's face it, she's not gonna be around forever, despite what she says. And I have a sister who I've barely spoken to since we like shared a womb. I don't know, this is my real father and I just, I want things to be like just right.
Yeah Phoebe, I completely understand.
Yeah, whatever you need. Hey, you wanna go home?
Ok, thanks. Sorry, again.
Uhh, I'm guessing the threshold's clear now.

dialogues.text: I wanna buy 5 shares of SGJ and I wanna buy them now. C'mon time is money my friend. Thank you. Wooo.
Time is money my friend?
Yeah, you missed, 'Takes money to make money,' and uh, 'Don't make me come down there and kick your wall street butt.'
Hey, I made $17 before breakfast, what have you done?
Well uh, I had breakfast here so technically I saved $3.50.
How did you make $17.
Well, my financially challenged friends, I split my money and I bought some shares of CHP and ZXY.
How come those?
Well, CHP because I used to have a crush on Eric Estrada. And ZXY becuase I think it sounds zexy.
What happened to uh, MEG.?
MEG was good for me but I dumped her. Ya know, my motto is get out before they go down.
That is so not my motto.

scene: 在电梯里，Phoebe、Rachel 和 Joey 讨论怎么和 Phoebe 的父亲交流
difficulty_description: 对话较长，有关与人沟通和情感的表达，适合具备一定英语背景的学习者。

dialogues.text: Hey.
Hey Phoebs. Oh hey, how's the dog?
Ok, I talked to the vet, people are so nice upstate. Anyway, he said that the little fella's gonna be ok and I can pick him up tomorrow.
Good.
Oh, thank God.
Yeah, but he did have to have a bunch of stitches and he said that only once in a blue moon does a dog's ear grow back so...still hoping.
Ok, so Phoebe, now are you gonna call your dad and let him know that his dog is ok?
I, I don't wanna meet my father over the phone. What am I gonna say, like 'Hi, I'm Phoebe, the daughter you abandoned. Oh, by the way, I broke your dog.'
Hey Phoebs, if you want, I'll do it.
Ok. Listen, just don't say anything about me, ok.
DON'T...be too long with the phone.
She'll be a much better friend when the market closes.
It's a woman.
So talk to her.
Uhh, hello Miss Buffay. I know where your dog is. I want you to know that he'll be returned to you, almost as good as new, within, within 24 hours. Uh, goodbye.
Why the voice.
Hard to say.

dialogues.text: Your cappucino sir.
Thank you.
Ya know I think this is much better than the coffee house.
Absolutely.
How come it's not mixing with the water?
Well the package says you have to uh, constantly keep it moving. Stir and drink, stir and drink, never let it settle.

Hey, this is ridiculous. I'll tell you what. After I get back from my neice's christening, I'll go down to the coffee house with you and we'll all have a nice cup of coffee alright. No problem, Joey's there.
Ok.
No.
No?

No. Man I don't wanna have to have Joey with me every time I wanna descent cup of coffee. Ya know, and I don't wanna spend the rest of my life drinking cappucino with a 'K'. I say you and I go back down there and stand up to those guys.
Alright, hang on a second there Custer.
Yeah really, Ross, have you ever been beaten up before?
Yeah, sure.
By someone besides Monica?
No. So what. So what if we get beaten up, maybe that's just something every man has to go through once in his life. Ya know, like a, like a right of passage or somethin'.
Well, couldn't we just lose our virginities again? Ya know, because I think actually mine's growing back.

scene: 在 Monica 和 Rachel 的公寓前，Monica 和 Rachel 在讨论钱的事
difficulty_description: 简短的对话，涉及基本的生活表达，适合初学者。

dialogues.text: I need to borrow a hundred bucks.
What?
Hi, welcome home. I need to borrow a hundred bucks.
For what?
I've gotta get back in the game.
Why, when did you get out of the game?
I don't know, I lost it all ok. I lost it.
Oh no.
Hey, I've come to terms with it, you have to too.
Ok. Look uhh, Mon I'm, I'm really sorry.
Yeah, yeah, yeah, where are we on the hundred bucks?
I, I don't have it.
But I need it. Otherwords I'm gonna have to take that horrible diner job. You know, with the dancing and the costumes. I don't wanna have to wear flame retardant boobs.
Nobody does honey.

scene: Phoebe returns a bandaged dog to Mrs. Buffay and meets Frank Jr.
difficulty_description: 场景中包含中长句子和多角色互动，适合有一定英语基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Hi.
Schnoodle. Oh my God, what the hell happened to my dog?
It was an accident, and, and the woman who did this would never ever hurt a dog on purpose. She's a vegetarian.
What are these, stitches?
Yeah, eight of them. That's 56 to him. You know also, if, if it's raining, you can't let him look up too long 'cause that cone'll fill up really really fast.
Yeah well, thanks for bringing back what's left of him.
Sure, oh, is, is Frank home.
How do you know Frank?
Just from a, from a long time ago. Is he here?
Yeah. Frank.
Yeah. What?
Oh, ok, um, I mean Frank senior.
He went out for groceries.
Ok so will he be back soon?
Well he left four years ago so we're expecting him back any minute now.
Alright, I'm, I'm gonna go. I'm sorry about the dog, everything. I'm sorry.
Hey lady. Hey wait up. How do you know my dad?
Um well I don't really. Just genetically. He's kinda my dad too.
Heavy.
Yeah. So um, did he ever talk about me, Phoebe?
No but he didn't really talk about anything.
Oh.
Except stilts.
Stilts?

Yeah, he loved stilts. One time I was upstairs, I was stealing cigarettes out of my mom's purse, and uh, all of a sudden I look over and there's my dad's head bobbing past the window. He just had this big smile on his face and he was waving 'cause he was always happiest when he was on his stilts.
Wow.
Yeah.
I don't know what to do with that.
Me neither. So you're like my big sister.
Yeah.
This is huge, you can buy me beer.
I'm not gonna. But you know what's cool though? Ok, if you had a friend named Pete, then I could say, 'Oh yeah, I know Pete, he's friends with my brother.'
I gotta friend named Mark.
That'll work too.
Cool, alright. So maybe, ya know, I could give you a call sometime, we could talk or somethin'.
Yeah, that'd be ok.
Alright.
Ok, I'm in the book.
Ok, yeah.
Alright. So um, stilts huh?
Yeah hey, you know if you want I can take you around back and show you where he hit his head on the rain gutter.
Ok.

scene: Chandler and Ross confront the bullies at Central Perk
difficulty_description: 场景中包含讽刺和幽默的对话，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: Well we did it, we're here. We are standing our ground. How long does a cup of coffee take?
Would you come on! Come on! Thank you.
Ah, there we go.
I think we proved our point.
You burn your mouth?
Cannot feel my tongue.
Bullies, big bullies.
Oh, look who's here, it's the weenies.
Did we not make ourselves clear the other day.
Yes, and that's why we're here.
Yes, we're standing out ground...apparently.
Let's do this alright.
Woah, ho-ho, whad'ya got there, a weapon?
It's a nice watch, I don't wanna break it on your ribs.
Alright, let's do this.
Alright.
Question. If I don't care about my watch, can I use it as a weapon?
Whad'ya mean?
Well, it's sharp, it's metal, I think I can do some, you know, serious damage with it.
No, you can't use your watch.
Ok.
Or your keys.
Ok.
Look, here's what we'll do. We'll put all keys and watches in the hat over there. Alright.
Alright, c'mon man, let's do this.
Before I forget, are we hitting faces?
Of course we're hitting faces, why wouldn't you hit faces?
Well because I have to work on Monday, I have a big presentation.
Actually, you know, uh, I gotta show this apartment tomorrow and uh, you know, this no faces thing might not be a bad idea.
Ok, nothing from the neck up. Or the waist down. Dana's ovulating.
Oh really, you guys tryin' again?
Yeah.
Ok, so let me just get this straight. So we're uh, strictly talking 机器 about the middle?
C'MON!
Hey, hey, woah, you want some of this, huh? You want a piece of this, huh? I'm standin here, huh.
Hey, hey, those guys are takin our stuff!
Hey.
Hey.

scene: Chandler and Ross return to Central Perk after retrieving their possessions
difficulty_description: 对话简单直接，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: God, that was, that was amazing, that was incredible. You guys, you guys kicked butt.
Us, what about you guys? Man you really, bing, gave it to old Mr. Clean back there. He was a big guy.
Yeah he was wasn't he.
Yeah, I wouldn't know having missed everything.
Don't do that to yourself. Any one of us could have tripped over that little girl's jump-rope.
So, listen guys, are we uh, are we ok here?
We're ok.
Alright.
Ok so, can I have my hat back?
No.
Huh.
[reaches over and grabs the hat and bolts for the door but slips and falls behind the couch]

scene: Monica and friends at the 50's theme cafe
difficulty_description: 简单对话和幽默，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: Look at her.
Hi Monica.
He-he-he, how's it goin'?
Hey nice boobs.
Guys guys, check this out.
[Chandler puts a coin in the mini jukebox at the table. YMCA starts playing and Monica and the rest of the staff have to get on the counter and start singing along and dancing.]
[After a couple of choruses, Chandler pulls out a handful of coins and drops them on the table.]
Excellent.

scene: Moondance Diner, Ross, Phoebe, Joey, and Chandler 坐在柜台前，Monica 在工作。

dialogues.text: So, I'll get candles and my mom's lace tablecloth, and since it's Rachel's birthday, I mean, we want it to be special, I thought I'd poach a salmon.
Ohhh.
What?
Question. Why do we always have to have parties where you poach things?
You wanna be in charge of the food committee?
Question two. Why do we always have to have parties with committees?
Really. Why can't we just get some pizzas and get some beers and have fun?
Yeah.
Yeah, I agree. Ya know, I think fancy parties are only fun if you're fancy on the inside and I'm just not sure we are.
Alright. If you guys don't want it to be special, fine. You can throw any kind of party you want.
Joey they're not real. I start miles beneath the surface of these things, ok, they're fake. See [squeezes her breast] honk honk.
Wow, it's, it's like porno for clowns.

scene: Central Perk, Chandler, Ross, Joey, Phoebe, 和 Monica 在计划 Rachel 的生日派对。
difficulty_description: 此场景包含对复杂情境的讨论，对话较长，需要一定的词汇量和理解力。

dialogues.text: I talked to Rachel's sisters, neither of them can come.
Ok, um so, I still have to invite Dillon and Emma and Shannon Cooper.
Woah, woah, woah, uh, no Shannon Cooper.
Why not her?
Cause she uh, she steals stuff.
Or maybe she doesn't steal stuff and Joey just slept with her and never called her back.
Joey that is horriable.
Hey I liked her, alright. Maybe, maybe too much. I don't know I guess I just got scared.
I'm sorry, I didn't know.
I didn't think anyone'd buy that, ok.
Hi honey, how did it go?
Agh, it was the graduation from hell.
Ya know, my cousin went to hell on a football scholarship.
Ya know, I mean this is supposed to be a joyous occasion. My sister's graduating from college, nobody thought she would. It's a true testament to what a girl from long island would do for a Celica.
So what happened?

My parents happened. All they had to do was sit in the same stadium, smile proudly, and not talk about the divorce. But nooo, they got into a huge fight in the middle of the commencement address. Bishop Tutu actually had to stop and shush them. But you know what, you know what the good news is? I get to serve coffee for the next 8 hours.
Ok, so I guess we don't invite her parents.
Well, how bout just her mom?
Why her mom?
Cause I already invited her.
Ooh, ooh, did you ask Stacy Roth?
Oh no, can't invite her. She also steals.

scene: Monica 和 Rachel 的公寓, Chandler, Joey, Monica 和 Phoebe 在布置派对。
difficulty_description: 此场景中角色较多，对话复杂度适中，适合有一定英语基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Ok, here are the birthday candles. Where's the birthday cake?
Ok, we're not having birthday cake, we're having birthday flan.
Excuse me?
It's a traditional Mexican custard dessert.
Oh that's nice. Happy birthday Rachel, here's some goo.
[answers the door] Dr. Greene. Oh my God it's Rachel's dad. What're you doing here?
What? The father can't drop by to see the daughter on her birthday?
No no, the father can, but um, since I am the roommate I can tell you that she's not here and I'll pass along the message, ok. So bye-bye.
Ohhh, you're having a parteee.
No, no, not a party. Just a surprise gathering of some people Rachel knows. Um, this is Phoebe and Chandler and Joey.
I'll never remember all of that. So uh, what's the deal? Rachel comes home, people pop out and yell stuff, is that it?
This isn't your first surprise party, is it sir?
[answers to see Mrs. Greene] Chinese menu guy. Forgot the menus.
So, basically just a Chinese guy.
Uh, hey, Dr. Greene, why don't you come with me, we'll put your jacket on Rachel's bed.
Alright, that sounds like a two person job.
Hi Monica.
Sandra, I am so sorry, I thought you were Rachel and we just weren't ready for you yet.
You thought I was Rachel?
Yes because uh, you look so young.
And because you're both, you know, white women.
Oh, I missed you kids. Well, should I put my coat in the bedroom?
NO! No, I'll take that for ya.

Oh well thank you. Such a gentleman. Thank you. [Chandler takes the hot pink coat and grimaces at it] Ahh, it all looks so nice, so festive, all the balloons... [Chandler, remembering that Joey and Mr. Greene are in the bedroom, throws her coat in a cupboard] The funniest thing happened to me on the way here. I was...

[cutting Mrs. Greene off] Ha-ha, that's great, ha-ha. I can't wait to hear the rest of it, ya know, but I really have to go to the bathroom so... Hey, come with me. Yeah, yeah, it'll be like we're gal pals, ya know, like at a restraunt. Oh, it'll be fun, c'mon.
Oh my God, oh my God, oh my God.
Ok, think, what would Jack and Chrissy do?
[peeks back out] Ok, now that your coat is safely in the bedr-, [sees that the coast is clear] oh, ok we can come back out in the living room.
So uh, Joey and Chandler, I, I think it's time that you take Dr. Greene over to your place.
Uhh, yes, absdolutely, um. Why again?
Because that's where the party is you goon. See this is just the staging area.
Right this is staging.
Yeah, this more than anything else, is the staging area.
[as they're walking out, Dr. Greene questioningly gestures at the Happy Birthday sign over the door] This is clearly in the wrong apartment. [they all walk across the hall]

scene: Chandler 在两个派对之间调配人手，Rachel 组织庆祝生日
difficulty_description: 此场景包含多个不同角色之间的互动，对话内容较为丰盈，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: Alright you guys are off to party number one and you, you are off to party number two. Alright fellas, let's keep it movin', let' keep it movin.
Chandler could you at least send some women to my party? Alright that's Ross.
Ok, they're coming, shhh.
Ohh, thank you for the wonderful dinner.
Thanks for being born.
Ohh, thank you for my beautiful earrings, they're perfect. I love you.
Oh, now you can exchange them if you want, ok.
Now I love you even more.

scene: Rachel 在自己的公寓中惊喜派对，大家为她庆生日
difficulty_description: 此场景包含欢快的生日祝福对话，句型和词汇都比较简单，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: Surprise.
Oh my gosh, wow. Monica. Oh my god. Mom. This is so great.
Happy birthday sweetie.
Wow you, you. I had no idea.
Really?
No, I knew.
All right.
Ok, everybody, there's food and drinks on the table. Go across the hall.
What?
What?
Right now, Joey and Chandler's, go now.
Why.
Just go.

scene: 在 Chandler 和 Joey 的公寓里继续派对，Rachel 和爸爸打招呼
difficulty_description: 此场景涉及家庭成员的对话和搞笑元素，需要一定的语法和词汇基础，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: Surprise.
Happy birthday sweetpea.
Daddy.

scene: Rachel 与 Chandler 和 Ross 谈论派对的状态
difficulty_description: 此场景涉及对话情感和派对安排，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: Both of them are here, both of them, both of them are here?
Well, we could count again.
I can't believe this is happening.
You know what, this is ridiculous, ok. This is your birthday, this is your party. I say we just put 'em all together and if they can't deal with it, who cares.
I do.
That's who.
Look, are you gonna be ok?
Well, I have to be, I don't really have a choice, I mean, you know, I could look at the bright side, I get two birthday parties and two birthday cakes.
Well, actually just one birthday flan.
What?
It's a traditional Mexican custard dessert...Look talk to Monica, she's on the food committee.

scene: Chandler 描述派对上的搞笑经历，Phoebe 帮助 Gunther 逃脱 Monica 的派对
difficulty_description: 此场景包含幽默对话和稍长的叙述，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: Joey, Joey. Hey, some girl just walked up to me and said, 'I want you Dennis,' and stuck her tongue down my throat. I love this party.
Quick volleyball question.
Volleyball.
Yeah, we set up a court in your room. Uh, you didn't really like that grey lamp, did you?
Joey, a woman just stuck her tongue down my throat, I'm not even listening to you.
Dennis.
Ok, that's me.
Listen honey, can you keep dad occupied, I'm gonna go talk to mom for a while.
Ok, do you have any ideas for any openers?
Uhh, let's just stay clear of 'I'm the guy that's doing your daughter' and you should be ok.

scene: Monica 的派对上大家分享尴尬的记忆，Phoebe 帮助 Gunther 和其他人逃脱
difficulty_description: 此场景包含多个角色的互动和幽默对话，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: Ok people, I want you to take a piece of paper, here you go, and write down your most embarrassing memory. Oh, and I do ask that when you're not using the markers, you put the caps back on them because they will dry out.
I um, was sorta thinking about maybe...
No. No you can't go. No this is fun. Come on we're just getting started. Here, here's your marker.
Listen if you wanna go, just go.
No, she'll yell at me again.
Alright, I can get you out.
What?
Shh. In a minute, I'm gonna create a diversion. When I do, walk quickly to the door and don't look back.

scene: Ross 和 Rachel 的父母在 Chandler 和 Joey 的派对，Ross 帮忙取酒和眼镜
difficulty_description: 此场景包含关于酒和眼镜的搞笑对话，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: I think I need a drink.
Oh, here, I, I'll get it for ya. Whad'ya want?
Scotch.
Scotch. Alright, I'll be back in 10 seconds with your scotch on the rocks in a glass.
Neat.
Cool.
No no no, no no no, neat, as in no rocks.
I know.
Oh hello Ross, where have you been?
Hi. Uh, I have been in the bathroom. Stay clear of the salmon mousse.
Oh, scotch neat. Ya know, that's Rachel's father's drink.
Oh, mine too. Isn't that neat, scotch neat. Would you excuse me?
[walks out in the hallway, Mr. Greene is walking out of Chandler and Joey's apartment] Hey, hey, where you uh, sneakin' off to mister?
I'm getting my cigarettes out of my jacket.
No. no.
Whad'ya mean no?

No, um, see 'cause that, that is, that is the staging area. If you go in there, it'll ruin the whole illusion of the party. Yeah, I think you take your scotch back in there and I will get your cigarettes for you sir.
Get my glasses too.
All righty roo. [closes the door] What a great moment to say that for the first time. [goes to get the cigarettes and glasses]

scene: Chandler and Joey's party where Monica is trying to start a Boggle tournament
difficulty_description: 此场景包含中等难度的日常对话，语句稍长，适合有一定基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Could you guys please try to keep it down, we're trying to start a Boggle tournament.
All right Joey, be nice. So does he have a hump? A hump and a hairpiece?
Wait, does he eat chalk?
You, and you, you're supposed to be at my party. And Gunther! What are you doing here?
Um [gestures to dance floor]
[enters with the three people she got out] Ok, welcome to the fu-oh.
Phoebe.
Alright, I'm sorry but these people needed me. They work hard all week, it's Saturday night, they deserve to have a little fun. Go.
Ya know, my party is fun. I mean, maybe it's a little quieter, less obvious sorta fun but, you know, if people would just give it a chance... [volleyball hits her in the head from behind]

scene: Rachel and her mother talk about therapy at Monica's party
difficulty_description: 对话涉及家庭问题和情感，是中等难度。

dialogues.text: You want me to see a therapist?
Sweetheart, you obviously have a problem. You've chosen a boyfriend exactly like your father.
Ok mom, you know what, fine, I'll make an appointment ok, but you know what, right now, I gotta go, I gotta go do a thing.

scene: Rachel's father complains about expenses at Chandler and Joey's party
difficulty_description: 对话包含复杂的句式，适合有一定基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Did you know your mother spent $1200 dollars on bansai trees. I felt like Gulliver around that place.
Daddy, daddy, you know what, I really wanna hear more about this, I really do, but I just have, I just have to do a, some stuff.

scene: Mr. and Mrs. Greene's complaints at the respective parties
difficulty_description: 对话展示了两边父母的愤怒和抱怨，适合有一定语言基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: You work and you work and you work at a marriage but all he cares about is his stupid boat.
You work and you work and you work on a boat...
...but when all is said and done, he still drinks out of the mugs.
...and her yoga and her Bridges of Madison County...
...I may have only been in therapy for three weeks now dear but...
...what the hell does she want with half a boat...

scene: Rachel talks to Chandler in the hallway after the party
difficulty_description: 对话涉及情感和经历，具有中等难度。

dialogues.text: [running out of his apartment after a girl] Ok, ok, you can be shirts and I'll be skins. I'll be skins. [sits down beside Rachel] Hey, how you holdin' up there, tiger? Oh, sorry, when my parents were getting divorced I got a lot of tigers. Got a lot of champs, chiefs, sports, I even got a governor.

This is it, isn't it? I mean, this is what my life is gonna be like. My mom there, my dad there. Thanksgiving, Christmas. She gets the house, he's in some condo my sister's gonna decorate with wicker. Oh, Chandler how did you get through this?
Well, I relied on a carefully regimented program of denial and, and wetting the bed.
Ya know, I just, so weird. I mean I was in there just listening to them bitch about each other and all I kept thinking about was the fourth of July.
Because it reminded you of the way our forefathers used to bitch at each other?

It's just this thing. Every year we would go out on my dad's boat and watch the fireworks. Mom always hated it because the ocean air made her hair all big. My sister Jill would be throwing up over the side and my dad would be upset because nobody was helping and then when we did help he would scream at us for doing it wrong. But then when the fireworks started, everybody just shut up, you know, and it'd get really cold, and we would all just sort of smush under this one blanket. It never occurred to anybody to bring another one. And now it's just...
I, I know. [Hugs her. Ross walks out and Chandler puts her in his arms.]

scene: Monica's party ends
difficulty_description: 对话简单明了，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: Ok, thanks for coming, I hope you guys had fun.
Alright, Monica dear, I'm gonna hit the road. Now I've left my 10 verbs on the table. And you be sure and send me that finished poem.
Ok will do. So glad you came.
I think I saw Rachel out in the hall.

scene: Rachel talks to her mother in the hallway
difficulty_description: 对话简明扼要，适合初学者。

dialogues.text: Ok, let me go check. Your mom wants to say goodbye.
Oh ok.
Happy birthday sweetie.
Ok.

scene: Mr. Greene at Chandler and Joey's apartment
difficulty_description: 对话复杂，涉及多层次表达，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: To get my coat.
No no no.
Alright, alright, I can get my own coat.
Sorry, we're on a major flan high.

Oh no, you're not supposed to be here. This is the staging area, you should, it's all wrong, you should leave, ya know, get out. [opens the door, the guys are right there] Or perhaps you'd like a creme d'menthe.
I have to be heading to my chateau, thank you.
Oh all right, then I guess we're going back into the hallway.
Thanks for coming Mrs. Greene. [grabs her and kisses her to distract her. She goes limp in his arms. Mr. Greene leaves.] Well, ok, you take care.
Oh, you kids [she caresses his face and chest] Well, this is the best party I've been to in years.
Thank you.

scene: Monica and Rachel's apartment celebration
difficulty_description: 对话轻松愉快，词汇和句型都较为简单，适合所有等级的学习者。

dialogues.text: Ok everybody, it's time for flan.
Yup, get ready for the gelatenous fun.
Kinda looks like that stuff you get when you get a bad infection.
Ok, that's enough.
Ok Rachel, make a special flan wish.
Ok, I've got one. [blows out the candles. Somebody calls out 'heads up' and the volleyball lands in the flan] Wow, those things almost never come true.

scene: Central Perk，Chandler、Joey、Monica 和 Rachel 与 Bonnie 谈论她的性经历
difficulty_description: 这个场景包含长对话和复杂的情感交流，涉及幽默和讽刺表达，适合高级学习者。

dialogues.text: So ah, your first sexual experience was with a woman?!
All right, I was 15, it was my best friend, Ruth, and we got drunk on that hard cider, and then suddenly, I don’t know, we were, we were making out.
Tell it again. Seriously.
I mean is that woman capable of talking about anything else but sex?
Yeah, sure. Well y'know, earlier she was talking about geography.
Joey, she was listing the countries she’s done it in.
Well, I think we all learned something.

scene: Phoebe 进入 Central Perk，展示她找到的一张照片
difficulty_description: 包含较长的解释性对话和一些幽默内容，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: Hey, you guys! Look what I found! Look at this! That’s my Mom’s writing! Look.
Me and Frank and Phoebe, Graduation 1965.
Y'know what that means?
That you’re actually 50?
No-no, that’s not, that’s not me Phoebe, that’s her pal Phoebe.
That is so cool.

I know! So this woman probably could like have all kinds of stories about my parents, and she might even know like where my Dad is. So I looked her up, and she lives out by the beach. So maybe this weekend we could go to the beach?
Yeah! Yeah, we can!
Shoot! I can’t go, I have to work!
That’s too bad.
Ohh, big, fat bummerrr.
So great! Okay! Tomorrow we’re gonna drive out to Montauk.
Hey, Bonnie had sex there!

scene: Central Perk 外面，Chandler 和 Monica 等待 Phoebe
difficulty_description: 对话包含幽默内容和角色之间的深入互动，句子适中，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: Would you look at them. Am I ever gonna find a boyfriend again? I gonna die an old maid.
You’re not gonna die an old maid, maybe an old spinster cook.
Thanks!
Hey now besides, if worst comes to worst, I’ll be your boyfriend.
Yeah right.
Why is that so funny?
You made a joke right? So I laughed.
Ha-ha-ha. A little to hard. What am I not ah, boyfriend material?
Well, no. You’re Chandler. Y'know, Chandler!

Okay, so we’ve established my name, and hit me. But theoretically y'know, I mean say we weren’t friends, say it’s a blind date. I show up at your door, and I’m like “Hey, nice to meet, ya. Hey, oh-hey.”
Well I’d probably be scared of a guy using a fake voice.
Hey!
Oh, hey! Oh good, you brought food!
No, it’s just my luggage.

scene: Phoebe 驾驶汽车到来，一群人在聊天
difficulty_description: 对话内容较长，涉及多个角色并包含幽默元素，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: Hey!!
Woo-hoo! All right! Yeah!
Oh, I am having the best karma this week. First, I find this woman who knew my parents, and then my client with the fuzzy back gives me his beach house.
Yeah? What about ah, that bike messenger you hit?
Oh, I wasn’t talking about his karma.
Hey!
Hey!
Hey-hey, check out the hat!
What a minute, I know that hat! I was taken aboard that hat! They did experiments on me! I can’t have children!!
Seriously, where did you get the hat?
Ross gave it to me.
Yeah, I think she looks good.
Ohh, thank you.
Buy it for ya, or win it for ya?
Well excuse me, my fashion-impaired friends, I am here to tell you that hats are back.
And this time, they’ve ganged up to form one giant, super hat.

scene: 海边的房子内，朋友们刚到
difficulty_description: 场景中包含短而快速的对话，适中语法和词汇，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: Go, go, go!
Oh yeah, now everybody wants to be under this hat!
Oy!!
What’s with all this sand?
Oh, yeah, Bob said there might be flood damage.
Yeah, either that, or he has a really big cat.

scene: Phoebe Sr. 的房子内，Phoebe 访问她
difficulty_description: 对话涉及情感交流和记忆描述，句子较长且语法复杂，适合高级学习者。

dialogues.text: Well, yes, it’s kind’ve an unusual house. It has umm, three beautiful bedrooms and ah, no baths. But y'know, the ocean is right there.
Knock, knock, knock.
Ah, oh, hang on a second. Come in, come in. All right, so think about it, and call me back.
Are you ah, Phoebe Abott?
Ahh, yes.
Hi Phoebe Abott, I’m your best friends daughter!
You’re Erwin’s daughter?!
No, I-I mean your-your old best friend, here. Lily, from high school. Remember?
Oh gosh, Lily, yes. Of course I remember Lily. I... Then you must be?
Phoebe. Phoebe. Phoebe, yeah. She named me after you I guess.
Uh-huh. Wow! Well, look! There’s Frank.
Yes!! Yes! Yes! Yes!! That’s my Dad, that’s Frank! Yeah! I’m sorry I’m getting all flingy.
Take it easy--if you want, there’s cookies on the counter, or, or--sangria! I can make sangria!
No-no, sorry. Cookies are good, thanks.
Oh.
Well, so, umm, anyway umm, I’ve been, I’ve been looking for my Father, and umm, have you heard from him, or seen him?
Oh no, I-I’m sorry, I guess we lost track of everybody after high school.
Oh, okay. Well, so tell me everything about my parents. Everything.
Ohh, well. Y'know we were always together, in fact the had a nickname for the three of us.
Oh, what? What was it?
The three losers. Oh, poor Lily.
Yeah, no, it was great.

scene: The beach house, raining with everyone bored.
difficulty_description: 对话句型和句子长度相对复杂。对话内容多样化。

dialogues.text: Hey, y'know what a really good rainy day game is?
What?!
I mean naked game. Strip poker, we should totally play strip poker.
No, no!
What are you crazy?!
Come on! When you go away, you-you have to play, it’s like a law!
Allll done!
Aww, thank you.

scene: Monica, Rachel and Ross discussing about things to do
difficulty_description: 对话句型和句子长度相对复杂。对话内容多样化。

dialogues.text: Okay, who’s next?!
No-o-o! No way!
Come on, please?! I’m boredddd! You let me do it once before.
Yeah well, if ah, if that’s the rule this weekend... No!
Yes!
Get away!
Just once!
Stay away!
Take it like a man, Ross!
No! No!
Oh, come on!
Big bullies!!

scene: Phoebe entering and discussing, Joey proposes a game again
difficulty_description: 对话句型和词汇量适中，涉及几个主要角色。

dialogues.text: Oh, hey!
Hey!
Hey!
Oh, so, how are we doing?
Bored and bored!
Hey, you know what naked card game is never boring?
Noo!!
So what’s Phoebe like?
I’m kind, caring, and sweet. What’s Monica like?
Ah no, the other Phoebe, the one you went to go see.
Ohh, I think she knows where my Dad is.
What?
Really?!
Oh well, where is he?!
She was acting, she was pretending like she hasn’t heard from him on years, but I found this picture on her fridge, and look!
Totally familiar.
Oh, yeah.
Yeah!
Well, why would she lie to you?
I don’t know, but we’re having dinner tomorrow night, so I figured, she’s gonna tell me then. Y'know maybe she just wanted to give him time to, buy me presents, I don’t know! So, you’re all bored?
Ohh!!
Yes!
All right, I’m gonna close my eyes and point to someone, and you, whoever I point has to come up with something fun for us to do, and we have to do it.
Okay, all right.
Okay.
Fan out! Fan out!
Okay. Ooh, y'know we could just do this. (She stops at Chandler)
Okay, umm, we all have to play strip poker.
OH YES!!!!!

scene: Playing Strip Happy Days Game
difficulty_description: 游戏期间的对话相对简单，但有互动和一些参考。

dialogues.text: Strip Happy Days Game?
Yeah, well, I couldn’t find any cards, so it was either this or Strip Bag Of Old Knitting Stuff.
Okay, Fonzy gives you two thumbs up, collect two cool points. Yeah.
Monica, if you get five cool points, you get to make somebody take off one item of clothing. It hasn’t happened yet, but we’re all very excited.
Okay, come on! Daddy needs a new pair of electromagnetic microscopes for the Prehistoric Forensics Department!
Take Pinky Tuscadero up to Inspiration Point, collect three cool points!! Yeah! Which gives me five, and let’s see who is gonna lose their clothes.
I think I pick our strip poker sponsor Mr. Joey Tribianni.
Woo-hooooo!!!!
All right, relax. It’s just a shoe.
Wooooo!!!!

scene: After the game, Monica talks about Ross flirting with Rachel
difficulty_description: 对话讨论了一些情感和关系，语言相对丰富。

dialogues.text: All right, I’m gonna make more margaritas!
Whoa, hey! What are doing? Trying to get me drunk?
I’m just making margaritas.
Okay.
I think I’ll help her out.
What is going on here?
What?!
You painting his toenails?
Oh, come on!
Chasing him all around the room?
Monica, please?
He’s totally flirting with you too.
He is, isn’t he? I don’t know, I mean maybe it’s just being here at the beach together or, I don’t know.
Hey!
Hey! Hi Bonnie!
Hi! My boss let me off early, so I took the train.
Oh.
What are you guys doing?!
We’re playing Strip Happy Days Game!
Cool! I’ll catch up! (She takes off her sweater.)

scene: Next morning at the beach house, Joey as a mermaid and breakfast time.
difficulty_description: 早晨的对话幽默且多样化，适合中等难度学习者。

dialogues.text: So, you still don’t think I’m boyfriend material?
Huh?
I saw you checking me out during the game last night.
You didn’t even take off your pants.
Yeah, well, lucky for you.
What?
I don’t know.
Well! Is everybody else having just the best time?!
Shhh! Shhhh! Joey’s asleep.
After he passed out, we put the sand around him to keep him warm.
Well I assume the ah, happy couple isn’t up yet. Did you guys hear them last night?
Oh, yeah, I don’t know what they were doing, but at one point sea turtles actually came up to the house.
Good morning.
Hey.
Hey! How did everybody sleep?
Oh, great.
Like a log.
Us too.
I’m going for a walk.
Good morning. Nice breasts by the way.
Thanks!

scene: Rachel and Bonnie talking, Bonnie decides to shave her head.
difficulty_description: 讨论某人外观的对话，词汇较具体，句子较长。

dialogues.text: Hey, what happened to you?
Oh, ah nothin’. I just felt like hangin’ out here and reading.
Oh, the water was sooo great! We jumped off this pier and my suit came off.
Ohhhh, sorry I missed that.
Yeah, Joey and Chandler sure are funny.
Ohh-ha-ha!
I think I brought back half of the beach in my hair. It was so much easier when I used to shave my head.
Y'know, I gotta tell ya, I just loved your look when you were bald.
Really?!
Ohh!
Because I think about shaving it all off again sometime.
Really?!
Yeah!
I mean you definitely should do that.
Y'know what, I should do it.
Yeah!
Yeah, thank you Rachel, you are soo cool.
Awww, stop. Come on. Now go shave that head!
All right.

scene: Ross comes out of the beach house to talk to Rachel
difficulty_description: 此场景包含复杂的情感交流，对话较长，需要一定的语法和词汇基础，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: Hi.
Hi!

I was having a little chat with ah, Bonnie, and ah, guess what, she-she happened to bring up y'know, who was behind the um, whole head shaving idea, and now, who was it? Oh, that’s right, that’s right, it was you!
That was her idea, I just gave her a nudge.
She said you gave her the razor!
Hey guys.
Hey!
So, anyone up for a midnight dip in the ocean?
Ahh, no, I’m good.
Okay, I’ll see you in a bit.
Okay, have fun! Wooo!!
Come on see, she doesn’t look that bad.
You can see the moonlight bouncing off her head! What the hell were you thinking?!!
I don’t know.
You don’t know?! Rach, you balded my girlfriend!
All right! Ross, do you think it’s easy for me to see you with somebody else?
Y'know, hey! You’re the one who ended it, remember?
Yeah, because I was mad at you, not because I stopped loving you!
You still love me?
Noo.
You still love me.
Oh, y-yeah, so, you-you love me!
Noo, nnnnn. What does this mean? What do you, I mean do you wanna, get back together?
Noo! Maybe! I, I don’t know. Ross, I still can’t forgive you for what you did, I can’t, I just, but sometimes when I’m with you I just, I feel so...
What?!
I just, I feel, I-I just...
What?
I feel...
(leans in and kisses her)

scene: Phoebe breaks into Phoebe Sr.’s house.
difficulty_description: 此场景包含细节丰富的动作和对话，句型稍复杂，需要中级学习者注意理解。

dialogues.text: Ow! My ass. Okay. Okay. (She manages to climb completely inside and the window slams shut.) Oh, shhh!
(hits her head on a wind chime) Oh, shhh!
(startles Phoebe with a coat hanger) No! No!! It’s me! It’s me! I-I didn’t want to make any noise!
Then don't break in!!
I’m sorry.
What are you doing here?!
I-I, came to fill your ice cube trays.
What?!

Umm, okay, okay, look. I took this picture from your fridge. Okay, because I know that this is my Father. Yeah, this is Frank Buffay and you are standing right there next to him. Now, look I deserve to know where I came from. All right? So if you can help me find my Father then you should! Otherwise, you’re just mean! (pause) So, just tell me the truth!
All right, the man in the picture is Chuck Magioni.
My Father is Chuck Magioni?
No, no, that’s just Chuck Magioni, I-I sold him a house last year! And I’m very sorry, but I don’t know where your Father is, and that’s the truth.
Oh.
But umm, you’re right. I think that a person should know where they come from. Wh-which is why I ah, (pause) ahh, (pause) okay. I’m your mother.
Heh?
Y'know I wanted to tell you yesterday, but I just, I kinda felt all floopy, and...

scene: Ross explains what happened to Joey and Chandler outside the beach house
difficulty_description: 此场景包含对话较多，内容较长，适合具备一定基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: I’m telling ya, you guys are totally getting back together!
That’s not true! Her, she doesn’t even know what she wants! Rachel’s still mad about the whole thing.
Okay, then you gotta back away, all right? You don’t need that kind’ve hurt. Take it from a guy who’s never had a long term relationship......
I know, but ahhhhhh!! I really wanna go up there and finish that kiss!
Hey!
Ahhhh! (Steps away from her.)
You guys, the water’s great. You should really go in.
Oh, ahh, no thanks, I just had an M&M.
Okay, well g’night.
Good night.
(kisses Ross) Don’t be too long.
Okey-dokey!
There is not one hair on that head.

Hey, it’ll grow back, right? And she-she’s really fun, and she’s cool, and-and I’m finally moving on. Y'know? I mean getting over Rachel was so (makes an incoherent nasal sound), y'know? Y'know, and I’m finally feeling sane again. And now if I go up there, and-and I kiss her, and, Gooood I wanna kiss her, and-and-and it doesn’t work out, right? Do I really wanna put myself through that again?
So let me get this straight. If you go with Bonnie tonight, you’re doing the smart, healthy thing and moving on.
Yeah.
Right, and you go with Rachel, Bonnie’s free tonight?

scene: Ross decides which room to enter
difficulty_description: 此场景包含简单的内心对话和动作，词汇基础，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: (entering the bedroom) Hi. (closes the door)

scene: Chandler pretends to pick up Monica for a date
difficulty_description: 此场景包含幽默的对话，句型简单，词汇基础，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: (in a fake voice) Hi there.
That’s that weird voice again.
Okay! Okay! Let me try it again, you’re gonna wanna date this next guy, I swear!
Hi! I’m Dorf! You’re date for the evening.
(walks away in disgust) Oh come on! Dorf on dating, that’s good stuff!!

scene: Joey 对之前的剧情进行回顾。
difficulty_description: 这个单独的角色台词是对上一集剧情的简单回顾，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: Previously on Friends.

scene: Monica 和 Rachel 的公寓里，Ross 和 Rachel 发生争执。
difficulty_description: 此场景包含较长的对话和情感交流，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: I mean, I don’t feel like I even have a girlfriend anymore.
You want me to just quit my job so that you can feel like you’ve got a girlfriend?
Is this about Mark?
Oh my God.
Okay, it’s not, it’s not.
Oh my God. I cannot keep having this same fight with you Ross! Look, urrgh, maybe we should take a break.
Fine, you’re right. Let’s ah, let’s take a break, let’s cool off, okay, let’s get some frozen yoghurt, or something..
No. A break from us.

scene: Monica 和 Rachel 的公寓，Mark 在帮 Rachel 打开中餐盒。
difficulty_description: 此场景包含三人对话，有一定复杂性，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: Then, we had this big, stupid fight, and I said I wanted to take a break, I don’t want to take a break.
I’ve been thinking, this is crazy, I mean don’t, don’t you think we can work on this?
Hey, what do you want to drink?
Who’s that?
Nobody.
Is that Mark?
Umm, honey, look he just came over to....
Yeah! Got it!

scene: The Philly，Chloe 请 Ross 跳舞。
difficulty_description: 此场景包含简单的对话和简单的行动，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: Hey, come dance. What? Are you married? ‘Cause that’s okay.

scene: Monica 和 Rachel 的公寓，Monica 在准备水果饮料。
difficulty_description: 此场景包含两个角色的有趣对话，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: Hey.
Hey.
How’s the big anniversary dinner?
Well, we never actually got to dinner.
Ohhh, nice.
No, we kinda broke up instead.
What?!
God, Monica it’s on the ceiling.
That’s okay, this is more important than fruit on my ceiling! You broke up?!
Yeah, but it’s okay, because when Ross left Mark came over.
Oh no!!
No.
Rachel, you and Mark?!
No, no-no, it’s okay, calm down. Mark and I talked, and I realised how much I love your stupid brother, and, yeah, we got our problems, but I really want to make it work.

scene: Ross 的卧室，Ross 从床上醒来。
difficulty_description: 此场景为两人简单对话，涉及日常问候和情感交流，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: Morning!

scene: Ross 的厨房，Ross 正在吃阿司匹林和检查留言。
difficulty_description: 此场景包含电话留言和简单对话，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: Hi, it’s me. I’ve been trying to reach you all night. I feel awful. Please, Ross, you gotta know there is nothing between me and Mark. This whole break-up thing is just stupid.
Yeah!!
Eh, I’m just so sorry I put you through it. And, I y'know, I don’t want to get back together over a machine.
Na-huh.
So, I love you.
I love you.
And y'know what, I’m gonna, I’m gonna go to bed now, but ah, on my way to work tomorrow morning, I’m gonna stop by around 8:30.
Okay.
Bye.
Chloe, Chloe how’s it coming?!!
Hey, what kind of puppy do you think I should get?
Umm, oh, hey, I don’t know. How about a big one?
But my apartment is so...
Well then a small one!! Listen, let’s, we kinda have to get going!
Wait! Where’s my shoes?
You, you sure you need shoes?
Okay.
Yeah, y'know the ah, the girlfriend I told you about last night? Well it turns out she ah, she wants to get back together with me. Oh, I found it!!
That’s so great for you guys!
Yeah!
You must be so happy!
Yes, yes I am, one of the many things I’m feeling. Well....
Good luck, with your girlfriend.
Oh, thank you. Hey, hey. Rachel!!!!
Hi. Ohhh, you got my message.
Yeah, oh hey, you are right on time.
So what do you say? Can I be your girlfriend again?
Yes, you can, very much.
Ahhhh!!

scene: Monica 和 Rachel 的公寓，Phoebe 给 Monica 带来邮件。
difficulty_description: 此场景有简单的闲聊和幽默对话，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: Hey!
Hey.
Hey, why are you mopping your ceiling?
Oh, there’s banana on it.
Wow, I have the spirit of an old Indian women living in mine.
So then you know?
The mailman was downstairs, so I brought up your mail.
Oh, good. Thanks.
Now what is Fabutec?

Okay, all right don’t judge me to much. Okay? Um, but I saw this info-mercial, and um, I swear to you I have never-ever bought anything on TV before, except for this mop. But there was this stuff on leg waxing, it just, it looked so amazing....
Waxine!!
Yes! Have you seen it?
Oh, it’s incredible! I so want to be a Waxine girl.
I know!!
God. Do think it really doesn’t hurt? ‘Cause how can they do that?
Hello! Organic substances recently discovered in the depths of the rain forest!
They have the best stuff in there.

scene: Chandler 和 Joey 的公寓, Ross 讲述他的情况。
difficulty_description: 此场景包含复杂的情感讨论和多个角色，适合高级学习者。

dialogues.text: Oh my God! Oh my God!
Yeah. We figured when we couldn’t find you, you’d gone home to make up with Rachel. Which is probably what you shoulda done. Huh?

You think?! God, I, ah, I’m in hell. I mean what, what am I gonna do? Rachel’s all like, ‘I love you and, and let’s work on this.’ And all I can think about is, ‘What is she gonna do? What is she gonna say?’ when I tell her what I did.
Well, before we answer that, I think we should address the more important question. How dumb are you?
What?! Look, we’re trying to rebuild a relationship here, right. How am I supposed to do that here, without being totally honest with each other?
Look, Ross look, I’m on board about this totally honesty thing, I am, just not about stuff that’s gonna get you in trouble.
He’s right. Nobody’s gonna benefit, and you’re just gonna hurt her.
Yeah, and there won’t be a relationship left to rebuild.
Yeah, but don’t you think....
All right look, if you absolutely have to tell her, at least wait until the timing’s right. And that’s what deathbeds are for.
Yeah, okay.
All right, okay, now, we just have to make sure she doesn’t find out some other way. Did you think about the trail?
What trail?
The trail from the woman you did it with to the woman you hope never finds out who did it! You always have to think about the trail!
Oh, I-I don’t think there’s any trail.
Okay, okay-okay, ah, Chloe works with that guy Issac. Issac’s sister is Jasmine. And Jasmine works at that message place with Phoebe. And Phoebe’s friends with Rachel. And that’s the trail, I did it!

scene: Monica's Bedroom, Monica and Phoebe are waxing their legs
difficulty_description: 此场景包含简单的日常对话，句型短，词汇基础，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: (reading from the instructions) After applying the Waxine and linen strips to leg number one,
Did that!
Grasp one of the linen strips by its ‘easy grab tab’ and pull it off in one quick pain free motion.
Okay. (Does so.) Ow!!!!! Ow-oh-oh!
Was it not pain-free?
No. It was painful. Oh my God, they should call it Pain-zine, now with a little wax.
Huh, well, the girls in the satin nighties on the commercial don’t seem to think it’s that bad.
That’s because their nerves are probably deadened from being so stupid. But hey, y'know if you don’t believe me, please, be my guest.
(Removing one of the strips) Ow-ow-ow-ow! Oh my God!!!
Now, are you glad we didn’t start with the bikini strips?

scene: The Xerox Place, Ross is trying to break the trail
difficulty_description: 此场景包含较长的对话和复杂的词汇，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: (entering) Chloe? Hi..
Is this about me taking your watch?
You took my watch?
I’m sorry, I do that.
Just you keep it, listen did you, did you tell anyone about us?
Oh no. I feel it isn’t really anybody’s business, y'know.
Exactly. So you didn’t, didn’t mention anything to Issac right?
Oh, well I tell Issac everything.
You tell, of course you do. Issac. Issac. Hey, Issac. Issac, hi! Y'know we haven’t actually met...
You dog!
Yes, I suppose I am a dog. But Issac, see I-I happen to have a girlfriend.
Oh right, that Rachel chick from the coffee place.
Yeah, that’s the one. Listen, I don’t want to hurt her.
Oh, hey, man I know, doesn’t matter how much we love ‘em, monogamy is too cruel a rule.
Yeah. Listen, can you keep this information to yourself?
Aw, no problem dude. Y'know we got to look out for each other. We’re the same, you and me.
Actually, no, we’re not.
Yeah, we are.
No, we’re not.
Yeah, we are.
No, we’re not!!
Okay, we’re not.
Right.
But, we are.
Fine. I just need to know that you’re not gonna tell your sister.
I can promise not to tell her again.

scene: Phoebe’s Work, Ross is now trying to stop Jasmine from telling Phoebe
difficulty_description: 此场景包含相对复杂的词汇和多轮对话，对中级学习者是个挑战。

dialogues.text: (entering out of breath) Jasmine?
Uh-huh.
We met at Phoebe’s birthday party, I’m, I’m Ross Geller.
You did a bad thing!
Yes, I did.
Very bad!
Very bad.
Very, very bad.
I’m agreeing with you. Did you, listen, did you happen to tell Phoebe yet?
No.
Okay, Jasmine, please, please don’t. I love my girlfriend very much, and I want more than anything to just work it out with her. Okay?
All right.
Thank you, thank you.
But you should probably talk to my roommate, because I told him and he knows Phoebe too.
(angrily) Who’s your roommate?

scene: Central Perk, Gunther is wiping down the counter as Ross rushes in
difficulty_description: 此场景对话简洁，主要以短句为主，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: Gunther! Gunther. Gunther, please tell me you didn’t say anything to Rachel about me and the girl from the Xerox place.
I’m sorry. Was I not supposed to?
(Ross turns around and sees Rachel sitting by the window. She is just glaring at him.)

scene: Monica's Bedroom, Monica and Phoebe are removing the rest of their wax strips
difficulty_description: 此场景包含多角色互动，但对话内容较为基础，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: Ow!
Oh!!
Ow!! Ow!!
Ow!!!
Ow!!!!!!! Ow-ow-ow-ow!
(Hearing the screaming Chandler and Joey rush in. Joey has a pan, Chandler has a tea kettle.)
We’re all right.
It’s okay, it’s okay.
We’re all right.
We were just waxing our legs.
Off?!!
For your information, this happens to be a pain like no man will ever experience.
Yeah, well I don’t think you can make that statement, unless you’ve been kicked in an area that God only meant to be treated nicely.
Yeah, I-I think that women just have a lower threshold of pain than men, that’s all. I mean, come on, it’s just a little wax.
Oh yeah, come here. (Puts a little wax on Joey’s arm and puts a strip on it.)
Oh, that’s mature.
Okay, fine, so now what, I just pull it off?
Uh-huh.
That’s right.
(Joey laughs, pulls it off, then does a high-pitched whine.)

scene: Living Room, Rachel is trying to close the door on Ross
difficulty_description: 对话较长且情感激烈，适合有一定基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: (forcing the door open) Come on, Rachel, come on! Talk to me! Please!!
I can’t talk to you. I can’t even look at you right now!

scene: Monica's bedroom, Chandler slowly closes the door, and we hear Rachel from the living room
difficulty_description: 此场景的对话句型和词汇较为基础，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: What?
Nothing, nothing.
(going over to listen at the door) Rachel said everything was okay.
(to Joey) What, what are they talking about?
Rachel?

scene: Living Room, Rachel and Ross having a confrontation
difficulty_description: 对话涉及复杂情感交流和隐喻，适合高级学习者。

dialogues.text: Just get away from me!
No, it was a mistake! I made a mistake! Okay?
A mistake?! What were you trying to put it in? Her purse?!
Ross, you had sex with another woman!

scene: Monica's Bedroom, Monica and Phoebe react to hearing the news
difficulty_description: 此次场景的互动基础语言和对话内容，仍适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: (both Monica and Phoebe gasp.)
Oh my God.
Oh, I knew something had to be wrong, because my fingernails did not grow at all yesterday.
Yeah, well, I guess they had a fight, and he got drunk....
Oh!! (hits Chandler and Joey in the head) You guys knew about this and you didn’t tell us?!
(to Joey) He has sex, and we get hit in our heads.

scene: Living Room, Rachel and Ross continue their confrontation
difficulty_description: 涉及复杂情感交流和冲突，对高级学习者是个挑战。

dialogues.text: (opening the door) Y'know what, I want you to leave! Get outta here!
No!!
Just get out! Now!!
No!! No!! I wanna stay. I wanna talk about this.
Okay! All right! How was she?
What?
Was she good?
She was...
Was she good different?
She was... different.
Nobody likes change.
(Rachel picks up a newspaper and starts beating him with it.)
What? Okay, okay, okay, okay.

scene: Monica's Bedroom, overhearing the argument
difficulty_description: 此场景虽然包含情感冲突，但对话较为简洁，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: Should we do something?
Yeah, never cheat on Rachel.

scene: Living Room, Ross trying to explain his actions to Rachel
difficulty_description: 此次对话复杂情感和解释，适合高级学习者。

dialogues.text: I’m sorry, okay, I’m sorry. I wa—I was disgusted with myself, and this morning I was so, I was so upset and then I got your message and I was so happy, and all I wanted was to get her out of my apartment as fast as possible.
Whoa!! Whoa, whoa, wait a minute. What time did your little friend leave? (Ross can’t answer that) Oh my God. She was there? She was still there? She was in there, when I was in there?!

scene: Rachel confronts Ross about his infidelity in Monica's apartment
difficulty_description: 此场景涉及复杂情感对话，句型多变，包含大量表达情绪和心理的细节，适合高级学习者。

dialogues.text: Listen. Oh hey, hey, the important thing was that she meant, she meant nothing to me!
And yet she was worth jeopardising our relationship!!
Look, I didn’t think there was a relationship to jeopardise. I thought we were broken up.
We were on a break!
That, for all I knew would, could last forever. That to me is a break-up.
You think you’re gonna get out of this on a technicality?
Look, I’m not trying to get out of anything, okay. I thought our relationship was dead!
Well, you sure had a hell of a time at the wake!

scene: Monica's Bedroom: Joey, Monica, and Chandler react to Ross and Rachel's fight
difficulty_description: 此场景包含中等难度的日常对话，部分幽默对话要求学习者有一定的文化背景知识。

dialogues.text: Y'know what, I don’t think we should listen to this anymore.
What, what are you doing? You can’t go out there.
Why not?! I’m hungry.
Because they’ll know we’ve been listening.

scene: Living Room: Ross and Rachel continue their argument
difficulty_description: 复杂的情绪表达和争论对话，适合高级学习者练习深层次的英语表达和理解。

dialogues.text: God! And to have to hear about it from Gunther!!
Come on! Like I wanted him to tell you, I ran all over the place trying to make sure that didn’t happen!
Oh, that is so sweet. I think I’m falling in love with you all over again.

scene: Monica's Bedroom: Chandler, Joey, and Monica decide their next steps
difficulty_description: 此场景包含中等难度的日常对话，句型适中。

dialogues.text: Y'know what, I think we can go out there. I mean they have more important things to worry about.
Yeah, we’ll be fine.
Wax the door shut, we’re never leaving, ever.

scene: Living Room: Ross and Rachel discuss trust and forgiveness
difficulty_description: 情感浓厚的对话，涉及深层次的讨论和复杂句型，适合高级学习者。

dialogues.text: Don’t you realise none of this would’ve ever happened if I didn’t think at that same moment you weren’t having sex with Mark?
All right. Let’s say I had slept with Mark. Would you have been able to forgive me?
Yes I would.
You’d be okay if you knew that Mark had kissed me, and been naked with me, and made love to me?
Yes.
You knew that our hot, sweaty, writhing bodies were....
La-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la! Okay, okay, yeah, I would have been devastated but, I would still want to be with you. Because it’s, I mean it’s you.

scene: Monica's Bedroom: Joey, Monica, and Chandler react to Ross and Rachel's conversation
difficulty_description: 中等难度的对话，包含幽默元素和对当前场景的一些反应。

dialogues.text: Oh man, pizza? I like pizza. Put olives on the pizza.
We could eat the wax! It’s organic.
Oh great, food with hair on it.
No, not the used wax.
Because that would be crazy?

scene: Living Room: Ross and Rachel order pizza
difficulty_description: 此场景包含中等难度的对话，句型适中且涉及幽默和讽刺。

dialogues.text: Hey, can I, can I get in on that? Because I’m kinda hungry myself.
Fine. Hi! Yes, I’d like to order a large pizza.
No anchovies.
With ah, extra anchovies.
That’s okay, I’ll just pick ‘em off.
Yeah, and could you please chop some up and just put it right there in the sauce?

scene: Monica's Bedroom: Joey, Monica, and Chandler talk about Ross and Rachel
difficulty_description: 中等难度的对话，涉及一些幽默和角色的心理活动。

dialogues.text: They’re gonna get through this, aren’t they?
Yeah, come on, it’s Ross and Rachel, they’ve got too.
What if they don’t?
You think I need a new walk?
What?
Well y'know, I’ve been walking the same way since high school. Y'know, y'know how some guys they walk into a room and everybody takes notice. I think I need a ‘take notice’ walk.
Are you actually saying these words?

scene: Living Room: Ross and Rachel have a deep conversation
difficulty_description: 复杂且情感丰富的对话，适合高级学习者练习情感表达和深层次理解。

dialogues.text: What, now you’re not even taking to me? Look Rachel, I-I’m sorry, okay, I’m sorry, I was out of my mind. I thought I’d lost you, I didn’t know what to do. Come on! Come on, how insane must I have been to do something like this? Huh? I-I don’t cheat right, I, that’s not me, I’m not Joey!
No Ross!! Don’t! You can’t just kiss me and think you’re gonna make it all go away, okay? It doesn’t work that way. It doesn’t just make it better. Okay?
Okay, okay, okay.
I think you should go.
What?
I really think you need to go now.
Okay, okay. This morning you said there was nothing so big that we couldn’t work past it together...
Yeah, what the hell did I know!

Look, look, there’s got to be a way we can work past this. Okay, I can’t imagine, I can’t imagine my life without you. Without, without these arms, and your face, and this heart. Your good heart Rach, and, and....

No. I can’t, you’re a totally different person to me now. I used to think of you as somebody that would never, ever hurt me, ever. God, and now I just can’t stop picturing with her, I can’t, it doesn’t matter what you say, or what you do, Ross. It’s just changed, everything. Forever.
Yeah, but this can’t be it, I mean.
Then how come it is?

scene: Monica's Bedroom: Joey, Phoebe, and Chandler react to Ross and Rachel's deep conversation
difficulty_description: 中等难度的对话，包含幽默元素，适合有一定基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: They’ve been quiet for a long time.
Maybe she killed him?
Let’s go.

scene: Living Room: Friends react to Rachel sleeping on the couch
difficulty_description: 简短的对话，适合初级学习者，场景简单明了。

dialogues.text: Is that your new walk?
No, I really have to pee.

scene: Monica's apartment, Joey performs a card trick for the group.
difficulty_description: 包含一些幽默和轻松的对话，句型和词汇对初级者有一定挑战，适合中等水平学习者。

dialogues.text: Okay, pick a card, any card.
Um-mm.
5 of hearts.
Real magic does exist.
Wow.
Wow. Joey, how do you do it?
I can’t tell you that, no.
Ah, somebody’s at the door on the ceiling.
Noo, that’s our unbelievably loud upstairs neighbor.
He took up the carpet, and now you can hear everything.
Why don’t you go up there and ask him to ‘step lightly, please?’
I have like five times, but the guy is so charming, that I go up there to yell and then I end up apologizing to him.
Ooh, that is silly. I’ll go up there, I’ll tell him to keep it down.
All right, be my guest.
Good luck.

scene: Monica's apartment, Joey explains his card trick after Phoebe leaves.
difficulty_description: 对话内容相对简单，涉及日常互动，对初级学习者适合。

dialogues.text: When you handed me back the card, what you didn’t see was, I looked at it so fast that it was invisible to the naked eye.
Oh, I got it.

scene: Monica's apartment, Phoebe confronts the neighbor about the noise.
difficulty_description: 对话简单易懂，词汇量基础，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: Yeah, look I was with my friend downstairs and we hear everything up here that you do, and I am sick and tired...
Whoa, you are very beautiful.
Oh, thank you.

scene: Monica's apartment, continued from earlier. Chandler enters.
difficulty_description: 涉及情感和幽默的对话，句型较复杂，对中等学习者适合。

dialogues.text: Hey, anybody got a length of rope about six feet long with a little nouse at the end?
Honey, what’s the matter?
I just saw Janice.
Oh.
She looked so happy. I almost feel bad for whipping that kid’s pretzel at them.
Man, I remember the first time I saw that girl Katherine, after we broke up.

scene: Fortunata Fashions, Rachel’s new job.
difficulty_description: 包含职场用语和常见对话，句型稍复杂，中级学习者适合。

dialogues.text: How’s that coffee comin,’ dear?
Yeah, right away Mr. Kaplan.
I’m not supposed to drink coffee, it makes me gassy.
I know!
Eh.
Oh, you got me.
I need these hangers separated ASAP.
You’re welcome.

scene: The Moondance Diner, Rachel talks to Monica about her job.
difficulty_description: 涉及情感和工作问题，对话稍复杂，适合中等水平的学习者。

dialogues.text: Oh God, I hate my job, I hate it, I hate my job, I hate it.
I know honey, I’m sorry.
I wanna quit, but then I think I should stick it out.
Gee, I don’t know Rach. Order up!!

scene: Chandler and Joey's, Joey’s birthday party.
difficulty_description: 包含多角色互动，幽默和感情交流，适合高级学习者。

dialogues.text: Hey guys.
Hey Gunther. Hi. I mean you’re going out on a date with the noisy guy upstairs?
Well, he’s very charming.
Joey, where are the Jell-o shots?
I don’t know, Chandler is supposed to be passin’ ‘em around...
Hello-dillillio!!
Oh, somebody’s feeling better.
Stick out your tongue.
Take off your shirt!

scene: Chandler and Joey's, Rachel shares her job news.
difficulty_description: 对话中提到一些职场和关系的关键词，适合中等水平的学习者。

dialogues.text: The most unbelievable thing happened to me today.
Hi!
Hi! So I’m out having lunch at Monica’s and this guy starts talking to me.
Wow!
I know!
What, so this guy is helping you for no apparent reason?
Yeah! His name is um, Mark something.
Huh. Sounds like Mark Something wants to have some sex.
What!? To be nice.
Hey, Joey. Are men ever nice to strange women for no reason?
No, only for sex.

scene: Monica 和朋友们在 Monica 和 Rachel 的公寓里讨论
difficulty_description: 此场景包含对话情境变化较多，句型多样，有一定深度，适合有一定基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: So, he’s just a nice guy. You really think this Mark doesn’t want anything in exchange for helping him?
Well, I assume I’ll have to take showers with him, but y'know, that’s true of any job.
How ya feelin’?
Well, my apartment isn’t there anymore, because I drank it.
Where’d you get too? We lost you after you opened up all the presents.

scene: Chandler 谈论他和 Joey 的姐姐的事
difficulty_description: 此场景包含复杂对话和情境，涉及理解角色心理和文化背景知识，适合高级学习者。

dialogues.text: Hey, Joey.
Come on!!
Why can’t we talk in here? With, with, witnesses.
I just got off the phone with my sister.
Ah, which, which one?
Mary-Angela.
Mary-Angela.
Now is that true? Or are you just gettin’ over Janice by groping my sister.
It’s gotta be the first one.
Really? That’s great! You and my sister, sittin’ in a tree.
Yep, I’m in a tree.

scene: Chandler 在 Joey 的姐姐的房子
difficulty_description: 此场景包含对话情境变化较多，句型多样，有一定深度，适合有一定基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Joey, what-wh-wh-wha-wh-wha-wh-wha-wh-wha-what are you doing here?
Waiting for my Grandma to finish my laundry. What about you?
I’m here to see Mary-Angela.

You are so the man! Now look, listen, listen, you got to be cool, ‘cause my Grandma doesn’t know about you two yet, and you do not want to tick her off. She was like the sixth person to spit on Mussolini's hanging body. Yeah.
Where’s Mary-Angela?
She’s right in there.
Would you just please....give me the receipt ‘cause this is great. It’s top notch.
That dies with me.
So will I.
Excuse yourself, and go to the bathroom.
Oh no-no-no I was just squinting. That doesn’t mean anything.
Just do it.
Will you excuse me I have to um.....
Finally, I thought we’d never be alone. Can I just tell you something, I have not stopped thinking about you since the party.
Look, I may have jumped the gun here.
Ahhhh, you’re not Mary-Angela.
No, I’m Mary-Theresa.
I am!
Mary-Angela was right you do have the softest lips.
This is so bad. If-if you’re not Mary-Angela, then-then who is?
Joey!!!
No Joey! No Joey! Don’t Joey! Joey!
What’s goin’ on?
You’re it! Now run and hide!
It’s no big deal. Chandler was just kissin’ me because he thought I was Mary-Angela.
What?! How could you do that, how could you think she was Mary-Angela?
I wasn’t sure which one Mary-Angela was.
I say, punch him Joey.
Yeah! Punch him!!
Y'know what, we should all calm down because your brother’s not going to punch me. Are ya?
Well, that is usually what I would do. But I just never thought you’d be on the receiving end of it. How could you do this?!

Joey if you wanna punch me, go ahead, I deserve it. But I just want you to know that I would never soberly hurt you or your family, you’re my best friend. I would never do anything like this ever again.
So what. I say, punch him.
Yeah! Punch him! Punch him!
No! No! No! No, I’m not going to punch Chandler.
I’ll do it.
No you won’t. Look he knows he did a terrible thing and I believe him, he’s sorry. But, you’ve got one more apology to make, all right, you’ve got to apologize to Mary-Angela.
Okay, absolutely!
All right.
You’ve got it.
Cookie, now you can punch him!
What?!
(punches him)

scene: Monica 和 Ross 在 Central Perk 安慰 Rachel
difficulty_description: 此场景包含情感对话和建议，句型和词汇相对丰富，适合有一定基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: I can’t believe Mark didn’t call. It’s Sunday night, and he didn’t call.
Bummer.
Yeah, right. Look at you, you’re practically giddy.
No, I’m genuinely sorry the Mark thing didn’t work out. Look, Rach, I want only good things for you.
Wait a minute, why don’t you just call Mark. I mean, who says you have to sit here and wait for him, you’ve got to make stuff happen.
Yeah, and you don’t mind if I call, because you only want good things for me.
That’s right good things, that-that is what I said.
Hello, Mark? Hi, it’s Rachel Green.

scene: Monica 在视频商店遇见了没有胡子的 Richard
difficulty_description: 场景包含中等难度的对话，句型稍复杂，有一定的语法和词汇基础。

dialogues.text: Hi.
Six dollars, please.
Six? I just had it for one night. It’s three.
Eight o’clock is the cut-off and, aww, it’s 8:02.
Y'know in a weird way, you have too much power. Look, you’re gonna have to help me out here, ‘cause I only have three.
I can help with that.
Oh my God. Richard? Hi!
Hi!
Wow! Your lip went bald. Hey, thanks.
So, you look great.
Right.
No you do. You... just...
What?
You’ve got panties stuck to your leg.
That’s because I-I was just grabbing some things out of the dryer, and it’s static cling. Or maybe it’s just that God knew I’d be running into you and saw an opportunity.
It’s good to see you.
It’s good to see you too.

scene: Monica 和 Richard 在视频商店聊天
difficulty_description: 句型稍复杂，有一定的语法和词汇基础。

dialogues.text: You see that guy? He’s in classics now, but y'know as soon as we leave he’s going straight to the porn.
He’s gonna go up to the counter with Citizen Kane, Vertigo, and Clockwork Orgy.
This is nice.
Yeah.
I missed this.
Me too.
So, you wanna get a hamburger or something?
Oh, um, I don’t know if that’s a good idea.
Oh. Look, just friends, I won’t grope you. I promise.
No, I just I think that it’s too soon.
No it’s not too soon, I had lunch at eleven.

scene: Monica 和朋友们在 Monica 和 Rachel 的家吃早餐
difficulty_description: 包含多个角色的互动，句型较复杂，有一定的语法和词汇基础。

dialogues.text: Yeah, baby!
What are you doing?
Making chocolate milk. Do you want some?
No thanks. I’m 29.
Oh my God, I gotta go to work!
Oh sweetie, when do you think you’re going to get off tonight?
Oh I don’t know honey. It’s gonna be really late.
Oh come on, not again.
I know. I’m sorry. Look, I’ll make a deal with you all right? Okay?
Hmm.
For every night that you’re asleep before I get home from work...
Yeah.
I will wake you up in a way that’s proved very popular in the past.
Now, if you need to stay late, I want to be supportive of that.
Hi.
Hey.
Look at you. Since when do you roller blade?
Oh! Since tomorrow. I met this really cute guy in the park and he like y'know, jogs, and blades, and swims, and so y'know we made a deal that’s he’s going to teach me all sorts of jock stuff.
And what are you going to do for him?
I’m going to let him.
Okay.
Cool.
Morning.
Hey.
Somebody got in late last night.
Yeah well, I ran into Richard.
When did this happen?
Oh, um, around 8:02. We ah, talked for a little while, and then um, we went out for an innocent burger.
Oh, there’s no such thing as an innocent burger.
So, are you gonna see him again?
Tomorrow night.
Monica, what are you doing?
Well, she spent the last six months getting over him, and now she’s celebrating that by going on a date with him.
It’s not a date, okay. I’m just gonna teach him how to make lasagne for some pot luck dinner he has.
Well, you might wanna make a little extra, y'know you’ll probably be hungry after the sex.
