Well, I was with Carol for like eight years and I lost her. And now if it's possible I think I love you even more. So, it's hard for me to believe that I'm not gonna, well that someone else is not going to take you away.
Let it be me! Let it be me!
Honey, that's very sweet, it just seems to me though, that if two people love each other and trust each other, like we do, there's no reason to be jealous.
(she kisses him)

scene: Central Perk 中 Ross 告诉 Rachel 关于与脱衣舞娘的玩耍安排
difficulty_description: 此场景包含复杂的谈论与情感交流，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: I gotta get going. Bye Chandler.
Oh, okay Ross. Listen, this pen is kinda getting boring, so can you pick me up some porn?
Where ya going?
Oh, I've got to go pick up Ben, we've got a play date this afternoon.
Ohh, with who?
Oh, just this woman that I met last night at the party.
There was a woman at the... The stripper?!
Yeah.
You have a play date with a stripper?!
Man, I gotta get a kid.
(looks at the pen and starts laughing)
Ah, yeah, yeah. Umm, we started talking after she y'know, did her thing. And it turns out she's got a boy about Ben's age, so we're taking them to a gym-boree class. Why, is that okay?
Sure, is she married?
Ahh, no.
Oh.
(starts shaking the sugar down in a packet really hard.)
Are you jealous?
Noo, I y'know I don't see why she has to play with you, that's all. I mean doesn't she have any y'know other stripper moms friends of her own?
You are totally jealous.
I'm not jealous. All right this is about, umm, people feeling certain things y'know about strippers. And y'know, and um, I...
Honey, I love you too.
Ugh. Wait, wait, wait.
What?
(She runs over and gives him a very passionate kiss.)
Huh.
(to Chandler) Well, there's a kiss that he won't forget for a couple of hours, y'know.
Yeah. Either that, or you just turned him on and sent him off to a stripper.

scene: Moondance Diner 中 四重奏唱歌羞辱 Julio
difficulty_description: 此场景包含简单的对话和歌曲，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: Is there a Julio here?
I am Julio.
(singing) Mister Pretensous, you think there's no one finer, well but your poems are unpublished, and you work in a diner.
You're no God's gift to women, that's all in your headddd. You are just a buttmunch.
No one likes a buttmunch.
And you're also bad in bedd-edd-edd!
(Monica waves at Julio.)

scene: Chandler 和 Joey 的公寓，房间里有许多木材
difficulty_description: 此场景包含简单的日常对话，句型短，词汇基础，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: (entering) Hey!
Hey!
Hey-hey-hey. So what happened? A forest tick you off?
No. Y'know how we’re always saying we need a place for the mail.
Yeah!
Well, I started building one. But then I decided to take it to the next step.
You’re building a post office?
No, an entertainment unit, with a mail cubby built right in. It’s a one day job, max.
Okay. (notices that Joey is wearing some really tight jeans) My word! Those are snug.
Oh yeah. These are my old work pants, Sergio Valente’s.
Power saw kinda got away from me there.

scene: Central Perk 外的街道，Phoebe 在等待某人
difficulty_description: 此场景对话较长，但词汇和句型仍简单，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: (joining Phoebe outside) Hey Pheebs.
Hey!
Any sign of your brother?
No, but he’s always late.
I thought you only met him once?
Yeah, I did. I think it sounds y'know big sistery, y'know, ‘Frank’s always late.’
Well relax, he’ll be here.

No, I know, I’m just nervous. Y'know it’s just y'know Mom’s dead, don’t talk to my sister, Grandma’s been sleeping a lot lately. It’s like the last desperate chance to have a family, y'know, kinda thing. You’re so sweet to wait with me.
Well, actually Gunther sent me. You’re not allowed to have cups out here, it’s a thing. (takes her cup and goes back inside)

scene: Central Perk 内，大家在讨论
difficulty_description: 此场景包含复杂句型和较长对话，要求学习者具备一定语法和词汇基础。

dialogues.text: Does anyone else think David Copperfield is cute?
No, but he told me, he thinks your a fox.
All right, Janice, likes him. In fact she likes him so much she put him on her freebie list.
Her what?
Well, we have a deal, where we each get to pick five celebrities that we can sleep with, and the other one can’t get mad.
Ah, the heart of every healthy relationship. Honesty, respect, and sex with celebrities.
So, Chandler, who’s on your list?
Ah, Kim Basinger, Cindy Crawford, Halle Berry, Yasmine Bleeth, and ah, Jessica Rabbit.
Now, you do realize that she’s a cartoon, and way out of your league?
I know, I know, I just always wondered if I could get her eyes to pop out of her head.
Hey, Monica, who would yours be?
First, I need a boyfriend, then I can have a list.
It’s just a game Mon. (makes a ‘Can-you-believe-her’ face to the rest of the gang.) Rach, how about you?
Oh, I don’t know, I guess, Chris O’Donnel, John F. Kennedy, Jr., Daniel Day Lewis, Sting, and Parker Stevenson.
Spiderman?
Hardy Boy.
Peter Parker.
Thank you.
What about you honey, who would be on your list?
Well I-I-I, that kind of thing requires some serious thought. First, I’ll divide my perspective canidates into catergories....
(coughing) What a geek!
(entering) Everbody this is Frank! This is my half-brother Frank.
Oh, hi.
This is everybody. This is Ross.
How are you?
Hey.
Chandler.
Hi.
Hi.
Joey.
Hey-hey!
Hey.
This is Monica.
Whoa!
And this is Rachel.
Hi!
Whoa!!
I’m gonna get coffee.
Hey, how do you guys get anything done?
We don’t, really.
Well, so, now, do you guys have a lot of big plans?
Oh yeah! Yeah, no, we’re gonna connect, y'know bond, and everything.
Yeah, I was thinking that maybe we could go down to Time Square and pick up some ninja stars. And, oh, um, my friend Larry, he wants me to take a picture of a hooker.
You know, we don’t really take advantage of living in the city.
I know.

scene: Chandler 和 Joey 的公寓，Joey 正在钻墙
difficulty_description: 此场景包含简单的句子和日常用语，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: Oh, I’m sorry. Did I get ‘ya?
No, you didn’t get me!! It’s an electric drill, you get me, you kill me!!
Calm down, do you want this unit or not?
I do NOT want this unit!!
Well, you should’ve told me that before, I’m not a mind reader. Hey, we’re out of beer. I’m going to Monica’s.
Fine! (goes into his room and slams the door, then he slams the bottom half of the door.)

scene: Monica 和 Rachel 的公寓，Joey 进入房间
difficulty_description: 此场景包含简单的句子和日常对话，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: Hey! Where ‘ya headin’ in those pants? 1982?
Oh Monica, listen, I ah, I saw down at the hardware store, they got those designer tiles on sale. If you ever want to redo the bathroom floor.
Why, what’s wrong with my bathroom floor?
Nothing. It’s just old and dingy, that’s all.
I highly doubt that. (they both go to the bathroom)
Oh yeah. If you ah, move your hamper, you see what color the tile used to be. (Monica gasps) Yeah.
I can’t live like this! What are we gonna do? What are we gonna do?
Relax. Here hold this (hands her his beer). This old stuff just comes right off. (he bends down to try and lift some tile right in the middle of the floor, in his tight pants.)
That’s a little more than I wanted to see.

(manages to pry off only a small piece) Aw! Look at that, every inch of this stuff is glued down. It’d take forever to pry this up. You should ah, you should just leave it. (starts to walk away, but Monica grabs him)
I can’t leave it! You gouged a hole in my dingy floor.
Eh! There you go.
You know that’s nice, y'know we could put it back there after the surgeons remove it from your colon!

scene: Phoebe 的公寓，Phoebe 和 Frank 在看电视
difficulty_description: 此场景对话较长，并且包含一些较为随意的交谈，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: (坐起) Oh, ew!
What?
Yeah I know what I wanted to ask you. Um, can you roll your tongue? Because I can, and my Mom couldn’t, and I thought y'know, I figured that was something I got from our Dad.
What, wait, you mean like this? (does it)
Yeah, yeah. You can do it to. (tries to do it, but can’t)
Your not doing it.
Oh right, yeah okay, my Mom could, and I can’t. We don’t have that....
When’s your birthday?
Feburary 16th.
I know a guy who’s the 18th.
Wow, that’s close. When’s yours?
October 25th.
That’s the same month as Halloween. So, um, what kinda things do you like to do at home?
Melt stuff.

scene: Ross and friends are discussing his list of celebrities he's allowed to sleep with at Central Perk
difficulty_description: 包含较长和相对复杂的句型，需要理解语境和幽默，适合有一定基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Okay, I’ve got three of my five.
Three of your five, what?
Celebrities I’m allowed to sleep with.
Oh my God! You are giving this a lot of thought.
Yeah, it’s hard okay, I only have two spots left.
All right, so who do you got it narrowed down to?
Okay, Elizabeth Hurley....
Oooh-hoo, very attractive, forgiving.
Susan Sarandon.
Eh, y'know what, she’s too political, she probably wouldn’t let you do it, unless you donated four cans of food first.
And!! Isabella Rossellini.
Ooh-hoo. Very hot, very sexy. But ah, y'know she’s too international, y'know she’s never gonna be around.
So?
So, you gotta play the odds, pick somebody who’s gonna be in the country like all the time.
Yeah, ‘cause that’s why you won’t get Isabella Rossellini, geography.

scene: Phoebe and Frank are at Phoebe's apartment, discussing Frank's melting habits
difficulty_description: 对话内容较日常，但包含一些非字面意思，要求学习者具备基础日常对话的能力。

dialogues.text: Okay so, by melting, you meant melting.
Yeah.
So is it like art?
Yeah, you can melt art. Hey, can I use your phone?
Um, yeah sure. Why you wanna call your Mom?
No, I wanna melt it.
Oh, well um, not right now. Y'know I’m just gonna go to bed, I think the fumes are giving me a headache.
(starts laughing) Yeah!
G’night, bro.
G’night.
Here. (gives him a fire extinguisher) Y'know, just in case.
Oh, excellent. (starts to melt the fire extinguisher’s hose.)

scene: Monica and Rachel's, Phoebe and Monica are eating breakfast while Frank is playing with nunchucks on the balcony
difficulty_description: 包含一些较长的句子和幽默对话，需要对不同习惯表达方式的理解。

dialogues.text: What kind of karate is that?
No kind. He just makes it up.
So how’s it going with you guys?
So far, it kinda blows. I don’t know, I just thought y'know that he’d feel more like a brother y'know, like you and Ross, just like close and connected and....

Oh honey, we’re close now but you-you wouldn’t believe the years of-of nugies, and wedgies, and flying wedgies, and atomic wedgies, and....(Phoebe shakes her head like she doesn’t understand) That’s where the waistband actually goes over your head.
Ah!!
Oh, we used to drive each other crazy playing the shadow game.
Oh, how do you play the shadow game?
Oh, how do you play the shadow game?
I just asked you.
I just asked you.
I don’t have time for this.
No, that is what the game is.
Which you just gave up really quickly.
(entering) Have you seen Joey?
What’s the matter?
Oh, just this! (turns around and has a paint lid stuck to the back of his pants.) Y’know what it’s my fault really, because the couch is usually where we keep the varnish.
(yelling from bathroom) Hey, does somebody wanna hand me one of those tiles.
What’s going on?
He’s retiling my floor.
(they both run to the bathroom) Ah-ah-ah, now you started this, you will finish it.
He started mine first!
Build the unit Cinderelly, lay the tile Cinderelly.

scene: Phoebe’s work, Phoebe and Frank have an uncomfortable interaction with another girl
difficulty_description: 对话内容日常但包含一些潜在复杂的情感和误解，适合有一定语言能力的学习者。

dialogues.text: Ow!-Ow!-Ow! Ow! Ow! Ow! Ow! Ow! Ow! Y'know, ow!
Hey!-Hey! What’s going on?
She broke my arm.
He touched my fanny.
No, she touched mine first!
That’s my job!
So wait, what’s the deal here, I can have sex with you, but I can’t touch you?
Ewww!!!
You can’t have sex with her!
What’d you think I was, a hooker?
No, your a masseuse, it’s cool, I’m not a cop.
Okay, Jasmine, can you, can you ask Mr. Whiffler if he can wait for like five minutes.
Fine. (starts to leave, and points at Frank) I don’t like you!! (leaves)
(turns around and hits Frank) So that’s what you thought I did!! God! That’s not what I do!
Wait that’s-that’s, what that’s not what you do?
Nooo! Why would you think that?
I don’t know, I mean, y'know, this is the city y'know, I just, I mean, I don’t know.
Whatever, it’s the perfect end to the perfect weekend anyways.
Oh, wait, no your right, no it was perfect and I can’t believe that I screwed it up so bad.
You really thought it was perfect?
Well, no, maybe-maybe it wasn’t perfect, but y'know it was pretty cool, y'know, ‘cause we had all those great talks y'know.
Yeah, um, which ones in particular were great for you?
Well y'know about the tongue thing, y'know, and how I told you about my likes and my dislikes...
I don’t....
How-how I like to melt stuff, and how I dislike stuff that doesn’t melt.
Right, okay, um-mm.
Yeah, y'know I feel like I can really talk to you ‘cause y'know you’re my sister, y'know.
Yeah, I guess I do, yeah.
Then I go feel your friend up and make you mad at me.
Well, I-I wasn’t hopping mad, y'know.
You hopped a little bit. Yeah, I really sorry.
Okay. All right, this is my favorite part of the weekend, right now, this.
This?
Uh-huh.
Oh come on we went, we went to Time Square, we found ninja stars, I almost got my arm broken by a hooker...
She wasn’t a hooker.
Well, when I tell my friends about her she will be.

scene: Chandler 和 Joey 的公寓中，大家帮忙把娱乐中心挪到位
difficulty_description: 此场景包含较长的对话和一些幽默用语，适合有一定基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Okay, on three. One....Two....
Why don’t we just go on two.
Why two?
Because it’s faster.
Yeah, I coulda counted to three like four times without all this ‘two’ talk.
Oh!
All right, but in the future...
Okay!! Okay!!
Come on!
Heavy thing, not getting lighter!
Okay, one...two...
So we are going on two?
All right!!
Oh, good job Joe.
Wow, it’s big!
Yeah-yeah, so big that it actually makes our doors look smaller!
Maybe, my ruler’s wrong.
Maybe all the rulers are wrong.
Look it’s not that bad. So what, it blocks a little of your door, a little of my door.
Yeah, y'know what I got a better idea. How-how ‘bout it blocks none of mine door and a lot of yours?
Yeah, listen, before I forget that side is still wet.

scene: 中央公园咖啡馆，Rachel 在为顾客点单
difficulty_description: 此场景包含复杂的点单对话和文化相关的幽默，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: Okay sir, um-mm, let see if I got this right. Ah, so this is a half-caf, double tall, easy hazel nut, non-fat, no foam, with whip, extra hot latte, right?
(nods)
Okay, great. (under her breath) You freak.
Um, coffee to go, please.
Thank you.
Isabella Rosselini.
Are you serious? (they all look) Oh my God.
Damn! I can’t believe I took her off my list.
Why? ‘Cause otherwise you’d go for it?
Yeah, maybe.
Oh-oh, you lie.
What you don’t think I’d go up to her?
Ross, it took you ten years to finally admit you liked me.
Yeah, well missy, you better be glad that list is laminated.
You know what honey, you go ahead, we’ll call her an alternate.
Okay, hold my crawler.
Okay.
Rach, are you really gonna let him do this?
Honey, he’s about to go hit on Isabella Rosselini. I’m just sorry we don’t got popcorn.

Hi! Hi, I’m Ross, you don’t know me, but I’m a big, big fan of yours. I mean, Blue Velvet, woo-oo hoo! Um, I was wondering if I could um, maybe buy you a cup of coffee? Or maybe reimburse you for that one?
Aren’t you with that girl over there?
Well, yeah, kinda. Um, but that’s okay, see we have an understanding, um, see we each have this list of five famous people, so I’m allowed to sleep with you. No, no, no, it’s flattery.
I’m sorry.
Oh no, no, no, wait, wait, Isabella. Don’t, don’t just dismiss this so fast. I mean this is a once in a lifetime opportunity...
Yeah, for you. Is that the list?
Um, yeah.
May I see it?
Um, no.
Come on!
But, okay.
I’m not on the list!
Um, see, but that’s not the final draft.
It’s laminated!
Yeah, um, okay see, you were, you were on the list but my friend, Chandler brought up the very good point that you are international, so I bumped you for Wynona Rider, local.
Y'know it’s ironic...
What?
...because I have a list of five goofy coffee house guys and yesterday I bumped you for that guy over there.
We’re just gonna be friends.

scene: Chandler 和 Joey 的公寓，他们正在欣赏娱乐中心
difficulty_description: 这个场景对话简短，幽默轻松，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: Y'know what?
Umm?
I bet ‘ya ya I could fit in there.
I’ve got five bucks says you can’t.
Get out your checkbook, mister.
Oh, I think I have the cash.
You are dogged man! I totally fit!
Yeah, you got me. I’m out five big ones! Here you go.
Thank you. Cha-ching! And the drinks are on me!

scene: Central Perk, the gang, except Rachel, is watching a new singer.
difficulty_description: 此场景包含较为复杂的句型和多轮对话，适合有一定英语基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: ‘Cause every time I see your face, I can’t help but fall from grace. I know.....
Wow! This girl is good.
Oh-ho yeah! A song with rhyming words. Oo, I never thought of that before.
I like her.
Why? Because she can sing and play guitar and do both at the same time?
Well, that’s pretty much all I’m looking for from these people.
Look at you. All jealous.
Yeah Pheebs, come on, you two have completely different styles. Y'know, she’s more..(shakes his shoulders, like he’s dancing) y'know, and you’re more (sees the look from Phoebe and stops)
beside meeeee-eeee-ee. (everyone applauds her).
Okay, see, see, everyone else is happy she’s done.
Okay, my next song’s called: Phoebe Buffay, What Can I Say. I Really Loved When We Were Singing Partners, And I Shouldn’t Have Left You That Way.
Oh no, one of those ‘look for the hidden meaning’ songs.

scene: Central Perk, later.
difficulty_description: 此场景涉及更多角色之间的问答和日常对话，适合有一定英语基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Hey Phoebe.
Hey Leslie, how’d you know I’d be here?
I ran into Vlad at the place where they sell the big fish, and he said you played here a lot, so umm....
(to Ross) All right listen, I have to go to the bathroom, but if the place with the big fish comes up again. I’d like know whether that’s several big fish or just one big fish.
(to Leslie) So ah, Phoebe tells us you write jingles.
Actually I said she abandoned me to write jingles.
(to Leslie) Ah, anything we might of heard of?
Ah, yeah, umm. (singing) Home is never far away..
(joining in) Home is Home Star stew.
Yeah, but, I don’t do that anymore. I got kinda sick of it, and then I couldn’t come up with anything good, so they fired me.
Hmm, bummer.
Well, I y'know, I was just, umm, I was just thinking and hoping, that umm, maybe you’d want to get back together?
No. But thanks.
Aw come on Phoebe would you just think about it?
Okay. No. But thanks.
Okay, ah, see ya Pheebs. (leaves)
(to Phoebe) Wow, that was kinda brutal.

Well okay, let this be a lesson to all of you, all right. Once you, once you betray me, I become like the ice woman, y’know. Very cold, hard, unyielding, y'know nothing, nothing can penetrate this icy exterior. (to Monica) Can I have a tissue, please?
Yeah, sure.

scene: Outside the bathroom, Chandler is pacing back and fourth, waiting to use it.
difficulty_description: 此场景包含简单的对话和幽默感，句子短，易于理解，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: (to Chandler) Someone in there?
No. This is just part of a dare devil game that I play called ‘wait until the last moment before I burst and die.’
(sees it’s a beautiful woman coming out of the men’s room) Hi! So ah, did ya, did-did-did ya fall high?
Someone was in the lady's room, I couldn’t wait. I left the lid up for ya though.
(to Gunther) Y'know what Gunther, go ah, go ahead, I’m-I’m talking to ah, (tries to get her to say her name). (to her) This is the part where you say your name.
Ginger.
Ginger. I’m talking to Ginger, so....
Don’t you have to use the bathroom?
Nope, nope, I’d just ah, I’d rather talk to you. (pause) Yes, I do. Yes, I do have to go to the bathroom. (knocks on the door)
Someone in here.

scene: Central Perk, the gang’s putting their coats on to leave.
difficulty_description: 此场景包含多轮对话和幽默对话，适用于有较好英语听力和理解能力的学习者。

dialogues.text: Where’s Chandler?
Ah, he can’t make it, he said he had to his... (sees Ginger) Whoa-oh! (hides behind the coat rack.)
Joey? Joey Tribbiani?
(puts his finger over his mouth to tell Ross to keep quiet. Ginger looks at Monica who looks away and leave.)
Phew, close one.

scene: Rachel’s office, Mark is packing his stuff into a box.
difficulty_description: 此场景涉及复杂情感和多层次的表达，适合英语高级学习者。

dialogues.text: Hi.
Hi, sweetie!
Hi, Ross.
Yeah, huh.
I’ve got some bad news.
What?
I can get a quick bite to eat, but then I have to come back up here.
Come on sweetie! You’ve had to work late every night for the past two weeks, what is it this time?
Actually, it’s kinda my fault. I-I quit today.
(to Rachel) But work comes first! (to Mark) Oh hey, but that’s sad about you though, what happened? Burn out? Burn all out, did ya?
Nooo, he’s leaving for a better job.
Oh well that’s great, so I guess this is ah, this is good bye then. Huh? (picks a pad up off Rachel’s desk and tosses it into his box) Good bye.
Okay, then.
Okay.
Well we’re gonna miss you around here.
Yeah, me too.
So, see ya on Saturday.
Yeah, you bet.
(shocked, but Rachel drags him out of the office.)

scene: Monica and Rachel's, Phoebe and Monica are playing with a Ouija board, Phoebe’s beeper goes off and Monica screams.
difficulty_description: 此场景包含更长对话和幽默元素，适用于有一定英语理解和口语水平的学习者。

dialogues.text: Oh. (takes her beeper puts in a pot, covers it, and puts the pot in the oven)
Y'know those are a delicacy in India.
Yeah, that was Leslie calling again to see if we can get back together. That’s the twentieth time today! And good luck Leslie!
Wow, she must have hurt you pretty bad, huh?
Well, yeah. Y'know, we were best friends, ever since we were little, our Moms worked on the barge together.
Oh, you two must have been so cute running around on a barge.
You never run on a barge!
(entering) Hey.
Hey.
Is ah, is Chandler around?
No, umm, he met some girl at the coffee house.
Oooh.
Yeah, Ginger something.
Nooo. No, no, ah, are you sure it wasn’t something that sounded like Ginger, like ah, Gingeer?
No, it was Ginger. I remember, because when he told me, I said, (singing) ‘the movie star.’
Aww, man. That’s the girl I was hiding from. When she finds out he’s my roommate, she’s gonna tell him what I did.
Well, what did you do?
What, oh, oh, oh, no, no, I can’t, I can’t tell you that, it’s like the most awful, horrible thing I’ve ever done my whole life.
Y'know what, don’t tell us. We’ll just wait until Chandler gets home, (to Phoebe) because it’ll be more fun that way.

All right!! Okay, it was like four years ago. Okay, Ginger and I had gone out a few times, and then this one weekend, we went up to her Dad’s cabin. Just me, her, and her annoying little dog Pepper. Well that night, I cooked this really romantic dinner....
You gave her food poisoning!?

I wish. No. After dinner, me, her, and Pepper all fell asleep in front of the fire. Well I woke up in the middle of the night and I saw that the fire was dying out. So, I picked up a log and threw it on. Or, at least what I thought was a log.
Oh my God!! You threw Pepper on the fire!
I wish. See, I guess another thing I probably should’ve told you about Ginger is that she kinda has a ah, artificial leg.
(both stand up and gasp)
Oh my God! Joey, what did you do after you threw her leg on the fire?
I ran!!

scene: Chandler and Ginger kissing on the street
difficulty_description: 此场景包含简单的日常对话，句型短，词汇基础，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: Well, that’s the best kiss I’ve had with anyone I’ve ever met in a men’s room.
Actually, me too.
Op, foot in a puddle, foot all in a puddle.
Oh damn, I hate that.
Yeah, we’re gonna have to get you out of those shoes.
Oh, don’t worry about it.
No, really you’re gonna freeze.
No, I’m not.
You’re not, what do you, what do you got a bionic foot?
Some day, maybe.

scene: Rachel and Ross in Ross’s bedroom
difficulty_description: 此场景涉及中等难度的句型和情感对话，要求学习者具备一定的语法和词汇基础。

dialogues.text: Funny book?
Hmmm. Oh, no, no, I just thinking about something funny I heard today. Umm, Mark, Mark saying 'I’ll see you Saturday.'
Yeah, at the lecture, I told you that last week, you said you didn’t mind.
Oh, no, no, no, it’s-it’s not the lecture ah, I mind, umm....
Oh, please tell me it’s not because I’m going with Mark.
Oh, well...
Oh my God!!! Ross!!
Well, I’m sorry, but ah, look if you’re not working with him anymore, why do you have to still do stuff with him?
Because, he’s my friend.
Okay, but do you really need another friend? I mean...
Okay, well if I stop playing with Joey and Chandler, can I play with Mark?
Is that funny? Am I supposed to be laughing?

I don’t know, you thought 'See you Saturday' was funny. Look honey, Mark is in fashion okay, I like having a friend that I can share this stuff with. You guys would never want to go to a lecture with me.
Pa-haa!! I would love to go with you.
Really!?
Yeah, hey I-I have clothes, I even pick them out. I mean for, for all you know I could be a fashion..... monger.
Okay. Honey, I would love for you to go with me. What?
What should I wear, now I’m all nervous.

scene: Monica and Rachel's apartment, Phoebe and Monica
difficulty_description: 此场景包含简单的日常对话，句型短，词汇基础，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: It’s just y'know, been a couple of hours, and she hasn’t called. Not that I even care, y'know.
Phoebe why don’t you just call her? You obviously want to.
You think you know me so well.
Well, don’t ‘cha wanna?
Yeah.
Okay, well I do know you.
That’s what I said.
Well so?

I can’t. I can’t. She dumped me, I mean I totally trusted her and then one day it was ‘Okay, bye Pheebs’ gone. Y'know what the saddest part is, when we were playing together, that was like the most fun I’ve ever had in like all my lives.

scene: Central Perk, Leslie and Phoebe singing
difficulty_description: 此场景包含中等难度的词汇和句型，适合具备一定语法和词汇基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: (singing) My best shoes, so good to me. I wear them everyday. Down at the heel, holes in the toes. Don’t care what people say. My feet’s best friends, pals to the end. With them I’m one hot chicky. Though late one night, not much light, I....
(singing) I stepped in something icky.
(singing) Sticky shoes, sticky shoes, always make me smile. Sticky shoes, sticky shoes, next time I’ll.... avoid the..... pillleeeee.

scene: Lecture, Ross and Rachel attending
difficulty_description: 此场景包含复杂的情感对话和文化背景，适合高级学习者。

dialogues.text: We’re beginning to see a lot of layering of sheer fabrics and colours. For instance a sheer navy blouse over a pink....
I’m really glad we came. You’re so pretty. I love you.
Oh. (puts her hand over his mouth)

scene: Central Perk, Phoebe teaching Leslie how to sing Smelly Cat
difficulty_description: 此场景涉及中等难度的对话，并包含音乐相关的词汇，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: (singing) Smelly cat, smelly cat, what are they feeding you? Smelly cat, smelly cat, it’s not your fault.
Wow, that’s great.
Oh, yeah!
Y'know you could totally sell this. It’d be perfect for like umm, a kitty litter campaign.
I..., a jingle? No, no-no-no, no.
What? Why not? You could make a ton of money.
Okay, well if I was in this for the money, I’d be a millionaire by now, y'know. You just got to get out of that jingle head sweetie.
Aw, you’re right, you’re right. I’m sorry.
That’s okay. All right, I’m gonna play song that’s really, really sad. It’s called Magician Box Mix Up. (she turns her guitar upside down to play it.)

scene: Lecture, Ross and Rachel
difficulty_description: 此场景包含复杂的情感对话和文化背景，适合高级学习者。

dialogues.text: ....oversized bracelets, oversized earrings, oversizing of accessories in general are very popular now.
What should I wear, now I’m all nervous.

scene: Chandler and Joey's apartment, Chandler and Monica
difficulty_description: 此场景涉及三人中等难度的对话，适合具备一定语法和词汇基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Hi!
Hey.
Oh, can I borrow this? My milk’s gone bad.
Oh, I hate that. I once had a thing of half and half, stole my car.
So umm, how was your date with Ginger?
Great. It was great. She’s ah, she’s great, great looking, great personality, she’s greatness.
Sounds like she’s got the ah, whole package.
Joey told you about the leg, huh?
Uh-huh.

Oh God, it freaked me out. Okay, I know it shouldn’t have, but it did. I mean I like her, I don’t want to stop seeing her, but every so often it’s like ‘Hey, y'know what, where’s your leg?’ I mean I’m the smallest person in the world aren’t I? I’m the smallest person in the world.
Morning.
Actually he’s the smallest person in the world.
Heard about the leg burnin’ huh?
It came up.
Listen, I ah, I know it’s a longshot. But, by any chance did she find that funny?
(Both Chandler and Monica walk away in disgust.)

scene: Monica and Rachel's, Ross and Rachel discussing the lecture
difficulty_description: 涉及复杂的情感表达和争论，适合高级学习者。

dialogues.text: So I nodded off a little.
Nodded off!! Ross you were snoring. My father’s boat didn’t make that much noise when it hit rocks!
Come on! Forty-five minutes! Forty-five minutes the man talked about strappy backed dresses.

Well okay, how about four hours in a freezing museum auditorium listening to Professor Pitstains and he’s ‘Hey everybody! Remember that thing that’s been dead for a gazillion years. Well there’s this little bone we didn’t know it had!’
First of all it’s Professor Pittain! And second of all, that little bone, proved that, that particular dinosaur had wings, but didn’t fly.
Okay, see now, what I just heard: blah-blah-blah, blah-blah-blah-blah-blah, blah-blah-blah, blah, blah.
Y'know what, 100 million people went to see a movie about what I do, I wonder how many people would go see a movie called, Jurassic Parka.
Oh, that is so...

No-no-no, a bunch of out of control jackets take over an island. (Makes an unusual sound, then he realises that he still has his jacket on and quickly tries to shake it off, thinking it’s alive and attacking him.)
Y'know if what I do is so lame, then why did you insist on coming with me this morning? Huh? Was it so I just wouldn’t go with Mark?

No. I... I wanted to be with you. I don’t know, I feel like lately, I feel like you’re slipping away from me, y'know. With this new job, and all these new people, and you’ve got this whole other life going on. I-I-I know it’s dumb, but I hate that I’m not a part of it.
It’s not dumb. But, maybe it’s okay that you’re not a part of it. Y'know what I mean? I mean it’s like, I-I-I like that you’re not involved in that part of my life.
That’s a little clearer.

Honey see, it doesn’t mean that I don’t love you. Because I do. I love you, I love you so much. But my work it’s-it’s for me y'know, I’m out there, on my own, and I’m doing it and it’s scary but I love it, because it’s mine. I, but, I mean is that okay?
Sure, I-I-I... (hugs her and mouths No!!)

scene: Chandler and Joey's apartment, Chandler and Joey are playing with the duck and the chick
difficulty_description: 对话句型简单，日常生活用语，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: Hey, wouldn't be cool if our duck and chick had a little baby? We could call it Chuck.
Or... Dick.
(entering) Hey.
Hey.
Listen, I-I need a favor. Umm, I was in the shower, and as I was cleansing myself, I ah, I-I, well I felt something.
Was it like a sneeze only better?
No, no, I mean, I mean a thing on my body.
(with a disgusted look) What was it?
Well, I don't know, it's-it's kinda in a place that's not... It's not visually accessible to me, and I was hoping maybe you guys could-could help me out.
Whoa!!!
No!!
Come on you guys, it's no big deal!
Whoa-heeeiiiiii-iiiii-ah!!
Well what is it? Is it a mole?
No, it's too wrinkly to be a mole.
Well, eww. What? Is it a pimple?
No, it's... fancier than a pimple. Look Ross, why don't you just go see a…
(entering, interrupting them) Hey guys! What's... (sees what they're doing and stops, the guys are stunned)
Okay, well, it's definite, two more weeks of winter.
Ahhh.
Yeah, right.

scene: Central Perk, Chandler, Joey, and Rachel are there, as Phoebe enters with her date
difficulty_description: 对话包含多重语境转换，包含一定复杂句型，适合具备基础语法和词汇量的学习者。

dialogues.text: (to her date) Okay, and then this is the coffee house. This is where I play my music.
Good deal.
Yeah, and these are my friends. People. This is Vince, Vince the people.
Hi!
Hey!
Hey!
Vince is a fireman.
Wow! Have you ever rescued anyone from a burning building before?
98 hot saves, highest in the force.
Well, y'know if Joey and I played with matches we could get you up to an even hundred.
(dead serious) Fire safety is not a joke, son.
You're right, I know.
(to Phoebe) Look, I gotta go. I'm on call tonight. (kisses her) See you Saturday.
Okay.
Wow, he's cute, Pheebs! But I thought you just started dating that Kindergarten teacher.
Oh, Jason? Yeah, uh-huh, we're seeing each other tonight.
What-Pheebs?! Two dates in one day? That's so unlike you.
I know, I know! I'm like playing the field. Y'know? Like, juggling two guys, I'm sowing my wild oats. Y'know? Y'know, this kind've like y'know oat-sowin', field-playin' juggler.
So Pheebs, do they know about each other?
Does a dog's lips move when he reads?
(making an `I don't know' face) Okay, no they don't.
(entering) Hey guys!
Hey.
Hi!
(going over to him) Well?!
(joining them) Okay, how'd it go at the doctor's?
Well, he said there's definitely nothing to worry about, it's totally benign.
Well what is it?!
He couldn't even tell me! He said it was just some sort of skin... abnormality. And the worst thing is he-he-he said, he said, without being able to identify it, he was reluctant to remove it.

Y'know what? You should go to my guy, because when I went in there with my third nipple. He just lopped it right off. Y'know? So I guess I'm lucky. I mean not as lucky as people who were born with two nipples.
At least they knew what yours was. Y'know, yours had a name.
Oh! Maybe they'll name yours after you! Y'know, they'll call it, The Ross. And then people would be like, "Awww, he's got a Ross."
(sarcastic) Yeah, that'd be cool!

scene: A Doctor's Office, Ross is having his thing looked at by Dr. Rhodes
difficulty_description: 内容简短，词汇和句型简单，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: Th-th-that's all it is, a third nipple. Y'know? Just your run-of-the-mill third nipple. Y'know? You can take it off. Just slice that baby right off!
Take your shirt off, and let's see what we're dealing with here.
Just showing you my run-of-the-mill-slice-it-right-off third nipple.
Well that's not a third nipple.
No?
First of all, it's on your ass.
Well then, what is it?!
Wait a minute, hold it. (He goes to the door and opens it.) Johnson! Will you come in here a moment?
I'm with Hamilton!
He's good with rear things, bring him in too.

scene: Central Perk, Chandler, Monica, and Joey are there, Phoebe and Rachel enter later
difficulty_description: 对话句子略长，涉及感情表达和复杂句型，适合具备中等英语水平的学习者。

dialogues.text: I gotta go water Pete's plants.
Y'know what, if he's gonna break up with me, maybe I won't water his plants.
Well, if he's gonna break up with you, maybe Joey and I should water his plants. If y'know what I mean.
Or ha-ha, we could go over there and pee on them.
…and I-I can't take it! Y'know? I'm just, always afraid one of them is gonna catch me with the other one. It's making me crazy.
Well honey, then why don't you break up with one of them?
Uh.
Whoa-whoa-whoa. What ah, what happened to playing the field?
Well, it just, it doesn't feel like playing anymore, it feels like work. It's like I'm working in the field.
So Pheebs, pick one of them.
Yeah. Which one do you like more?
Well, Vince is great, y'know `cause, he's like a guy, guy. Y'know? He's so burly, he's sooo very burly.
Okay, good, so there you go. Go with Vince.
Yeah, but Jason's really sensitive.
Well sensitive is important, pick him.
Yeah.
Oh sure, go with the sissy.
Jason is not a sissy!
Oh no-no-no-no, I meant Chandler.

scene: 在 Dr. Rhodes 办公室，医生们讨论 Ross 身上的奇怪现象
difficulty_description: 此场景包含专业术语和医学讨论，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: Y'know I have dinner plans!!
Thank you soo much for coming on such a short notice. Ladies and gentlemen, I've-I've-I've been practicing medicine for twenty-three years, and I'm stumped.
Whoa. (they all lean in to get a closer look, Ross isn't pleased)

scene: Monica 带着朋友们参观 Pete 的公寓
difficulty_description: 此场景包含简单的日常对话，句型短，词汇基础，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: Okay, this is the den. All right, check this out. Lights! Whoa! All right. Less lights! Bad lights! Lights go away! Oh, see you just need to find the right command.
Yes, and the dimmer switch.
Whoa! For a rich guy he's got, that's a pretty small TV.
No-no-no, that's a video-phone. But hey guys you're not supposed to be here, so please, do not touch anything.
(sitting down on the couch) I-kea! This is comfortable.
(entering with Phoebe) This place is amazing.
God, that is the nicest kitchen.
I know.
No! But it's the nicest kitchen, the refrigerator told me to have a great day.
Look at this! A millionaire's checkbook.
Joey, put that down! (the phone rings) Oh my God! It's Pete. Okay, get out!! How the hell do you answer a video-phone! (steps in front of it, and automatically answers it)
Monica? (the gang ducks and hides)
I guess that's how.
Hey Monica, how's it going.
Oh it’s umm, good! It's umm, it’s good, just here watering the plants.
Well don't forget that fiches over there by Rachel.
(standing up) Ahh... Chandler's on the couch!!
I see him, you guys are just the worst hiders ever.
(standing up) Hey Pete.
Hi, how ya doing?
Ahh, Pete, the other day when you said you needed to talk, umm, just so I know, is it good news or bad news.
Oh, it's good news. No, it's definitely good news. Hold on a second, I have another call. (clicks his remote) (to his other call) Hey, how's it going?
Oh no-no-no, it's still me.
Ah, no it's not. I've got picture-in-picture here. (to other caller) Yeah. (listens) Yeah, okay. I'm gonna have to call you back later. (pause) Monica? You. I'm gonna have to call you back.
Oh, oh, okay umm, so I'll see you soon.
Okay, I love you.
I love you.
I love you, love you.
Okay. Well, it's good news. It's good news.
So, what do you thing the good news is?
(looking at the checkbook) Wow! Look at this! He wrote a check for 50,000 dollars to Hugo Ligrens Ring Design. (Monica is stunned) Oh, sorry, what do you think the good news is?
Oh my.
Monica's gonna marry a millionaire!!!
Hey, you gotta get Mom on the phone. Call Mom! Call Mom!
And that's Pete's Mom.

scene: Monica 和朋友们回到 Monica 和 Rachel 的公寓
difficulty_description: 此场景包含更多的互动和复杂的句型，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: Mon you definitely have to make it a theme wedding, and the theme could be, “Look how much money we’ve got!” Y'know, I mean you could put, you could put money in-in the invitations! You-you could have like little money place settings. And ah, you could start with a money salad! I mean it’ll be dry, but people will like it.
Would you stop? We’ve only been going out a couple of weeks, I mean we don’t even know if he’s gonna propose.
Yes, but this is Pete. Okay? He’s not like other people, on your first date he took you to Rome. For most guys that’s like a third or fourth date kinda thing.
Well if-if that’s what it is, then it’s-it’s crazy.
Monica’s right. We’re talking about getting married here. Okay? She-she can’t just rush into this.
Oh please, what do you know! You married a lesbian!
All right. I gotta go. I have break up with Vince.
Oh, so you’re going with the teacher, huh?

Yeah, I like Vince a lot, y'know? But, it’s just Jason’s so sensitive, y'know? And in the long run, I think sensitive it’s just better than having just like a really, really, really nice (pause) butt. (Her eyes glaze over thinking about the butt.) (pause) Jason! Definitely Jason! Okay, wish me luck!
Good luck!
OH MY GOD!!! (She holds her hands up in triumph and the gang all look at her.) Sorry, I was just imagining what it’d be like to catch the money bouquet.

scene: Phoebe 到消防局和 Vince 分手
difficulty_description: 此场景包含简单的分手对话，句型短，词汇基础，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: Excuse me. Umm, is Vince here?
Oh sure. Vince?!
Yo!! (slides down that pole that fire station’s have)
Wow! I didn’t know you guys actually used those.
So, what’s up?
Umm, wow. This-this isn’t gonna be easy. Umm, I don’t think we should see each other anymore.
Uh-huh. G-good deal.
I’m sorry.

No-no it’s okay. It’s just that ah, I thought we had something pretty special here. And y'know I-I felt like you were someone I could finally open up to, and… (starts choking up) That there’s so much in me I have to share with you yet.
Oh my God, I didn’t…
(starting to cry) I’m sorry, I can’t talk. I’m gonna go write in my journal. (walks away)
(running after him) Wait-wait-wait! Wait!!

scene: Phoebe，Ross 和 Monica 在 Central Perk 讨论 Ross 的健康问题
difficulty_description: 此场景包含有关健康和治疗的讨论，对话长度适中，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: (to Ross) I’m telling you, if you want to take care of that thing, you should go to my herbal guy.
Thank you, but I want to remove it Pheebs. I don’t want to make it savory.
Y'know when girls sleep with guys with weird things on their body, they tell their friends about it.
Gimme this. (Grabs the herbalist’s card and leaves.)
(entering) Hi! Okay, don’t be mad at me, but I couldn’t resist.
Brides magazines?
Yes, and I know that you’d say no if he asked you, but I’m sorry; how great would you look walking down the aisle in this Donna Karan. (shows her the picture.)
(gasps) Oh, you so would! Oh, you should get that anyway. (They both look at her.) Like for clubbing.

It is so weird, I know what I said, but uh, this morning, I was lying in bed I was, I was imagining what it would be like to say yes. (Rachel slams the magazine shut in amazement.) I know it’s a little sudden, and it’s a little rushed, and it’s totally not like me to do something like this, but that doesn’t mean I can’t. Right? I mean I’m-I’m crazy about Pete, and I know that we want the same things, and when I thought about saying yes, it made me really happy.
Oh my God. (starting to cry)
I know. (pause) I need more pie. (goes and gets some)
Hey Mon umm, if you do get married, can I bring two guests?
You didn’t break up with that fireman?
No, that was my way of telling you. Well, it turns out he’s incredibly sensitive, he keeps a journal and he paints. He even showed me charcoal drawings that he drew of me.
Wow!
Yeah, well he’d prefer water colors, but y'know, he has easy access to a lot of charcoal.
So then, are you going to dump Jason?

Well, yeah, because I have to break up with someone, and… Okay so Jason is sensitive, (holds up one finger) but now so’s Vince (holds up one finger on her other hand) Plus, Vince has the body y'know? (holds up two more fingers on the Vince side) So… It’s really just about the math.

scene: Phoebe 去 Jason 家里分手
difficulty_description: 此场景对话简洁，句子短，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: Jason?
Yeah, come on in.
So Phoebe, you ah, sounded kinda serious on the phone, is ah, is anything wrong?
Nah-ha!

scene: Ross 去见草药师 Guru Saj
difficulty_description: 对话包括复杂句型和幽默，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: You must be Ross.
Hi.
I am Guru Saj.
Listen, I got to tell you I’ve-I’ve never been to a guru before, so...
Well, relax. If it makes you feel better, I’ve attended some of the finest medical schools in Central America. Well then, let’s take a look at this skin abnormality of yours. Come on, have a seat.
What’s a koondis?
I don’t know, what’s a koondis with you?
Please, lie down! I’ve got a sav that oughta shrink that right up.
I guess it’s worth a try.
Oh sure, we should see results—Whoa!! Clearly not the way to go!!
What?! What?!
We appear to have angered it.
We?! We angered it?!
Oh, I think I see the problem. And I’m afraid we’re gonna have to use a much stronger tool. Love.
Oh God!
Ross, there is absolutely no way this is going to come off unless you start to…
Ow!!
Oops.
What was, what was that?
Well it’s gone.
What?! How’s that?
It got caught on my watch.
Hey!

scene: Pete 和 Monica 约会回到 Pete 家
difficulty_description: 对话包括复杂句型和丰富的词汇，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: Lights.
Uh, romantic lights.
Ooh, nice.
So ah, there was this thing I wanted to talk to you about.
Oh, right! I completely forgot about that.
Well ah, I’ve been doing a lot of thinking, and I look at my life...
Yeah?
And I feel like I’ve conquered the business world, and I feel like I’ve conquered the intellectual world, and now I-I have the most beautiful woman in the world.
Wow.
There’s one thing missing.
What’s that?
It’s time for me to conquer the physical world.
Okay.
Monica, I want to become the Ultimate Fighting Champion.
You wanna what?!
I want to become the Ultimate Fighting Champion! It’s the most intense physical competition in the world, it’s banned in 49 states!
What are you talking about?
Okay, my trainer, Ho Chi, is teaching me a combination of Gee Koon Doe and Brazilian street fighting, I’ve even had my own octagon training ring designed.
And I suppose you used a ring designer for that.
Yeah. Monica, I want you there in the front row when I win. I want you close enough to smell the blood. What do you think?
My parents will be so happy.

scene: Central Perk, Phoebe 唱歌时遇到 Jason 和 Vince
difficulty_description: 包含多角色复杂对话，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: Crazy underwear, creepin’ up my butt. Crazy underwear, always in a rut. Crazy under-(sees Jason)-wear…
Okay, thank you. And, as always no one talk to me after the show.
Hey. I was…
Hey!
I was passin’ by and I saw that you were playing tonight, it’s kinda cool seeing you up there.
Whoa! Hey-hey! What’s going on here? Who is this guy?
I don’t know, he just started kissing me. Get him! Get him, Vince!
What?!
What?!

Yeah, okay, I’ve-I’ve been dating both of you, and it’s been really horrible. ‘Cause y'know it’s been a lot of fun, for me. Umm, but I-I like you both, and I, and I didn’t know how to chose, so... I’m sorry, I’m just, I’m terrible, I’m a terrible person. I’m terrible.
Phoebe, Phoebe relax, it’s okay. I mean we never said this was exclusive.
Yeah, and neither did we. Give yourself a break.
Really?!
Yeah. I mean y'know, we haven’t been going out that long. Come on, we haven’t even slept together yet. Huh.
You haven’t?
You have?
Well, this is none of my business.
I-I can’t believe this! You-you’ve slept with him?!
Well, I made you a candle light dinner in the park.
Y'know Phoebe, I’m gonna make this real easy for you.
Well, that could’ve been really awkward.
You made him a candle light dinner in the park?
Yeah, but I-I-I-I can do that for you, I’m gonna do that for you.
Uh yeah, I can’t believe I ever went out with somebody who would actually have an open flame in the middle of a wooden area.

scene: Guru Saj 的办公室, Chandler 和 Joey 带鸭去看医生
difficulty_description: 趣味幽默，包含复杂对话，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: Everything’s gonna be all right. Okay, Dick?
Hello, I am Guru Saj-Whoa!! That’s supposed to be a duck right? ‘Cause otherwise, this is waaay out of my league.
Yeah, yeah. He’s got a, he’s got a really bad cough, and our vet, he can’t do anything about it. Is there something you can do?
Hmm, let me see. Let me see. Do you think you could get him to eat a bat?

scene: Chandler, Monica, Phoebe 和 Joey 正在 Monica 和 Rachel 的公寓里讨论 Joey 的感情问题
difficulty_description: 此场景包含较长对话，涉及感情和幽默，适合有一定基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Wait a minute, wait. You’re telling me this actress person is the only woman you ever wanted who didn’t want you back?!
Yeah! Oh my God! (to Chandler) Is this what it’s like to be you?
Wow, you’re really crazy about her, huh?
Oh, you have no idea. And-and when we’re on stage I get to-to kiss her and-and touch her, but then she goes home with the director, and it’s like somebody’s ripping out my heart!
Oh, it’s so great to see you feeling like this!
Hey!
Hey!
Monica, uh Dad called this morning and ah, Aunt Silvia passed away.
Yes!! Yes! Yeah, yeah, yeah!
We were all pretty shaken up about it.
Wait, am I missing something though? ‘Cause I thought death was something that’s supposed to be sad, in a way.
Well ah, Aunt Silvia was, well not a nice person.
Oh, she was a cruel, cranky, old bitch! (Ross gives her a look) (to Ross) And I’m sorry she died. Did Dad say I get the dollhouse?
You get the dollhouse.
I get the dollhouse!
Wow, a house for dolls, that is so cool! When I was kid, I had a barrel.
Uh, Pheebs, you had a barrel for a dollhouse?
No, just a barrel.
Y'know what, you can play with my dollhouse.
Really?! Really?!
Any time you want. Y'know, when I was younger, all I wanted to do was to play with this dollhouse, but no!! It was to be looked at, but never played with.
My Grandmother used to say that exact same thing to me.

scene: Rachel 和 Chandler 在她的办公室
difficulty_description: 此场景包含办公室日常对话，涉及一些幽默和调侃，适合有一定基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Hey, Sophie!
Hey, Rach!
Hey.
Hey.
Thanks for lunch, Chandler. Y'know, you didn’t have to walk me all the way back up here.
Oh, that’s-that’s okay, no problem. (He starts to look around her office.)
Honey um, honey, you do realise that we don’t keep the women’s lingerie here in the office?
Yes, I realise that.
Summer catalogue! (hands him the catalogue)
That’s the stuff! (quickly grabs it)

scene: Rachel 向 Chandler 的介绍引发了 Joanna 的兴趣
difficulty_description: 此场景包含较长对话，涉及感情和幽默，适合有一定基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Rachel, I need the Versachi invoice. (to Chandler) Hello! You don’t work for me.
(introduces them) Joanna, this is my friend Chandler Bing (to Chandler) Joanna.
Bing! That’s a great name.
Thanks, it’s ah, Gaelic, for ‘Thy turkey’s done.’ So ah, I’m gonna go, nice, nice meeting you.
Me too.
Bye, Chandler.
(to Rachel) So ah, what’s wrong with him?
Oh, nothing, he’s just goofy like that, I actually, hardly notice it anymore.
Oh no, no-no-no, is he ah, married, or involved with anyone?
No!! No! He’s not married, or involved, with anyone!
Oh, Rachel, (pause) actually, y'know what, forget it.
Well, I’ll ask him for you, if you want me too?
Would you? Or, is it just to sad and desperate, and y'know something that Sophie would do?
Uh, uh, uh, I am here.
I know that.

scene: Monica 在展示她的新玩具屋，Phoebe 为此添加了奇怪的装饰品
difficulty_description: 此场景包含幽默对话和情景表达，适合有一定基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Look at it! Ohhh! Wallpaper’s a little faded, that’s okay. Carpet’s a little loose. Hardwood floors!!
(entering) Hey!
Hello.
Oh! Ooh! Oh Monica! It’s so beautiful.
I know!!!
So, I’m here, ready to play.
Okay.
I brought a bunch of stuff for the house, so check it out. Ha-ha. (She removes this large ceramic dog that comes up to the second floor and places it next to the house.)
What’s this?
That’s a dog, every house should have a dog.
Not one that can pee on the roof.
Well, maybe it’s so big because the house was built on radioactive waste.
(holding a tissue) And is this in case the house sneezes?
No, no, that’s the ghost for the attic.
I don’t want a ghost.
Well, nobody wants a ghost. But you’ve got one, because the house is sitting on an ancient Indian burial ground.
Wait a minute, the house was built on radioactive waste, and an ancient Indian burial ground? That would never happen.
Okay, obviously you don’t know much about the U.S. government.
(entering) Hey!
Hello.
I need to talk to you!
Sure, what’s up?
Oh, sorry. I meant Chandler.
I-I know. Well if something comes up... (walks away)
Oh, I'm glad you guys are past that little awkward phase.
Okay, my boss, Joanna, when you left, she started asking questions about you...
Oh-ho, liked what she saw, huh? Dug my action, did she? Checkin’ out the Chan-Chan man!
(looks at him) That was (pause) surreal. Okay, what do think? Are you interested at all?
Yeah, she seemed cool, attractive. I’ll do it.
Oh thank you, Chandler, this is so great, she’s gonna love me.
(holding a dinosaur) Okay, dinosaur attack!! Quick, everybody into the house!! Ahh-ahh! (the dinosaur starts attacking the house. She starts to bark like a dog.) Roof! Rrroof-roof-roof!
Okay, Phoebe, y'know what? That-that’s it, that’s it, all right? No dinosaurs, no ghosts, no giant dogs, okay? They’re not the right size, they’re not Victorian, and they just don’t go.
Okay, (starts to pack up her stuff) fine. Come dinosaur, we’re not welcome in the house of no imagination.
Uh, Pheebs, while we’re hovering around the subject. I just have to say dinosaurs, they-they don’t go, rrroof!
The little ones do.

scene: Joey 和 Kate 在剧院里准备排练。
difficulty_description: 此场景包含关于排练和角色关系的更多话题，对话稍长，需要学习者具备中等语法和词汇基础。

dialogues.text: Hey, Kate!
Morning.
Listen, I ah, went to that restaurant that you were talking about last week...
Hey, lovely! Come, talk to me a minute!
(to himself) And I ate the food, I had the fish, it was good, yeah. It was good, yeah...
Hi, oh, I’m Lauren, Kate’s understudy.
Oh, hey! Joey Tribbiani.
I know! I-I’m a big fan of yours.
(looks at her, shocked) What?!
I used to umm, schedule my classes so I could watch Dr. Drake Remoray on Days of Our Lives.
Get out of here, really?!
Absolutely!
Yeah?
Oh but then, they went and dropped you down that elevator shaft.
They gave me the shaft all right.
(laughing) Oh, you’re so funny. Listen, umm, what are you doing after rehearsals? Do you want to get a drink, or something?
Well Ahh, (he sees Kate and the director kissing) yeah! Yeah, sure, a drink sounds great.
Cool! I-I’ll see you then.
All right.
All right, it’s time to act, my talking props.

scene: Phoebe 带着她自己做的娃娃屋进入了 Monica 和 Rachel 的公寓。
difficulty_description: 此场景以展示玩具房子为主，句型和词汇都比较基础，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: Hey!
Hey!
Look everybody, look at my new dollhouse!!
Wow!!
Look, look! (She lifts up the roof, and the front panel falls revealing the interior.)
Hey, what’s this?!
Oh, okay, it’s the slide instead of stairs. Watch this.
It’s very interesting, Phoebe.
What’s this?
The Licorice Room, you can eat all the furniture. And, when guests come over, they can stay on the tootsie roll-away bed.
This is the coolest house ever!!
Hey, does anybody want to join me in the aroma room? (lights some incense)
All right!
I would!
Hey, guys, guys, did you see my new, china cabinet?!
Uh-huh.
Watch, watch. (She turns a strand of Christmas lights strung around the house.)
Ooohhhh!!
And, and! (She turns on a bubble maker.)
Ahhhh!!
(entering) Hey, my Father’s house does that!
(to Chandler) O-o-o-okay, how did it go? Tell me everything.
Well, the movie was great, dinner was great, and there’s nothing like a cool, crisp New York evening.
Hmm.
Of course, I didn’t get to enjoy any of that, because Joanna’s such a big, dull dud!

scene: Rachel 的办公室，Joanna 在讲述她与 Chandler 的约会。
difficulty_description: 此场景为讨论约会相关话题，部分对话较长，需要一定的语法和词汇基础。

dialogues.text: Chandler is fantastic!!
What?!
Oh God, we just clicked! Y’know how people just click? Like he came by to pick me up, and I opened the door, and it was just like, click! Did he tell you?
Oh, and he’s got such a good heart! Doesn’t he have a good heart?
Oh, I know...
Oh, I know and he’s soo sweet! Listen, he said he was going to call, so put him straight through.
Isn’t this great?!
Don’t spoil it.

scene: Joey 和 Kate 在剧院里排练。
difficulty_description: 此场景包含复杂的对话和关系讨论，涉及文化背景和抽象思维，适合高级学习者。

dialogues.text: Come on baby, don’t go. Please? What do you say?

Hello. Oh! It’s you. Just ah, just one-one sec. (to Joey and Kate) I am going to take this call. When I continue, I hope that there will appear on stage this magical thing that in the theatre we call, committing to the moment!
(to Kate) That guy’s like a cartoon. What do you see in him anyway?
He happens to be brilliant. Which is more than I can say for that sweater you’re dating.
Hey, I’m not interested in her sweater! It’s what’s underneath her sweater that counts. And besides, since ah, since when do you care who I’m going out with?
I don’t care. Why, do you want me to care?
Do you want me to want you to care?
Do you?
What?
Okay, I’m afraid to say this, but let’s pick it up where we left off.
Come on baby, don’t go. Please? What do you say?
I’ve got no reason to stay.
(Joey grabs her and kisses her.)
Stop!! Stop it! You must stop! You are bad actors! This is a terrible play! I’ll see you in the morning.
I can’t believe we go on in, in a week.
Hey, it’s gonna be all right.
Hey! So since we’re getting off early, do you want to go and paint mugs?
What?
You know! At the place I told you about last night?
Oh, yeah, with the mug painting. Yeah. I was so listening to that. But ah, y'know what, I think I kinda need to work on my stuff tonight.
Oh, okay.
Okay. (he gives her a peck on the cheek)
I’ll see you tomorrow. (she kisses him full on the mouth.)
Okay.
G’night.
Ah, are you okay?
Yeah, I guess. Look, what are we gonna do about this scene, huh?
I don’t know.
Well umm, maybe if it had more heat.
How do you mean?
Well, Adrian’s looking for a reason to stay, right? Victor can’t just kiss her, he’s gotta, gotta really give her a reason, y'know?
Maybe he could slip her the tongue.
Or maybe, maybe he could grab her, and, and, and, and lift her up.
Yeah, yeah, and then Adrian, she maybe she could wrap her legs around his waist.
And then she could rip off his shirt and kiss his chest, and, and his stomach!
And then, then he could use his teeth, his teeth to undo her dress, and, and, and bite her!
And then right, right when the scene ends, he could take her with this raw, animal....
[cut to Joey’s bedroom, Joey and Kate are emerging from under the covers.]
Something like that?
Yeah, that’s pretty much what I had in mind.
Yeah.

scene: Joey tells Ross and Monica about his amazing night with Kate.
difficulty_description: 此场景包含简单的日常对话，句子短，词汇简单，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: Hey.
Hi.
Hey.
Hi.
Hey.
It’s a little early to be drinkin’.
No-no, things ah, finally happened with Kate.
Ohhhhh!
You’re kidding?! That’s great!
Oh, it was so amazing. After the love making...
Oh my.
Yep. I just, I just watched her sleep for like hours, just breathing in and breathing out. And then I knew she was dreaming ‘cause, ‘cause her eyes keep going like this.

scene: Chandler enters discussing his date with Rachel.
difficulty_description: 此场景对话较长，涉及情感表达和解释，适合有一定英语基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: I’m telling ya, Joanna’s got it all wrong. Okay? All I said was, ‘This was fun. Let’s do it again sometime. I’ll give you a call.’
Ohh, gee. I wonder why she thinks you’re going to call her?
That’s what you say at the end of a date.
You can’t just say, ‘Nice to meet you, good night?’
To her face? Look it’s the end of the date, I’m standing there, I know all she’s waiting for is for me to say ‘I’ll call her’ and it’s just y'know, comes out. I can’t help it, it’s a compulsion.
Come on Rach, when a guy says he’s going to call, it doesn’t mean he’s going to call. Hasn’t it ever happened to you?
Well, they always called.
Hmm, bite me.

scene: Joanna is anxious about Chandler not calling.
difficulty_description: 此场景涉及部分情感表达和上下级对话，适合中等水平的学习者。

dialogues.text: Did he call?
No. Sorry.
Why?! Why?! He said he’d call. Why hasn’t he called?
Maybe he’s intimidated by really smart, strong, successful women.
Sophie, would you please climb out of my butt. Why hasn’t he called, Rachel? Why?
Okay, okay. Umm, well ah, maybe he, maybe he feels awkward because you are my boss.
Awkward? Why should he feel awkward?
Well...
The only person that should feel awkward is you, and you didn’t tell him not to call me, did you?
No. I...
Because if you feel uncomfortable with your friend dating someone you work for, there are always ways to fix...that.

scene: Rachel urges Chandler to call Joanna.
difficulty_description: 场景语言复杂，涉及情绪变化和多个短小对话，适合高级学习者。

dialogues.text: Call her! Call her now!
Multiple, so many paper cuts.
Why hasn’t he called Rachel? Why? Why? I don’t understand. Why? He said he’ll call. Why? Why? Chandler I’m telling you she has flipped out, she’s gone crazy!
Oh, well give me the phone then.
Come on, this isn’t funny. She thinks it’s my fault that you haven’t called her. You have to call her!
Look, you can’t call somebody after this long just to say, ‘In case you didn’t notice, I don’t like you!’
Well then you’re going to have to take her out again.
Nooo!! She’s really dull! And she gets this gross mascara goop thing in the corner of her eye!

I don’t care! I don’t care! You are going to have to take her out again and end it, and end it in way that she knows it’s actually ended. And, I don’t care how hard it is for you, do not tell her that you will call her again!
All right! Fine! But it’s just a lunch date, no more than an hour! And from now on I get my own dates, I don’t want you setting me up with anybody ever again!
That’s fine!
That’s just a lot of big talk, y'know.
I know.

scene: Ross accidentally sets Phoebe's dollhouse on fire.
difficulty_description: 虽然对话不多，但涉及到紧张情绪的表现，适合有一定英语基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Mon?
I’m in the shower!
Oh, fire! There, there’s a fire! Fire!!

scene: Joey talks to Kate about their relationship.
difficulty_description: 场景中涉及情感表达和矛盾解决，适合中等水平的学习者。

dialogues.text: Hey.
Hi.
So I ah, talked to Lauren, kinda told her how things were with us. Did you ah, did you talk to Marshall?
About what?
Y'know, about what happened with us.
Nooo. And there’s really no reason he should find out, so ah let’s not make a big deal about it, okay?
What are you talking about? It was a big deal. I mean, come on you can’t tell me last night didn’t mean something to you. I-I was there, you’re not that good an actress.
Look umm, I, I was, I was just caught up in the moment. That’s all it was. Joey, I’m-I’m sorry you feel bad, but haven’t you ever slept with a woman where it meant more to her than it did to you?
Nooo.
Hi, Kate!
Hi, Lauren.
Hi, Lauren.
Hi, pig!

scene: Phoebe sees the damage to her dollhouse.
difficulty_description: 场景中包含伤心情绪和安慰行为，适合有一定英语基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Hey!
I tried to reach you at work. There’s....been a fire.
What?! Oh my... Oh my God!! What happened?!
Well, we believe it originated here. In the Aroma Room.
All right. Did everyone get out okay?
Well, the giraffe’s okay. And so is the pirate.
Ohh. What is this?
No Phoebe, don’t look! You don’t want to see what’s under there!!

scene: Chandler and Joanna return from their lunch date.
difficulty_description: 场景涉及对话关闭和诚实表达，适合中等水平的学习者。

dialogues.text: It’s not a big deal. It’s, just it’s right here, and it’s all the time.
Well, thanks again for lunch.
Yes, this, this was pleasant.
It was, wasn’t it?
The food there was, was great.
Wasn’t it?
So take care.
You too.
Well, this was great. I’ll give you a call. We should do it again sometime.
Great! I’m looking forward to it. Rachel, any messages?
Sophie’s desk.
Chandler!! Are you gonna call her!
Noo!
Chandler!!
Look, I’m sorry. Okay? I’m weak, and pathetic, and sorry.
Okay, you are going to tell her and you’re going to tell her now.
Ahhhh—I’m not going to call you.
What?

I’m sorry. I’m-I’m-I’m sorry that I said I was going to when I’m not. Look, this has nothing to do with you, y'know? And this isn’t Rachel’s fault. It’s me. I have serious, serious problems when it comes to women. I have issues with commitment, intimacy, mascara goop. And I’m really sorry, it’s just that this is not, this isn’t going to work out.
Well, this isn’t how I was hoping how this would end, but I guess I have to appreciate your honesty.
Yeah, o-okay.
So...
Well this is great! I’ll give you a call! We should do it again sometime!

scene: Joey calls Beth and then tries to call Jennifer.
difficulty_description: 此场景为简单电话对话，语气友好，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: Well, so anyway Beth, what I’m saying is I should’ve considered your feelings before I went home with you that night. I’ve ah, I’ve recently learned what’s it like to be on your side of it, and I’m sorry. So, do you think you can forgive me? Great. Thanks. Okay, bye.
Hello, Jennifer? Oh hi, Mrs. Loreo, is Jennifer there? Oh, she’s not home huh? Well ah, actually I kinda need to talk to you too.

scene: Janice 问大家是否有跟彼此睡过
difficulty_description: 此场景包含多角色间的对话，句型和词汇较日常对话略有复杂，适合具备一定英语基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Janice has a question. Who of the six of you has sleep with the six of you?
Wow, it’s like a dirty math problem.
I’m sorry the answer there would be...none of us.
Come on over the years none of you ever y'know, got drunk and stupid.
Well, that’s really a different question.
I’m sorry I find it hard to believe that a group of people who spends as much time together as you guys do has never bumped uglies.
Well, there was that one time that Monica and Rachel got together.
What?!!
Excuse me, there was no time!
Okay, but let’s say there was. How might that go?
Okay, okay, well then answer me this. Has any of you ever.... almost?
Does anybody need more coffee?
Yeah, I’ll take some.
Hey, there’s a dog out there!

scene: 三年前 Monica 和 Phoebe 的公寓
difficulty_description: 此场景包含生活中的幽默对话和一定的感情色彩，适合有一定英语基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Oh, that is so unfortunate.
What?
Cute naked guy is really starting to put on weight.
Okay, I’ll be back in just a minute. Oh, Phoebe I’m sorry that I left lipstick marks on the phone.
You didn’t leave lipstick marks on the phone.
Oh, then it must’ve been you. Bye.
(angrily) Bye-bye! (to Ross) That’s why I moved out.
Hey, y'know while we’re on that, when are you gonna tell my sister that you don’t live here anymore.
I think on some levels she already knows.
Phoebe, she doesn’t know that you sneak out every night, she doesn’t know that you sneak back every morning, and she doesn’t know that you’ve been living with your Grandmother’s for a week now.
Okay, well maybe not on those levels.

scene: Chandler 找室友的过程
difficulty_description: 此场景主要是面试和自我介绍对话，包含一些幽默，对话内容相对复杂。

dialogues.text: Hey.
Hey.
I’m never gonna find a roommate, ever.
Why, nobody good?

Well let’s see, there was the guy with the ferrets, that’s plural. The spitter. Oh-ho, and yes, the guy that enjoyed my name so much he felt the need to make a little noise every time he said it. Nice to meet you, Chandler Bing Bing! Great apartment Chandler Bing, Bing!
So how many more do you have tomorrow?
Two. This photographer, who seemed really dull. And this actor guy, who I’m not sure about, because when he called and I answered the phone ‘Chandler Bing,’ he said ‘Whoa-whoa, short message.’
Ross, foot on the floor or come over no more!
Sure, your dresser is missing but this she notices.
What?
I have to go. Yeah, Carol should be home by now, soo...
Umm, how’s it going with you guys?
Oh, better, actually. Y'know I-I-I think I finally figured out why we were having so much trouble lately.
Oh, really?

Yeah, y'know how I have you guys, well she doesn’t really have any close friends that are just hers, but last week she meet this woman at the gym, Susan something, and they really hit it off, and I-I-I think it’s gonna make a difference

scene: Chandler 面试 Eric
difficulty_description: 此场景为室友面试中常见的内容，包含简单的询问和回答，适合具备一定英语基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Soo, ah, Eric, what kind of photography do ya do?
Oh, mostly fashion, so there may be models here from time to time, I hope that’s cool.
Yes, that is cool. Because I have models here y'know......never.
Oh, yeah, during the summer, I spend most weekends at my sister’s beach house, which you are welcome to use by the way. Although, I should probably tell you, she’s a porn star.
Well, listen I ah, still have one more person to ah meet, but unless it turns out to be your sister, I think you’re chances are pretty good.

scene: Chandler 面试 Joey
difficulty_description: 此场景为室友面试，包含幽默的元素，对话较为轻松，适合具备一定英语基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Bedroom. Bathroom. Living room. This right here is the kitchen, and thanks for coming by, Bye-bye.
Don’t you ah, don’t you wanna ask me any questions?
Sure. Ummm. What’s up?
Well, ah, I’m an actor. I’m fairly neat. I ah, I got my own TV. Oh, and don’t worry I’m totally okay with the gay thing.
What gay thing?
Ah, y'know just in general people being gay, thing. I’m totally cool with that.

scene: Monica 和 Chandler 在酒吧
difficulty_description: 此场景包含朋友间的闲聊和互动，句型和词汇较为基础，适合具备一定英语基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Hey, Mon.
Hey-hey-hey. You wanna hear something that sucks.
Do I ever.
Chris says they’re closing down the bar.
No way!
Yeah, apparently they’re turning it into some kinda coffee place.
Just coffee! Where are we gonna hang out now?
Got me.
Can I get a beer.
Hey, did you pick a roommate?
You betcha!
Is it the Italian guy?
Um-mm, yeah right!
He’s so cute.
Oh yes, and that’s what I want a roommate that I can walk around with and be referred to as the funny one.
Oh look, the pool table’s free. Rack ‘em up. I’ll be back in just a minute. Get ready for me to whip your butt.
Okay, but after that, we’re shootin’ some pool.

scene: Rachel 和朋友们在酒吧的对话
difficulty_description: 此场景包含朋友间的闲聊、婚礼话题和幽默元素，对话较日常对话略长，适合具备一定英语基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Oh, um, no, no, no, no excuse me, hello. Hi. My friend ordered an onion, not an olive, and uh I ordered a rum and Diet Coke, which I don’t think this is.
I am so sorry.
That’s all right. I mean hard is it to get a couple drinks right, huh?
Well, I would like to propose a toast to the woman, who in one year from today, become Mrs. Dr. Barry Farber DDS
Ummm, I think it’s time to see the ring again.
Oh, isn’t it exciting, I mean it’s like having a boyfriend for life.
Yeah, I know.
What?
Oh, I don’t know. Well maybe it’s just the idea of Barry for the rest of my life. I don’t know I think I feel like I need to have one last fling, y'know, just to sorta get it out of my system.
Rachel stop!
You’re so bad!
I’m serious, I really, I think I need just to have some...meaningless, sex y'know, with the next guy that I see.
Excuse, I seem to have dropped my ball.
Yeah, so?
And now I’ve picked it up again.
Oh my God, I went to high school with her. Rachel! Hi!
Monica! Hi! What do ya think?
Oh my God, you can’t even see where the Titanic hit it.
Yes, his name is Barry, he’s a doctor, thank you very much.
Awww, just like you always wanted. Congratulations
Thank you. So how-how ‘bout you, are-are you seeing anybody?
Aww, not right now.
Oh, but that’s okay.
I know.
Yeah
So, I’ll get-get back to my friend.
Oh, yeah, sure, sure, sure, sure.
Listen, can we please have lunch the next time I’m in the city?
Oh, that’d be great.
Okay!
Thanks.
Bye!
Bye!
Ten bucks says, I never see that woman again in my life.

scene: Ross 在 Monica 和 Phoebe 的公寓打电话
difficulty_description: 此场景包含中等复杂句型以及日常对话，适合有一定英语基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: No real-, honey, really it’s fine, just g-go with Susan. Really, I, no, I think girls night out is a great idea. Okay, okay, bye.
So what are they doing?
I don’t know, something girlie.

scene: Phoebe 在 Monica 的公寓和 Monica 交谈
difficulty_description: 此场景内台词简短，易于理解，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: Hey, you’re early.
What are you doing with the lamp?
I’m just taking it to be re-wired.
Oh, well don’t take it to the same place you took the stereo, ‘cause they’ve had that thing for over a week.

scene: Phoebe 和 Mr. Heckles 在 Monica 的公寓门口交谈
difficulty_description: 此场景包含简单的对话，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: No, no, Mr. Heckles no one is making any noise up here.
You’re disturbing my oboe practice.
You don’t play the oboe!
I could play the oboe!
Then I’m gonna have to ask you to keep it down. (slams the door in his face.)

scene: Mr. Heckles 和 Eric 在走廊里交谈
difficulty_description: 此场景包含中等复杂句型以及误会情节，适合有一定英语基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Who are you?
Hi, I’m Eric, I’m gonna be Chandler’s new roommate.
I’m Chandler’s new roommate.
I-I-I don’t think so.
I could be Chandler’s new roommate.
But, he told me over the phone.
He told me in person.
That’s weird.
Well, I’m going to go into my new apartment now. (goes over to the door and opens it) Ehh!

scene: Chandler 发现 Mr. Heckles 在他的公寓里
difficulty_description: 此场景包含幽默以及非正式对话，稍具挑战性，适合中等水平学习者。

dialogues.text: (coming in from his bedroom, sees Mr. Heckles, and screams.)
(nonchalantly) Oh, hey.

scene: Monica 和 Joey 在走廊里搬东西
difficulty_description: 此场景包含日常对话和略复杂的句型，适合中等水平学习者。

dialogues.text: You want some help with that?
Oh, no thanks, I got it. (picks it up) No I don’t!
Whoa! Are you okay?
Whew! Stood up too fast, got a little head rush.
It’s the heat. (has her hand on his chest, and then pulls it away) And-and the humidity.
That’s a uh, that’s a tough combination.
Do you wanna come in for some lemonade?
Like you wouldn’t believe. (they go into the apartment) Wow! This is a great place.
Thank you. Just make yourself comfortable.
Gotcha.

This place is really my Grandmother’s. (Joey starts to take off all of his clothes, while Monica gets the glasses and pours the lemonade.) I got it from her when she moved to Florida, otherwise I could never afford a place like this. So if the landlord ever asks, I’m 87 year old woman, who’s afraid of her VCR. So are you thirsty?
Oh, you bet I am!
(turning around) Okay, here’s your penis!

scene: Monica 和 Joey 在公寓里误解
difficulty_description: 此场景包含中等复杂句型以及幽默情节，适合有一定英语基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Oh my God!!! What are you doing?!!
You said, you wanna come in for some lemonade?
So?!
Whoa, ah!! We’re you just gonna give me some lemonade?
Yeah huh!! Cover yourself up!
Oh right, right.
I don’t believe this! When someone asks you in for lemonade, and to you that means they wanna have sex?
Well usually...yeah! Well, not just lemonade, iced tea, sometimes juice. Well, sorry, I just, I thought you liked me. I’m such a jerk.
It’s okay. I suppose it could happen to anyone, not anyone I know, but... By the way I can still see it.

scene: Monica 在公寓里吸尘
difficulty_description: 此场景含有一些复杂的句型和情感表达，适合中等英语水平的学习者。

dialogues.text: Pheebs?
Huh?
Where’s your bed?
It’s not in the apartment? (Monica gives a ‘Come on’ look) Oh no. I can’t believe this is happening again.
What?
Okay, enough with the third degree! I-I’ve, I don’t live here anymore.
What are you talking about?
I’m sorry, I-I-I-I don’t live here anymore. I-I didn’t know how to tell you, but y'know everybody else knows!
Everybody knows!

That was supposed to be a good thing, I forget why. Just listen, Monica, I, do you know, okay, do you know, I couldn’t sleep for like a month because I got like a dot of ink on one of the sofa cushions.
Well, you-you coulda just turned the cushion over.
Yeah, I would’ve except I had a big spaghetti stain on the other side.
What?!?!
Okay, this is what I’m talking about, this. I-I need to live in a land where people can spill.
You can spill. In the sink.
Aw, honey it’s not your fault, y'know this is who you are, and I love you, and I want us to be friends, and if I keep living here I don’t see that happening.
I love you, too.
Aww, good. (they hug) What?
What? I’m just sad.
No you’re not, you’re wondering which cushion it is.

scene: Chandler 和 Joey 在公寓里看 Baywatch
difficulty_description: 此场景包含短句对话以及非正式语气，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: So ah, whatcha watching?
Baywatch.
What’s it about?
Lifeguards.
Well, it sounds kinda stupid... (looks at the TV) Who’s she?
Nicole Eggert. You'll like her.
Wow! Look at them run.
They do that a lot. Hey, you want a beer?
Yeah, I’ll go get one.
No, no, no, don’t get up, I got a cooler right here.

scene: Monica 在公寓里遇到 Chandler
difficulty_description: 此场景含有日常生活中的情感对话，适合有一定英语基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: Well, hello!
Hey.
Do you have any beers? We’re out of beers.
Help yourself.
You okay?
Phoebe moved out.
Right.
I don’t understand, I mean am I so hard to live, is this why I don’t have a boyfriend?
Noo!! You don’t have a boyfriend because....I don’t, I don’t know why you don’t have a boyfriend. You should have a boyfriend.
Well, I think so.
Oh-ho, come here. (goes and hugs her) Listen, you are one of my favourite people and the most beautiful woman I’ve ever known in real life.

scene: Ross 和 Phoebe 在酒吧里
difficulty_description: 此场景包含复杂的情感对话和支持性对话，适合中等英语水平的学习者。

dialogues.text: (all depressed) Hi. Where is everybody?
Oh, it’s already closed, Chris gave me the keys to lock up-what is wrong?
My marriage, I think my marriage is um, is kinda over.
Oh no! Why?
‘Cause Carol’s a lesbian. (Phoebe is shocked) And, and I’m not one. And apparently it’s not a mix and match situation.
Oh my God! I don’t believe it! Oh, you poor bunny.

(sets out a bunch of shot glasses and starts to pour himself a drink, many drinks) I’m an idiot. I mean shoulda seen it, I mean Carol and I’d be out and she’d, she’d see some beautiful woman, and, and she’d be Ross y'know look at her, and I’d think, God, my wife is cool!
Aw! Hey, do you think that Susan person is her lover?
Well, now I do!!
I’m sorry.
Seven years. I mean we’ve been together seven years, she’s the only woman who’s ever loved me, and the only woman I’ve-I’ve ever....
Aw, God Ross. Oh.

scene: Monica 和朋友们在 Thanksgiving 讨论是否一起玩 football
difficulty_description: 此场景包含较长的对话和复杂的句型，需要一定的语法和词汇基础。

dialogues.text: Yes! Yes! Yes! Yes! Awww!
Hey, it’s your Thanksgiving too, y'know, instead of watching football, you could help.
We will.
Okay, Rachel, you wanna put the marshmallows in concentric circles.
No Mon, you want to put them in concentric circles. I want to do this.
Every year.

scene: Monica 和朋友们在 Thanksgiving 用餐后决定玩 football
difficulty_description: 此场景包含较长的对话和复杂的句型，需要一定的语法和词汇基础。

dialogues.text: Y'know, for once, I am going to sit down and try to watch one of these things.
Halftime.
Hey, who wants to ah, throw the ball around a little, maybe get a little three on three going?
Oh! That would be sooo much fun!
Oh, can I play too? I’ve never played football, like ever.
Great, you can cover Chandler.

scene: Talking Chandler into playing football
difficulty_description: 此场景包含较长的对话和复杂的句型，需要一定的语法和词汇基础。

dialogues.text: No, no, no, I don’t, I don’t really wanna play.
Come on man! You never want to do anything since you and Janice broke up.
That’s not true! I wanted to wear my bathrobe and eat peanut clusters all day. I wanted to start drinking in the morning. Don’t say that I don’t have goals!

Chandler, you have to start getting over her. All right, if you play, you get some fresh air, maybe it’ll take your mind off Janice, and if you don’t play, everyone will be mad at you ‘cause the teams won’t be even. Come on.
Yeah, all right, I’ll play.
Yay!!

scene: Discussing the Geller Bowl and the rule not to play football
difficulty_description: 此场景包含较长的对话和复杂的句型，需要一定的语法和词汇基础。

dialogues.text: Let’s do it! Ross?
What?
Do you wanna play football?
Um, Monica and I aren’t supposed to play football.
Says who? Your mom?
Yeah.
Well, every, every Thanksgiving um, we used to have a touch football game called the ‘Geller Bowl.’
No, no, no, you say that proudly.
Anyway, Ross and I were always captains, and um, it got kind’ve competitive and one year, Geller Bowl VI, I accidentally broke Ross’s nose.
It was soo not an accident. She saw I was about to tag her, so she threw her big fat grandma arm elbow right into my face. And just keep running.
To score the winning touchdown, by the way.
Whoa, whoa, whoa, ho, ho, ho, you did not win the game, the touchdown didn’t count, because of the spectacularly illegal, oh and by the way savage nose breaking.

scene: The aftermath of the Geller Bowl VI
difficulty_description: 此场景包含较长的对话和复杂的句型，需要一定的语法和词汇基础。

dialogues.text: I won the game.
Oh yeah! Then how come you didn’t get the Geller Cup?
Um, there was a Geller Cup?
Yes, it was the trophy you got if you won the game. But our Dad said, ‘nobody won that game,’ and he was sick of our fighting, so he took the trophy and...
(pauses to collect himself, as he is on the verge of tears saying this) threw it in the lake.
And was the curse lifted?

scene: Deciding to play football again despite their mom's rule
difficulty_description: 此场景包含较长的对话和复杂的句型，需要一定的语法和词汇基础。

dialogues.text: Anyway. That’s when our Mom said we were not to play football ever again.
Y'know what, I think we should play a game. I mean come on, it’s been twelve years.
Can I see you for a second?
(shouting) Once!!
All right, we’re gonna play.
But wait a minute though, how are we gonna get there, though, because my Mom won’t let me cross the street.

scene: The gang is warming up for their football game in the park
difficulty_description: 此场景包含复杂句型和较长对话，学习者需要具备一定的语法和词汇基础。

dialogues.text: Okay. Let’s bring it in.
Wait no, honey, honey throw it to me, throw it to me.
Here you go.
(knocking it down instead of catching it) That almost hit me in the face.
All right, we have to pick captains.
And then Tineals.
Okay, so how do we decide that?
Well, why don’t we just bunny up.
What?
(holding both of their hands above their heads making rabbit ears with their fingers.) Bunny!
Okay, looks like Ross and I are captains. Okay, so um, I bunnied first so that means I get to pick first. Joey.
Thank you.
Monica, I’m your best friend.
Sweetie, don’t worry you’ll get picked. Chandler.
Ross!
Phoebe.
(kissing Rachel on the cheek) Bye, sweetie.
Sweetie, now I pick you.
You don’t pick me! You’re stuck with me!
