dialogues.text: ....right? Right? I mean it’s pretty unbelievable y'know, I mean they just took off, took off without even looking back. Y'know I don’t, I don’t need them, huh, I’ve got you guys now as friends, you and Susan.
Ah, Susan will be so pleased.
Hey, you’ve have more of these for Susan right?
No. But it’s okay, I’ll just put out pickles or something.

scene: Monica 和朋友们在一个休息站，拨打 Ross 的电话
difficulty_description: 此场景有多个角色参与对话，中等长度的句子和略有复杂的语法结构。

dialogues.text: (answering the phone) (whispering) Ross, thank God.
Pheebs? What, why are you whispering?
I ate a bug.
(running over to stop Rachel) Hey Rach, the tampons here are only a penny. Let’s stock up. (takes her into the bathroom)

scene: Phoebe 告诉 Ross 车子没有油了，请他帮忙
difficulty_description: 对话句子较多，有一定的解释和情感表达，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: Listen Ross, we ran out of gas, and we don’t know where we are, so we can’t get a tow truck.
Oh, now you want a favour?
Yes, please.
Well, oh, I’m sorry your car broke down Pheebs, but I’m a little too busy with some of my real friends right now, but please call to let me know you got home safely okay?

scene: Carol 让 Ross 去接 Monica 和 Phoebe
difficulty_description: 此对话涉及情感冲突和劝说, 适合有一定基础的学习者。

dialogues.text: (running over and grabbing the phone away from Ross) (on phone) Phoebe, hang on a second. (Hands Ross her keys) Here, take my car, go pick up your friends.
No, I’m not gonna pick them up.
Listen, we both know you’re gonna do it ‘cause you’re not a jerk. Okay? So you can either sulk here for a half hour and then go pick them up, or save us both time and sulk in the car.
No, Rachel doesn’t want me to....
Look, I-I-I am sorry that Rachel dumped you ‘cause she fell in love with that Mark guy, and you are the innocent victim in all of this, but don’t punish your friends for what Rachel did to you.
Yeah, you’re right.

scene: Ross 在电话中告诉 Phoebe 他愿意去接她们
difficulty_description: 对话情感丰富，有解释和承认错误的段落，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: We were on a break!!! Okay!! (grabs the phone) We were, we were..., (calms down) yeah. Where are you? I’ll find you. (hangs up)
You slept with another woman?
Oh, you-you’re-you’re one to talk.

scene: Ross 接到 Monica 他们，Rachel 表示反对 Ross 一起去滑雪
difficulty_description: 对话混杂了幽默与冲突，涉及多个角色，中等长度句子。

dialogues.text: He is saving your butt, ah, unless of course I’m stepping on some toes here, in which case I can just mosey on, I’ve got plenty of people to help on the Interstate.
All right!! Fine! Fine.
Umm, if ah, it might be okay if Ross came skiing?
No, I wasn’t gonna ask you that, no.

scene: 朋友们争论是否让 Ross 一起去滑雪
difficulty_description: 包含多个角色，长对话和对抗情感，适合高级学习者。

dialogues.text: You guys are unbelievable. No! He cannot come.
Excuse me?
It’s horrible.
Oh please, can’t I come to your special, magical cabin?
Why would you even want to come Ross? You’re a horrible skier.
Oh-oh, hitting me where it hurts, my ski skills.

scene: Phoebe 劝朋友们控制情绪，努力解决冲突
difficulty_description: 对话中包含劝谏和情感表达，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!! Hey!!! (they all stop fighting, Chandler continues to dance.) Look what you’re doing to Chandler!! (Chandler finally stops) (to Ross and Rachel) Yeah, look, we know this is really, really hard for you guys. Okay?
Yeah, and not put us in the middle.
Yeah, otherwise, I mean that’s, that’s, that’s just it for us hanging out together. Y'know is that what you want? (they both look away) Can you be civil?
Yeah.
I can.
Okay. Good, all right, let’s get back in the car, ‘cause it’s freezing, and my chest is unsupported.

scene: Ross 最终决定不与朋友们一起去滑雪
difficulty_description: 话题关于善意的妥协和日常交谈，适合中级学习者。

dialogues.text: Look, you guys, you guys should go.
Come on man, you drove all the way up here.
No, no, really, I’ve got to take the car back anyway, I’m spending all day tomorrow with Ben, It’s fine, no guilt I promise.
Thank you.
All right, we’ll call you when we get back.
Okay.
Maybe we can like go to a movie or something.
Okay.
Or, or the rodeo!!
That would be great.
Okay!
I was being Shelly Winters from The Poseidon Adventure.
I know!
Bye!!!

scene: Ross 修理了 Carol 的车子后回到她家
difficulty_description: 对话简短，语言简单，适合初级学习者。

dialogues.text: Hi! Sorry I’m late. Were you sleeping?
Ahh, nooo!!
Oh, great! Listen, oh I had to get you a whole new battery. I got you the best one I could, ‘cause that’s not where you want to skimp.
You’re a genius, Ross.
Yeah, well it came to about $112, but what the hell, just call it an even 110?
Okay, I’ll pay you tomorrow. (pushes him out the door)
Okay.
Okay, bye!!
